260b3(rgyud 'grel): chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsil ba'i tshal chen mo zhal gcig ma/ phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dmar mo/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis bgrang phreng dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya g.yon pa gnyis kyis rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang/ thugs kar po ti bsnams pa dzaM las
260b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrungs shing 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs shing sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ nyi ma'i gdan la 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/ /'phags ma bsil ba'i tshal zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
260b5(rgyud 'grel): pany+tsa de ba tI sA d+ha na mud+de sha/ bod skad du/ lha mo lnga'i sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas khrus byas pa'i lha mo lnga mdor bstan pa ni de la so sor 'brang ma chen mo ni sku mdog ser mo
260b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum pa/ zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum pa/ phyag bcu pa'o/ /nag po dang/ dkar po dag ni g.yas dang/ cig shos kyi zhal lo/ /g.yas kyi phyag lnga rnams ni go rims bzhin du ral gri dang/ rdo rje dang/ mda' dang/ mchog sbyin dang/ phyag thugs kar gnas pa
260b7(rgyud 'grel): la gdugs rnams so/ /de bzhin du g.yon gyi phyag lnga rnams na gzhu dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ rin po che'i chun po dang/ dgra sta dang/ dud rnams so/ /rin chen 'byung gnas kyi dbu rgyan can/ sha 'gag nag po can/ stod g.yogs dmar pos brgyan pa/ skyil krung phyed pas 'gying
261a1(rgyud 'grel): zhing bzhugs pa/ lha'i rgyan dang/ gos thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /rma bya chen mo ni sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa mdzes shing rma bya'i mdongs dang/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya phyag g.yas pa dang/ g.yon pa dag
261a2(rgyud 'grel): gis so zhes so/ /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma ni sngon ma ji lta ba de bzhin no/ /gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog nag po phyag g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /phyag
261a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa dag gis dgra sta dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa'o zhes so/ /bsil ba tshal chen mo ni sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa phyag g.yas pa dag gis ral gri dang/ mchog sbyin/ g.yon pa dag gis dgra sta dang zhags pa'o zhes so/ /yi
261a4(rgyud 'grel): ge gsum gyis mtshan cing rang gi sa bon gyi dbus su rang gi ming dang bcas pa ni 'di rnams kyi sngags so/ /lha mo lnga'i sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA pra tyaM gi ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ phyir bzlog pa chen
261a5(rgyud 'grel): mo'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma phyir bzlog pa chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir zlog pa chen mo sku mdog nag mo zhal gcig pa/ phyag drug pa/ ral gri dang/ lcags kyu dang/ mchog sbyin rnams phyag g.yas pa rnams na'o/ /pad+ma dmar po dang/ rtse gsum
261a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs 'dzub thugs kar gnas pa ni phyag g.yon pa rnams na'o/ /sa bon ni hUM yig go /mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa'o/ /lang tsho gzhon zhing rgyan thams cad kyis rbrgyan pa'o/ /phyir zlog pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
261a7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ d+hwa dzA gra kai yU rA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan sku mdog nag mo zhal gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ dmar po dang ljang gu
261b1(rgyud 'grel): ni g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang/ zhags pa bsnams pa/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i kha TwAM ga dang/ 'khor lo dag phyag g.yon pa dag na bsnams pa'o/ /dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ thod pa skam po lngas dbu brgyan
261b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ zhal mche ba gcig shing lto 'phyang ba/ nyi ma'i gdan la zhabs g.yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/ /gos ser po'i sha 'gag can/ sa bon ni hUM yig go /mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa can no//
261b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ a pA rA dzi tA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ma sku mdog ser mo
261b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig ma/ phyag gnyis pa/ rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis nye bar mdzes pa/ tshogs bdag yang dag par gnon pa/ phyag g.yas pa thal lcag rdeg pa'i tshul du byas pa/ phyag g.yon pa zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub thugs kar
261b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa/ zhal mche ba gtsigs shing shin tu 'jigs par byed pa/ ma lus pa'i bdud 'joms pa/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i gdug pa can gyi drag po'i lha rnams kyis bskor zhing gdugs bsgreng ba'o/ /zhes so/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
261b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra gand+ha ri sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gAn d+ha rI sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma rdo rje gAn d+ha ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gAn d+ha ri nag mo zhal drug pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/ dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes shing zhabs g.yon brkyang pa'o/ /zhal mche ba
261b7(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs pa/ zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum pa/ phyag g.yas pa drug na go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang/ rdo rje dril bu dang/ ral gri dang/ tri shu la dang/ mda' dang/ 'khor lo rnams bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa drug na kha TwAM ga dang/ lcags kyu dang/
262a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa dang/ snying gar sdigs mdzub 'phyar ba'o/ /zhal dang po ni nag po'o/ /zhal gzhan lnga ni kha dog lnga ste/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngon po'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma dang/ nyi ma'i gdan la
262a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'o/ /bzlas pa'i sngags ni oM hUM hUM hUM swAhA zhes so/ /rdo rje gAn d+ha ri'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra gAn d+ha ri sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gAM d+ha ri'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje gA na d+ha ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje gAn d+ha ri nag mo zhal drug pa/
262a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag bcu gnyis pa/ dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes shing zhabs g.yon brkyang pa/ zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum pa/ g.yas kyi phyag drug rnams su go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang/ rdo rje dril bu dang/ ral gri dang/ rtse gsum
262a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mda' dang/ 'khor lo rnams so/ /g.yon gyi phyag drug rnams su kha TwAM ga dang/ lcags kyu dang/ gzhu dang/ dgra sta dang/ zhags pa dang/ snying gar sdigs mdzub 'phyar ba'o/ /zhal dang po ni nag po'o/ /zhal gzhan lnga ni kha dog lnga ste/ dkar po dang/ ser po
262a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ sngon po'o/ /sna tshogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ /'di la yang gzungs 'di'o/ /na mo ratna tra yA ya/ na ma(rgyud 'grel): tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ mahA yak+Sha se nA pa hA? ye/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti ma hA badzra gAnd+ha ri a ne ka sha ha sA ha swa?
262a6(rgyud 'grel): pra dzwa li ta dI bA te dzA yai u gra b+hI ma b+ha yA na shA? yai yo gI nI yai b+hI Sha ma b+ha gi nI yai d+hwa da sha b+hu dza ye bi kIr Na ke shI ye a ne ka rU pa bi bi d+ha be sha d+ha ra NI yai i hye hi b+ha ga ba ti ma hA badzra gAnd+ha ri tra ya nA ratnA nAM sa tye na A ka dri A ka dri ba la de bA di ki ya tsA n+ye?
262a7(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ye na tiSh+TA n+ti tA nA barta yi/ Sh+yu mi/ trI? g+h+ri grih+na grih+na oM a li a li hu lu hu lu mu lu mu lu tsu lu tsu lu d+ha mi d+ha mi/ raM ga raM ga raM gA pa ya raM gA pa ya pU ra ya pU ra ya/ A b+hi sha A b+hi sha ga ba ti ma hA badzra gAnd+ha ri sid+d+hi tsaN+DA? badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa yi
262b1(rgyud 'grel): tri h+rI(rgyud 'grel): ha ha hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di'i las rab tu brkyang ba ni cho ga 'di las so/ /rdo rje gAn d+ha ri ri sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa rak+Sha bi d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ bsrung ba lnga'i cho ga'o/ /'phags ma so sor 'brang ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig
262b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas zhal bsang ba la sogs pa byas nas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes pas rnal 'byor pa'i gnas dang bdag nyid bsrung zhing lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi thugs
262b3(rgyud 'grel): kar a yig las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ de'i steng du praM yig las 'od zer 'phros pas bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar mdzad nas mdun du bltas te so sor 'brang ma chen mo la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas
262b4(rgyud 'grel): pa mchod par bya'o/ /me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ mar me dang/ dri bzangs dang/ gtor ma dang/ zhal zas la sogs pa rnams phul nas sdig pa so sor bshags pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ dge
262b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba dang/ bzod par gsol ba rnams bya'o/ /de nas tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya ste/ de la sdug bsngal ba rnams 'don par 'dod pa'i snying rje dang/ bde ba la rab tu dgong pa'i byams pa dang/ bde ba la gnas pa
262b6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis dga' ba dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi btang snyoms su bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad la yid kyis dmigs nas rnam par mi rtog ba rnam par bsgoms te/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes so/ /de nas hUM yig gis
262b7(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin du rdo rje'i gur dang/ rdo rje'i ra ba dang/ rdo rje'i bla bres kyang rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su sum yig yongs su gyur pa las ri bo mchog rab thar pa?
263a1(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i grong khyer du gyur pa me tog sna tshogs mngon par bkram pas so/ /de'i steng du hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje la paM yig yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs pad+ma ge sar dang bcas pa'i ze 'bru la/ de'i steng
263a2(rgyud 'grel): du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su praM yig las 'od zer yang dag par 'phro ba/ des ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid spyan drangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu byas nas sa bon yongs su gyur pa las 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sku mdog
263a3(rgyud 'grel): gi rnam pa can dang ro gcig tu gyur nas so sor 'brang ma chen mo sku mdog dkar mo lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can spyi bor zla ba'i gdan la mchod rten gyis brgyan pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs g.yas brkyang skyil krung phyed pas
263a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ rna brgyan g.yo bas mdzes shing do shal dang rkang gdub kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gdub dang dpung rgyan dang/ ska rags kyis mdzes shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma de'i
263a5(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang po ni sku mdog ltar dkar po/ g.yas nag po/ rgyab ser po/ g.yon dmar po'o/ /g.yas kyi phyag dang po na 'khor lo/ /gnyis pa na rdo rje/ gsum pa na mda'/ bzhi pa na ral gri/ g.yon gyi phyag dang po na rdo rje'i zhags pa/ gnyis pa na rtse gsum/ gsum pa na
263a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhu/ bzhi pa na dgra sta'o/ /byang chub kyi shing gis nye bar mdzes pa/ sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pas brgyan pa/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ khyab 'jug chen po dang/ dga' byed dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par
263a7(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za rnams kyis g.yas phyogs nas yang dag par bsnyen bkur byed pa/ dbang po dang/ gshin rje dang/ chu bdag dang/ rnam thos sras dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am chi dang/ lto
263b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams dang/ lha rnams kyis bstod pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi bag chags las skye ba'i rnam par smin pa rnams gcod par mdzad pa/ gsang sngags mchog gi phyag rgyas dug dang byad stem rnams 'joms
263b2(rgyud 'grel): shing phye mar mdzad pa/ zhe sdang rab tu sbyor ba'i mngon spyod kyis kyang gdug pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams rnam par 'joms par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams yang dag pa'i mchod pa
263b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis mngon par dga' ba rnams yongs su skyong bar mdzad pa/ theg pa chen po len pa dang/ yi ge 'dri ba dang/ klog pa dang/ 'chang pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ mngon par ldan pa rnams la yongs su skyong par mdzad pa de
263b4(rgyud 'grel): lta bur gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas dus rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par goms shing blta bar bya'o/ /de'i bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /so sor 'brang ma chen mo de'i
263b5(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs su ji ltar ba de bzhin du sngon ma'i sbyor bas lhag par byas te/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su hUM yig gi sa bon dang mtshan ma yongs su gyur pa las stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa/ sku mdog nag mo dbu skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa mi'i thong
263b6(rgyud 'grel): bas brgyan pa/ smin mtshams su khro gnyer bsdus shing zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'od zer 'phro ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la rol pa'i stabs kyis 'byung po chen po dang/ gnod sbyin chen po kun nas gnon pa/ phyag gdub dang/ dpung rgyan gyis
263b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan? pa/ do shal dang/ zhabs gdub kyis mdzes pa/ de'i phyag g.yas kyi dang po na mchog sbyin dang rdo rje/ gnyis pa na lcags kyu/ gsum pa na mda'/ bzhi pa na ral gri/ phyag g.yon gyi dang po na sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dang/ gnyis pa na dgra sta
264a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa na gzhu/ bzhi pa na pad+ma'i steng du rin po che cha drug pa'o/ /de'i rtsa ba'i zhal nag po/ g.yas dkar po/ rgyab ser po/ g.yon ljang gu thams cad spyan gsum gsum la/ sku la rin po che la sogs pa sna tshogs pas
264a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ pha rol gyi stobs chen po gnon pa/ stag mo'i cha lugs can/ n+ya gro d+ha'i shing ljon pa'i nye bar mdzes pa/ ma mo bdun la sogs pa'i lha mo skrag par mdzad pa/ nam gru la sogs pa'i gza' rnams 'joms par mdzad pa/
264a3(rgyud 'grel): nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu brgyad yang dag par skrag par mdzad pa/ rlung dang khris pa dang bad kan la sogs pa rnams sbyong bar mdzad pa/ drag po'i mun pa stug po'i sprin rnams sel bar mdzad pa/ 'chi bdag thams cad zad par
264a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o/ /de'i bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM a mri ta ba re ba ra ba ra pra ba ra bi shud+d+he hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i lho phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su maM yig gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las skad
264a5(rgyud 'grel): cig gis rma bya chen mo sku mdog ser mo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs g.yas brkyang ba'i sems dpa' i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
264a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i g.yas kyi phyag dang po na mchog sbyin/ gnyis pa na rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa/ gsum pa na 'khor lo/ bzhi pa na ral gri'o/ /g.yon gyi phyag dang po na lhung bzed kyi steng na dge slong/ gnyis pa na rma bya'i mdongs/ gsum pa na bum pa'i
264a7(rgyud 'grel): steng na sna tshogs rdo rje/ bzhi pa na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan no/ /de nas rtsa ba'i zhal ni ser po/ g.yas nag po/ g.yon dmar po'o/ /mya ngan med pa'i shing ljon pas nye bar mdzes pa'o/ /de'i logs na gnas pa bi she(rgyud 'grel): bdun gyis g.yogs pa/ drag po dang
264b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i ser skya la sogs pa'i srin po rnams 'joms par mdzad pa/ klu la sogs pa thams cad skrag par mdzad pa/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang bcas pa'i bza' la sogs
264b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ lha dang bcas pa'i lha ma yin rnams yang dag par rmongs par mdzad pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma de'i bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM a mri ta bi
264b3(rgyud 'grel): lo ki ni garb+ha saM rak+Sha Ni a karSha Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA zhes so/ /so sor 'brang ma de'i nub phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su maM yig gi sa bon yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma bsgom par bya ste/ sku mdog
264b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa phyag bcu gnyis gnyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba la g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa/ rin po che'i cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis mdzes shing lang tsho gzhon nu dang ldan pa/ do shal dang/ rkang gdub dang/ rna rgyan gyis
264b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ shI rI shA'i shing ljon pas nye bar mdzes pa/ de'i phyag dang po chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya/ gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya gsum pa mchog sbyin/ bzhi pa mi 'jigs pa/ lnga pa na rdo rje/ drug pa na mda'o/ /g.yon gyi gsum pa sdigs
264b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa/ bzhi pa na mda'/ lnga pa na rin po che'i dog pa/ drug pa na pad+mas mtshan pa'i chu skyes so/ /rtsa ba'i zhal dkar po/ g.yas nag po/ g.yon dmar po'o/ /me tog sna tshogs pa mngon par bkram pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad la
264b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis yang dag par mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang bcas pa'i lha'i tshogs rnams kyis yang dag par bstod pa/ me tog ma dang bcas pa'i rig 'dzin ma rnams kyis mchod pa'o/ /
265a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i bzlas pa'i sngags ni oM bi ma le bi pu le dza ya ba re a mri te baM ra dze hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA zhes so/ /de nas so sor 'brang ma de'i byang phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su traM yig gi sa bon
265a2(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i bsil ba'i tshal chen mo sku mdog ljang gu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa/ zhal gsum ma/ spyan gsum ma/ phyag drug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
265a3(rgyud 'grel): cing lha'i na bzas nye bar spras pa'o/ /de'i phyag dang po mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya/ gnyis pa na rdo rje/ gsum pa na mda'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub/ gnyis pa na gzhu/ gsum pa na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan no/ /rtsa ba'i zhal
265a4(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu /g.yas pa dkar po/ g.yon pa dmar po'o/ /tsam pa ka'i shing ljon pas nye bar mdzes pa/ 'dod lha dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing bstod pa/ 'phrog ma dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo rnams rnam par 'joms par mdzad pa
265a5(rgyud 'grel): bya rog dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya rgod dang/ khra dang/ ka po ra la sogs pa rnams 'joms shing 'ded par mdzad pa/ 'byung po dang/ yi dags dang/ sha za dang/ ro langs dang/ srin po la sogs pa dang bcas pa rnams yang dag par rmongs par mdzad pa'o//
265a6(rgyud 'grel): de'i bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ in+d+ri ya ba la bi sho d+ha ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ de bzhin du ji ltar gsungs pa'i maN+Dal rnam par bsgoms nas/ de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis khyab pa las rang rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od
265a7(rgyud 'grel): zer gyis khams gsum ma lus pa mngon par khyab nas de la de bzhin du yi ge la rab tu gzhug par bya'o/ /slar yang nam mkha' i mthongs su spros nas ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs nas yang dag par bstod cing gdan drangs pa rang gi dam tshig
265b1(rgyud 'grel): gi 'khor lo rab tu gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas gnyis su med cing ro gcig tu gyur par rnam par bsgoms la/ de'i 'od zer rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gdan drangs te yang dag par mchod nas dbang skur bar gsol ba btab nas bdag
265b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid la dbang bskur bar blta bar bya'o/ /mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ bdud rtsi myang ba sngon du 'gro bas mkhas pas bsgom par bya'o/ /mig la gti mug rdo rje so sor 'brang ma chen mo'o/ /rna ba la zhe sdang rdo rje stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa chen mo'o/ /sna la
265b3(rgyud 'grel): ser sna rdo rje rma bya chen mo'o/ /zhal la 'dod chags rdo rje gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa chen mo'o/ /reg bya la phrag dog rdo rje bsil ba'i tshal chen mo'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa rnams te/ phung po dang/
265b4(rgyud 'grel): khams dang/ skye mched kyi rang bzhin rnams la de bzhin du lha rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i khyad par shes par bya'o/ /de la de lta bu'i dam tshig tu gyur pas cho ga 'dis sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /gang gi sngags kyi yi ge brjod par bya ba de'i lha'i sbyor bas bsgrub
265b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'i ming spel nas zhi ba'i sems kyis rgyun mi 'chad bar bzlas par bya'o/ /rims dang/ dug dang/ de bzhin du nad dang/ g.yul la yang de bzhin du bya'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang? 'byung po dang/ rmugs byed dang/ gtsang po dang/ dgras rab tu 'tshe ba dang/ thog dang
265b6(rgyud 'grel): skar mda' ltung ba'i 'jigs pa rnams la ri dang/ nags dang lam dag tu? de'i sngags dran pas rtag tu bag tsha ba thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de la rig pa 'di bzhin du/ sems can kun la phan don phyir/ /sems can kun pa phan 'byung ba/ /gang dang gang
265b7(rgyud 'grel): gis gsol 'debs pa/ /de'i tshe ni 'phel ba'i rgyu/ bsrung ba lnga yi cho ga 'dis/ /bde legs 'byung ba bdag gis bri/ /sems can kun la phan don phyir/ /dge ba'i maN+Dal zlum po bri/ /sa phyogs gtsang zhing nyams dga' bar/ /ba yi tsa ba'i? bas nye bar byugs//
266a1(rgyud 'grel): bla re yis ni stod g.yogs shing/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gos rnams bcang/ /tsan dan khyad par can dag dang/ /dri bzangs dag gis kun nas byugs/ /sor mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi/ /maN+Dal zlum por bri bar bya/ /de nas rdul tshon dkar po
266a2(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /zhi ba'i las la rab tu bsngags/ /ze 'bru ge sar dang bcas pa'i/ /pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bya/ /bum pa lnga ni yang dag dgod/ /me tog phreng ba gos kyis mdzes/ /lo ma dag gis kha brgyan cing/ /gdugs dang ba dan yang dag ldan/ /bu ri dang ni chos
266a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyings dang/ /bris sku mdun du yang dag brkyang/ /me tog sbos dang dri dang ni/ /gtor ma zhal zas dbul bar bya/ /dur ba kun dang yang dag sbyor/ /me tog dkar po khyad 'phags rnams/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams lha rnams kyi/ /chog ji bzhin mchod par
266a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /zan dang bu ram me tog dkar/ /'o ma yi ni bye brag rnams/ /shar phyogs gnas su dgod byas nas/ /dri za rnams la gtor ma dbul/ /til nag dang ni chang gis bkang/ /sha dang nya sha sgog pa rnams/ /lho phyogs su ni yang dag dgod/ /gru la bum rnams
266a5(rgyud 'grel): la gtor ma dbul/ /bo ma zho dang 'o thug dang/ /ma dzo na yi bye brag rnams/ /nub kyi phyogs su yang dag dgong/ /gtor ma chen po klu la dbul/ /mon gre'u mud ga rgya sran dang/ /dza pu Ti dang bur chang rnams/ /byang gi phyogs su yang dag dgod/ /gnod sbyin rnams
266a6(rgyud 'grel): la gtor ma dbul/ /dbang ldan nas ni brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid klung gi spyod yul bar/ /nag po dmar po ser po dang/ /ljang gu'i me tog phreng ba sbyad/ /dbus su me tog phreng ba dkar/ /me tog sna tshogs khyad 'phags rnams/ /'o ma khrag gi kha phor rnams
266a7(rgyud 'grel): zho zan dri rnams de bzhin du/ /de bzhin dngos po ma lus rnams/ /ji ltar rigs pas mchod yon dbul/ /'bras bu rtsa ba ji snyed dang/ /la du mo da ka chang bu/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin chang bu sogs/ /ka ra 'o ma'i bye brag gis/ /gtor ma lho yi phyogs su
266b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhag /mtshan ma brgyad kyis rab mdzes pa/ /de bzhin du yang chos 'chad pa yi slob dpon dang/ /las kyi rdo rje de bzhin du/ /khrus byas gtsang ma'i gos bgo zhing/ /de bzhin stan yang gtsang mar 'dod/ /zhal ni shar du mngon phyogs nas/ /smra bcad nas ni rtag tu bklag/
266b2(rgyud 'grel): dge slong tshul khrims gtsang ma yi/ /bsod snyoms pa rnams mchog tu bsngags/ /sbyin bdag slob dpon gang zhig gis/ /yongs su dag par bklag par bya/ /lan cig la sogs brtsams nas ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs bklag /cho ga chad pa la sogs pas/ /bklags
266b3(rgyud 'grel): pas yang dag 'grub mi 'gyur/ /blo dang brtson 'grus phun tshogs pa/ /brtse bas sems can don brtson pas/ /de yis bde legs sgrub par ni/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs/ /kha zas dkar pos ston mo byas/ /sha yi bza' ba rnam par
266b4(rgyud 'grel): spang/ /bstan bcos kun las mthun par ni/ /kun la sha ni med byas la/ slob dpon byang du zhal phyogs pas/ /de la las ni yang dag brtsam/ /bsgom pa sngon du gsungs pa bzhin/ /lha rnams so so la dmigs nas/ /mchod cing bstod pa dang ldan pas/
266b5(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dkrol zhing de bzhin la/ /mdza' yas spyod yul sangs rgyas la ni phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bden pa gsungs mdzad sangs rgyas la ni phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bden pa la ni rab gnas rab tu rgyal gyur cig /'dod pa kun las grol zhing 'bras bu dang
266b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas shog /skyes bu dpa' ba phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /lha rnams kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dUr bA kun da yang dag sbyar/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni sngags kyis spel/ /lha
266b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kun ni mchod bya zhing/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du/ /sngags ni lan cig brjod nas ni/ /lan cig sbyor bas mchod par bya/ /khri phrag gcig gi las kyis ni/ /tshe ni kun tu 'phel bar rig/ gang dang gang gis gsol 'debs
267a1(rgyud 'grel): na/ /de yi maN+Dal bri bar bya/ /rgyal srid yul dang de bzhin grong/ /lhas dang skyes mos tshal de bzhin/ /mi ma yin pa bzhugs gyur pa'i/ /'chi nad dang ni mu ge rnams/ /de yi las kyis bsrung bar bya/ /shing rnams la yang lo 'bras
267a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung/ /las kyi sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /bya ba gang zhig bsgrub 'dod na/ /de nas bsrung ba'i cho ga yis/ /nges par bsrung bar byed par 'gyur/ /rlung dang mkhris pa las skyes nas/ /bad kan 'dus pa las gyur pa'i/ /ma lus pa yi nad rnams
267a3(rgyud 'grel): kun/ /rtag tu bde legs nyid du 'gyur klog dang kha ton sbyor ba yis/ /nges par bgegs rnams med par 'gyur/ /bsrung ba lnga yi cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzre sh+rI kha la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs/ rdo rje
267a4(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la hUM yig ljang gu'i yi ge las skyes pa'i rdo rje lcags sgrog ma zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa/ sngon po dang dkar po ni g.yas dang cig
267a5(rgyud 'grel): shos kyi zhal lo/ /zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum pa rdo rje dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog dang/ mda' rnams g.yas kyi phyag gsum na'o/ /sdigs mdzub dang/ zhags pa dang/ gzhu rnams ni g.yon gyi phyag gsum na'o/ /sku mdog ljang ser
267a6(rgyud 'grel): zhal cung zad bzhad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gdug pa can gyi sems can rnams 'dul ba'i bdag nyid du bsams la phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /de la lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcings te mtheb chung dang sdigs mdzub gnyis
267a7(rgyud 'grel): lcags sgrog gi rnam pa can du bcing bar bya ba ni rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o/ /oM badzra sh+rI khA le hUM phaT swAhA zhes pa ni bzlas pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra sh+rI kha la sA d+hA naM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje lcags
267b1(rgyud 'grel): sgrog gi sgrub thabs/ rdo rje lcags sgrog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid du bsgoms pa'i rjes la/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM yig ljang ser las skyes pa'i sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum pa phyag brgyad
267b2(rgyud 'grel): pa zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa/ g.yas ser skya la spyan ser skya dang ldan pa/ g.yon pa dmar zhing khro gnyer can mche ba gtsigs pa/ g.yas kyi phyag bzhi rnams su mi 'jigs pa dang/ rdo rje dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang/ mda' bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi
267b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi rnams su khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang/ sdigs mdzub dang/ zhags pa dang/ gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /rol ba'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ byi la'i pags pas stod g.yogs byas pa/ don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa/ dbu skra ser skya gyen du 'khyil bar bsams
267b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ oM badzra sh+rIM kha le hUM phaT swAhA zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /'di ni man ngag gi rim pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra sh+rI kha lA sA d+ha no pa yi ka /bod skad du/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub
267b5(rgyud 'grel): thabs kyi cho ga /'phags ma rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig sngags pas stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid do zhes de bzhin du brjod nas/ gzhan gang zhig rnams kyang 'dis chos rnams stong pa nyid kyi mthar?
267b6(rgyud 'grel): blta zhing phun sum tshogs par bskyed nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas ji srid sems can dang sems can gyis bsdus pa rnams yang dag par blangs nas bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par bya'o zhes/
267b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas snying gar sna tshogs chu skyes/ de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ de nas hUM yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i bdag nyid 'ching ba thams cad gcod pa/ gdug pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba sku mdog ljang gu /zhal gsum pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal
268a1(rgyud 'grel): ser skya la spyan ser skya zhal g.yon pa khro gnyer can dmar po mche ba gtsigs pa'o/ /zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa'o/ /phyag brgyad pa g.yas kyi phyag dang pos mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ gnyis pa na rdo rje/ gsum pa na rdo rje'i lcags sgrog/ bzhi pa na
268a2(rgyud 'grel): mda'/ g.yon gyi phyag dang po na thod pa khrag gis yongs su gang ba/ gnyis pa na sdigs mdzub/ gsum pa na zhags pa/ bzhi pa na gzhu'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sprin tshogs 'phro ba shin tu rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ byi la'i pags pas stod g.yogs byas pa'i
268a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje lcags sgrog ma bsgom par bya'o/ /skad cig gis byang chub kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan smos ci dgos/ oM badzra sh+rIM khe le hUM phaT swAhA zhes so/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ d+hwa dzwa gra kai yU ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad
268a4(rgyud 'grel): du/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngan song 'jigs pa kun 'joms pa'i/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan 'dud/ /de yi sgrub thabs dngos grub phyir/ /bdag gis dad pas bri bar bya/ /dang por re zhig
268a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas zhal bsang ba la sogs pa byas nas/ yid dang 'thun pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste/ mkhas pas byams pa la sogs pa'i yid dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i mchog bdud rnams 'joms shing g.yul las sgrol bar byed pa bsgom
268a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /oM tsan+t+rarka bi mA le swAhA zhes pa'i sngags brjod nas rang gi snying gar a yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba dang nyi ma yang dag par sbyor ba'i steng du d+hwaM yig ser po'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' i phyogs su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
268a7(rgyud 'grel): bltas nas yid kyi rang bzhin gyi me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba shud+d+ho haM zhes pa'i sngags brjod nas skad cig gis
268b1(rgyud 'grel): stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes pas nga rgyal bskyed nas sems can rnams gdon pa'i bsam pas gzugs brnyan bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma yang dag par sbyor ba'i steng du d+hwaM yig ser po'i 'od zer gyis mdza' yas
268b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i skus brgyan cing de'i rnam par rab tu zhugs nas slar log ste 'od zer gyi tshogs pas sa bon la rab tu zhugs par bsgom par bya'o/ /de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las g.yul las sgrol ba byed
268b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo yid du 'ong ba zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa/ khro zhing zhabs g.yon brkyang ba lto ba 'phyang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ dmar la zlum zhing mdzes pa/ na bza' sngon po mnabs pa/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo phyag g.yas na bsnams pa g.yon pa dag gis sdigs
268b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa nag po dang/ rdo rjes mtshan pa'i gtun shing dkar po bsnams pa/ sku'i phyogs g.yon du rtse gsum la 'khyud pa'o/ /zhal dang po ni ser po'o/ /g.yon pa ni dmar po'o/ /cig shos ni dkar po'o/ /steng du 'jigs shing bu ba'i mdog
268b5(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'o/ /ral pa dmar ser gyen du brdzes shing bcings pa thod pa lngas rgyan pa/ pad+ma dang nyi ma'i dbus su bzhugs shing brtan pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas nyi ma la gnas pa'i snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes sems
268b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' gdan drangs te yang dag par mchod par bya'o/ /dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa 'di rnams kyi yi ges dgug pa dang/ gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dbang du bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
268b7(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis bdag la dbang skur du gsol zhes so/ /de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rang gi thugs nas rnam par 'phros nas bdud rtsi lngas yongs su gang ba'i gser gyi bum pas phyag nas dbang bskur bzhin ba'i bdag nyid du
269a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o/ /de la dbang bskur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di'o/ /dbang bskur pa ni rdo rje che/ khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka
269a2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ya sh+rI ye A hUM swAhA/ de nas rab tu gang zhing yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bskyed la/ sngags bzlas nas rtag tu bde ba'i tshig gis mchog ster bar 'gyur ro/ /oM b+ha ga ba tI d+hwa dza gra kai yU re pa ra sai n+ya bi d+hwaM sa na ka ri swa
269a3(rgyud 'grel): se se n+ya pa ri pa la ni ul kA mu khi kha kha khA hi khA hi pa ra sai n+ya a nan+ta mu kha na a nan+ta b+hu dze na pra ha ra pra ha ra hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA snying po'i sngags so/ /oM sarba gra ha nak+She tra d+hya mi ka ra Ni swAhA nye ba'i snying po'o/ /phreng sngags ni gzungs las blta
269a4(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /langs pa'i dus su khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /ji ltar rjes 'jug dngos grub stsol/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'dir ni 'byon par zhu/ /zhes pa'i sngags 'dis gshegs nas gnas par bya'o zhes
269a5(rgyud 'grel): so/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chos kyi 'byung gnas blo gros zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya uSh+NI Sha bi dza yA sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma gtsug tor rnam
269a6(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal/ /dang por re zhig sngags pas kha bsang ba la sogs pa byas nas/ stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste/ tshad med pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /
269a7(rgyud 'grel): de'i rjes la rang gi snying gar a yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas/ de'i steng du b+h+ruM yig dkar po bltas la de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'gro ba rnams gsal bar mdzad nas mdun du sangs rgyas dang
269b1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsams nas mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa rnams bya'o/ /de nas oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes so/ /de nas slar yang rang gi snying gar zla ba la baM yig las skyes pa'i sna tshogs chu skyes
269b2(rgyud 'grel): bsams nas de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa'i b+h+ruM yig dkar po bltas la/ de yongs su gyur pa las gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma mchod rten gyi nang na bzhugs pa sku mdog dkar mo zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum gsum po/
269b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag brgyad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang zla ba la rdo rje skyil krung bcings nas bzhugs pa/ zhal dang po dkar po/ zhal g.yas pa ser po/ zhal g.yon pa sngon po/ mche bas ma mchu mnan pa/ g.yas kyi phyag
269b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi rnams su sna tshogs rdo rje dang/ chu skyes dmar po'i steng na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang/ mda' dang/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya rnams so/ /g.yon gyi phyag bzhi rnams su gzhu dang/ sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa
269b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang/ bum pa bzang po rnams so/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbus rgyan cing lha'i na bza' i stong g.yogs mnabs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ 'od zer dkar po'i phreng ba can du blta bar bya'o/ /de'i g.yas phyogs su
269b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas na rnga yab bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon phyogs su phyag na rdo rje sku mdog ut pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu phyag g.yon na ut pa la la gnas pa'i rdo rje bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas na rnga yab bsnams
269b7(rgyud 'grel): pa de dag bzhugs par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas shar dang lho dang nub dang byang phyogs rnams su mi g.yo ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang/ dbyug sngon can dang/ stobs po che rnams thams cad sku mdog sngon po phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhabs
270a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang bas stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs pa/ dbu skra gyan du brdzes pa/ klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pa sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa
270a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams su ral gri dang/ lcags kyu dang/ dbyug pa dang/ rdo rje bsnams pa bsgom par bya'o/ /steng gi phyogs su gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bdud rtsis bkang ba'i bum pa bsnams shing bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab bzhin pa bsam par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i bcom ldan
270a3(rgyud 'grel): 'das ma 'khor dang bcas pa bsam zhing dgod par bya'o/ /oM yig spyi bor ro/ /A(rgyud 'grel): yig ni mgrin pa la'o/ /hUM yig ni snying gar ro/ /trAM yig dpral ba la'o/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig lte ba la'o/ /aM A(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa dag la'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /thal mo yang
270a4(rgyud 'grel): dag par sbyar nas mdzub mo bkug nas mtheb chen dag dang sbyar ba legs pa sbyin par mdzad nas/ oM yig gsum dang bcas pa'i gzungs lan cig bzlas nas phyi nas 'dul pa'i phyag rgyas sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /oM b+h+ruM swAhA snying po'i sngags
270a5(rgyud 'grel): oM a mri ta a yur da de swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/ /oM a mri tA mri tobb+ha ba ya mri ta bi krAn+ta ya mri ta ga ta ya mri ta ga mi n+ya mi NA yur da de ga ga na kIrti ka re sarba kle sha k+Sha ya kA raM ye swAhA/ zhes pa ni phreng ba'i sngags so/ /'phags ma gtsug tor rnam
270a6(rgyud 'grel): par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ uSh+Ni Sha bi dza ya sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam gtan ma chags 'gro la
270a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyes/ /'gro mgon pad+ma la btud nas/ /rang nyid sgrub thabs dran bya'i phyir/ /rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs bshad/ /sa 'dzin la sogs yid 'ong ba'i/ /phyogs 'ga' zhig tu gnas nas ni/ /shin tu gzhon pa'i stan la 'dug/ rnal 'byor
270b1(rgyud 'grel): bsam bya bsam par bya sems can rnams kyi bde 'byung ba/ /de la b+h+ruM bcas 'od zer 'phro/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni gsal byas nas/ /dus gsum gshegs rnams mchod par bya/ mchod cing de rnams mdun du ni/ /lus sogs las skyes sdig pa rnams
270b2(rgyud 'grel): bgyid stsal dbye bas yang dag skyes/ /man ngag rig pas thams cad bshags/ /de las byung ba rnam par sbyang/ /dge ba kun la rjes yi rang/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song nas/ /spros pa dang bcas rim pa bzhin/ /man ngag gis ni brtan
270b3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /ji srid byang chub bar du bsgrub/ /brtse bas sems can rnams la dmigs/ /byang chub sems nyid bsgom par bya/ /mtshan med dmigs pa med pa yi/ /rang bzhin med pa mkha' dbyings bzhin/ /de la a yig las byung ba'i/ /chu skyes
270b4(rgyud 'grel): la gnas zla dkyil la/ /sa bon las byung lha mo ni/ /zhal gsum so sor spyan gsum pa/ /lang tsho gzhon zhing phun sum tshogs/ /sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gang/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//
270b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dang ldan na bza' ni/ /ston ka'i zla ba dang mtshungs pa/ /dzaM bu nA da'i gser mdog can/ /g.yas pa'i zhal ni zhi ba'o/ /dus mdza' me 'bar sprin bzhin 'phro/ /'jigs shing mi bzang g.yon pa'i zhal/ /phyag g.yas nyid kyi thugs kar ni/ /sna tshogs
270b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje yang dag bsnams/ /gnyis pa chu skyes steng gnas pa'i/ /sangs rgyas dang ni gsum par mnga' / /mchog sbyin phyag rgya bzhi pa'o/ /g.yon ni go rims ji bzhin du/ /sdigs mdzub dang bcas zhags par? dang/ /gzhu dang de bzhin mi 'jigs pa/ /bum
270b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gang ba bsnams pa ni/ /mchod rten nang bzhugs bsgom par bya/ /snying gar sa bon dang bcas pa'i/ /pad+ma bsam bya de steng bu/ /'od zer dkar po'i bra ba yis/ /bskul zhing gdan drangs nam mkha' la sangs rgyas sprin tshogs chen po dang/ byang chub sems
271a1(rgyud 'grel): dpa' mdza' dag 'khod/ /brtse chen bdag nyid de rnams dang/ /rang rgyud dus gsum 'khor bar bsams/ dbang bskur rab tu sbyin mdzad pa/ /'bad pas rtag tu bsam par bya/ /mchod rten nang bzhugs oM dang traM/ /A yig 'od rab tu 'gro
271a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM(rgyud 'grel): a A zhes pa'i/ /sa bon las skyes go rims bzhin/ /spyi bo dpral ba mgrin pa'i gnas/ snying kha lte ba rkang pa'i gnas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rnal 'byor bsam/ /ston ka'i zla 'od dang mtshungs pa//
271a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dag gi phreng ba 'phro/ /chu skyes rdo rje dag las byung/ /g.yas pa dag gis rnga yab bsnams/ /pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin pa dag/ de'i g.yas g.yon logs su'o/ /mdun du mi g.yo ba ni dgod/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po g.yas phyogs su/ /rgyab kyi phyogs su dbyug sngon can
271a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du stobs chen dgod par bya/ /ral gri lcags kyu dbyug pa dang/ rdo rje rnams ni phyag na bsnams/ /glog bcas rdo rje ltung bzhin pa'i/ dus mdza' i tshu 'dzin dang mtshungs pa/ /spyan ni so ga'i nyi 'od bzhin/ /gdug pa rnams kyi srog 'phrog byed/ /kun gyi
271a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas rnams na ni/ /sdigs mdzub dang bcas zhags pa bsnams/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyid dkyil bzhugs/ /sngags pas nyin dang mtshan mo ru/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di yis bsgom/ /rdo rje'i theg par rab zhugs
271a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /de'i myur du byang chub 'thob/ ces pa ni gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ /de wi ba su d+ha ra sA d+ha naM/ /bod skad du/ lha mo nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs/ lha mo nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon ma
271a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi mthar thug par bsgoms nas skad cig gis bdag nyid dzaM b+ha la'i skur bsams nas/ /rang gi snying khar zla ba'i dbus su/ baM yig gi sa bon las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma bsam par bya ste/ /
271b1(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog gser lta bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lo brgyad gnyis lon pa lta bu/ /phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin/ /g.yon pa rin po che'i phreng bar bsnams pa/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i mdun du dpal gyi nor/ /g.yas phyogs su nor ston ma/ /rgyab kyi
271b2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su dpal gyi nor zhal ma/ /g.yon phyogs su ni nor bu'i blo gros rten ma'o/ /de rnams kyang dang po'i sa bon gyis yi ge las rang gi btso mo dang mtshungs pa'i skur bsam par bya'o/ /de bzhin du bsdoms nas sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /oM ba su  d+ha ri Ni swAhA/ /oM sh+ri ba su swAhA/ oM sh+ri ba su mu khri swAhA/ oM ba su sh+ri ye swAhA/ /so so'i bdag nyid la ba'i lci ba'i maN+Dal gru bzhi pa khru gnyis pa'i tshad du byas nas thun mtshams gsum du me tog dri bzang pos stong phrag tu mchod par bya'o/ /
271b3(rgyud 'grel): zla ba drug tu bzlas pas yid kyi shing rta yongs su gang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar snying pa'i me tog sbyin bsreg 'bum phrag gsum byas pas dpal chen mor 'gyur ro/ /zhes so/ /nor? rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ bsu d+ha ra
271b4(rgyud 'grel): sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs lha mo nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas nor rgyun ma bsgoms par 'dod pas de'i tshe sngon ma bzhin du thams cad byas nas/ /'on kyang drug pa'i sa bon la zla ba phyed pa dang thig les brgyan pa'o/ /de
271b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa las nor rgyun ma sku mdog ser mo phyag g.yon na 'bru'i snyem dang rin po che sna tshogs pa'i char 'bab bzhin pa'i bum pa bsnams pa/ /phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa grogs
271b6(rgyud 'grel): ma'i 'khor gyis bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid de bzhin du nor rgyun ma zhes so/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings nas gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa gcig pa nor rgyun ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /oM ba su ni d+hA na k+She te swAhA// 
272a1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ma'i bris sku bkrams nas mchod pa byas te bsgoms par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ /nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ba su d+ha ra sA d+ha naM/
272a2(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs/ /nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i tshogs 'dir paM yig ser po yongs su gyur pa las sku mdog ser mo zhal gsum phyag gnyis pa lang tsho gzhon zhing rgyan dang na bza' rnam par
272a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa 'bras kyi snye ma dang rin po che'i char 'bab bzhin pa'i bum pa phyag g.yon na bsnams pa/ /phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ /dpag tu med pa'i grogs mo'i 'khor gyis bskor ba/ sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la
272a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyis dbu brgyan pa/ rang gi snying kha'i sa bon las skad cig gis bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur byas nas gung mo'i tshigs gsum pa bcag pa ni nor rgyun ma'i phyag
272a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya'o/ /de nas oM ba su d+ha ra rad na ni d+ha na kE te swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du kha su d+ha ra Ni u pa de sha(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ nor rgyun ma'i gzungs yi man ngag/ 'phags ma nor
272a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor rgyun ma'i bris sku 'am sku gzugs bkram nas/ mdun du tsan dan gyi maN+Dal gru bzhi pa byas nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bskyed nas mchod cing lag pa tsan dan gyis byugs te/ nor rgyun ma'i gzungs
272a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi po ti skud bas bcings nas mdun du chu'i snod bzhag nas nang du bcug ste/ sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis dmigs te/ dngos grub mngon par 'dod pas snying gar bzung ste nor rgyun ma'i bzungs bklag par bya'o//
272b1(rgyud 'grel): klog pa yang swAhA dang ldan pas sngags rnams kyis swAhA zhes pa'i sgra brjod pas na me tog dkar po dur ba dang bcas te ka ra dang 'bras dang chu'i snod du dbul bar bar bya'o/ /gos dang sa gtsang phyogs gtsang mar ji srid zla ba drug bkug cing chu'i nang
272b2(rgyud 'grel): du gshegs par bya'o/ /nor rgyun ma'i gzungs kyi man ngag rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra pA rA h+ri sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs/ /rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor pa snga bar langs nas zhal bsang ba la
272b3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa byas nas dam tshig gi ril bu zhal du bcug ste/ ri'i phug la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i gnas su sna sogs rdo rje'i stan la 'dug nas A la'i dbyangs lan gsum brjod pas bdag nyid rdo rje phag mor gyur nas de'i rnam pa can du 'gro
272b4(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad nges par byas te/ rang gi snying gar chu skyes dang nyi ma la paM yig dmar po bltas nas de las byung ba'i 'od zer dmar po bskal pa'i me lta bu'i shin tu mi zad pa 'og min gyi gnas su song nas rdo rje phag mo 'chad par gyur pa'i
272b5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog dang phyag mtshan dang ldan pa dang/ /bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs nas bzhugs te/ /snying kha nas phyung ba'i 'od zer gyi mchod pa rnams gyis yang dag par mchod
272b6(rgyud 'grel): nas de'i mdun du sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ dge ba yongs su bsngo ba dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa byas nas tshad med pa'i gnas bzhin bya bsgoms
272b7(rgyud 'grel): te/ de nas chos thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid du byas nas/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis don mngon du byas nas skad cig gis ? gnas pa'i skur gnas par bya'o/ /sngon gyi smon
273a1(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi dbang gis ting nge 'dzin las rnam par bzhengs nas nam mkha' la yaM raM baM laM yongs su gyur pa las gzhu'i dbyibs dang zur gsum dang zlum po dang sru bzhi rnams nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang ser po
273a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams te 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rnam steng nas steng du blta bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du suM yig las byung ba'i ri rab gru bzhi ba rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin cog brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa rnam par bsams nas/ de'i steng du oM laM me di
273a3(rgyud 'grel): nI badzri b+ha ba badzra banda hUM/ oM badzra prA kA rA hUM baM hUM/ oM badzra paM dza ra hUM yaM hUM/ oM badzra bi tA nA hUM khaM hUM/ oM sha ra dzA la trAM shaM traM/ oM badzra dzwa lAn larka hUM hUM hUM/ sngags 'di rnams kyis rdo rje'i sa gzhi la sogs pa'i rim pa drug go /bsgrub nas de'i nang
273a4(rgyud 'grel): du gru bzhi la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang rnam par bsams nas de'i dbus su yig dmar po las skyes pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'o/ /de'i ze 'bru la A lI kA li yongs su gyur pa las zla ba dang nyi
273a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yang dag par sbyor ba 'od dmar ba rdo rje'i nang du song ba las baM yig dmar po'i rang bzhin 'od rang tu gsal bar blta bar bya'o/ /de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo se 'bru'i me tog lta bu phyag
273a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje'i sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ g.yon na thod pa dang kha twAM bsnams pa/ zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa/ phyogs kyi gos can/ ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' 
273a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rang bzhin can/ zhabs g.yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan mnan pa/ mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng bas sku la brgyan pa/ /brag 'dzag bzhin pa 'thung ba bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma bzhin nams lo go rims
273b1(rgyud 'grel): ji lta ba bzhin du g.yon bskor du mkha' 'gro ma dang/ lA ma dang/ dum skyes ma dang/ gzugs can rnams nag mo dang/ ljang gu dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar mo rnams te/ de rnams zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa'o/ /phyag g.yon na kha TwAM ga dang/ thod
273b2(rgyud 'grel): ba bsnams pa/ g.yas na DA ma ru dang/ gi gug bsnams pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra grol ba/ gcer bu zhabs g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa bsgom par bya'o/ /'tshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi rnams la byang chub kyi sems
273b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas gang ba'i thong ba rnams bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i rjes la snying ga'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo dza(rgyud 'grel): yig gis gdan drangs nas/ hUM yig gis rang dam tshig gi 'khor lo la chu
273b4(rgyud 'grel): la chu bzhin du gzhug par bya'o/ /baM yig gis bcings nas/ d+hyo(rgyud 'grel): yig gis mnyes par bya'o/ /de nas oM ba b+h+ruM hUM khaM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM ha(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i yi ge rnams kyis skye mched rnams sbyang bar bya'o/ /lha mo drug gi dag pa dang/ sngags kyi rkang pa rnams kyis
273b5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ma'i go char bya'o/ /oM paM lte ba la'o/ /oM hUM oM thugs la'o/ /h+rI moM zhal la'o/ /h+rAM h+rAM dbu la'o/ /hUM hUM spyi bo la'o/ /phaT phaT sku thams cad la na bzar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku gsung thugs rnams la go rims ji
273b6(rgyud 'grel): lta ba bzhin du oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa rnams dgong ngo/ /bsgoms pas ngal na sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de la sngags ni oM badzra baM ro tsa ni ye hUM hUM phaT swAhA zhes so/ /thun mtshams gsum du gtor ma sngon du 'gro bas bcom ldan 'das ma bsgom
273b7(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /spyod lam thams cad la bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku gzugs kyis gnas par bya'o/ zhes so/ /rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po a ba d+hU ti pa dpal ldan gnyis med rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/ //
274a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA lo ka sA d+ha naM bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi snang ba sgrub pa'i cho ga/ rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo mkhan sreg mkhas smra ba ngan pa'i phyogs 'jig cing/ /dug 'joms skye bo'i cho gas rnams thabs
274a2(rgyud 'grel): la bde bar skyong/ /rab zhi bde ba 'phel mdzod rdo rje phag mo la/ /koM ka byin ni phyag 'tshal lha mo'i tshogs la bri/ /de la mtshan mo nam phyed kyi thun gyi lhag ma la cho ga bzhin du de langs nas dur khrod la sogs pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas
274a3(rgyud 'grel): 'ga' zhig tu tsan dan bzang po la sogs pas byugs te me tog sna tshogs pas bcal du bkram pas nye bar mdzes pa la/ mngon sum du ro'i gdan nas yang na ji lta ba'i stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste/ byams pa la sogs pa bsgom pa
274a4(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro bas rang gi snying gar a yig las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig dkar po las skyes pa'i 'od zer gyis dra bas rab tu gsal bar mdzad nas/ rdo rje phag mo la sogs pa bla ma dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang/ byang chub
274a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mdun du mngon sum du yang dag par bltas nas snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo dang/ drag mig ma dang/ 'od ldan ma dang/ sna chen ma dang/ dpa' bo'i blo gros ma
274a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mi'u h+rung ma dang/ ? dbang phyug ma dang/ shing sgrib ma ste/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad po rnams/ /sa srungs ma dang/ 'jigs byed chen mo dang/ rlung shugs ma dang/ chang 'thung ma dang/ lha mo sngo bsangs ma dang/ shin tu
274a7(rgyud 'grel): bzang mo dang/ rta snam dang/ bya gdong ma ste gsung ga 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad po rnams dang/ 'khor lo'i shugs can ma dang/ dum skyes ye dang/ chang 'tshong ma dang/ 'khor lo'i go cha ma dang/ shin tu dpa' mo dang/ stobs chen ma dang/ 'khor los
274b1(rgyud 'grel): sgyur ma dang/ brtson 'grus chen mo ste/ sku yi 'khor lo'i lha mo brgyad po rnams te/ nag mo dang dmar po dang dkar po'i kha dog rnams so/ /mi bskyod par dang/ 'od dpag med dang rnam par snang mdzad rnams kyis dbu rgyan pa zla ba'i gdan la
274b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang/ pad+ma dang/ 'khor lo dang thod pa'i phreng ba dang/ zur phud gsum gyis dbu ma rgyan pa/ gri gug dang/ thod pa dang/ kha DwI ga dang/ lag pa'i 'dab mas mchod pa thogs pa rnams kyi mchod
274b3(rgyud 'grel): yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod nas phyag 'tshal ba dang/ sdig bshags pa dang/ phyin chad med byed pa'i sdom pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ lam bstan pa dang
274b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid dbul ba dang/ sku ma 'debs pa dang/ gsol ba 'debs pa rnams chog bzhin du bsgrub nas bsod nams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrubs la spyi bor tha ma mo yang dag par sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa sngon du
274b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la skul ma gdab bar bya'o/ /de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di'o/ /oM de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sngags/ /sems can kun gyi dngos grub kun/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun 'byung bar/ /de bzhin gshegs
274b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams bzhugs su gsol/ /oM swa b+ha shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba d+harma(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA ba shud d+ha ha zhes so/ /de'i rjes la mchod par bya ba dang/ mchod pa dang mchod par byed ba po'i chos thams cad kyang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i rnam pas
274b7(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam gyi rkyen bzhin du bdag nyid so sor rig pas lhag par grol bar bya'o/ /snying ga'i sngags kyi 'od zer gyi dra bas rang bzhin med par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dzra(rgyud 'grel): na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka haM zhes pa'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /de nas rang gi sems pa yig
275a1(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'i tshul gyis yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma dmar po'i steng du aM yig las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM yig dkar po las nyi ma dang/ zla ba la gnas pa'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dkar pos byin gyis brlab pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga
275a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dmar po bsgom par bya'o/ /spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon du 'gro zhing de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid rdo rje phag mo bcu drug gi rnam pa ston ka'i zla ltar dkar ba la spyan gsum dmar zing zlum pa/ cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' la
275a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i me tog gos rnam par mdzes pa/ sbu skra grol ba phyed bcings pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rdo rje nag po'i phreng ba gnyis kyi dbus su thang ba'i phreng ba dang ? bud gsum bcings pa/ 'khor lo dang rna rgyan dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub?
275a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ ska rags kyis brgyan pa/ 'gying bzhin pa'i ba dan gsum 'bar pa/ phyag g.yas kyi 'dab ma na gnas pa/ sngon du gsungs pa'i rdo rjes skyes bu'i ye shes pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par 'joms pa/ phyag g.yon pa na dbyug pa dkar po steng gi
275a5(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo na rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa/ 'og tu mi mgo skam po dang/ mgo bo rlon pa dang sna tshogs rdo rje gser gyis bum pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba sgra dang bcas pa'i dril bu g.yer ga phra mos brgyan pa da dan sna tshogs pas rnam par mdzes pa'i dbyug?
275a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dpung la reg pa'i kha TAM ga dang/ bdung bzhi yi khrag gis gang pa'i pad+ma'i snod bsnams pa/ khrag 'jig pa zin pa'i mgo bo rlon pa lnga bcu'i phreng ba mgul du 'phyang ba/ pad+ma dmar po'i steng du nyi ma la gnas pa'i shes pa mang ba'i
275a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu zhabs g.yas brkyang gis bzhugs pa/ gcer bu rab tu gtum pa nyi ma'i 'di lta bu rab tu 'phro ba'i ba spu'i phreng ba can/ gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa/ sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dgu dang ldan pa/ sprul pa sna tshogs pas
275b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ gzhan nyi ma la gnas pa'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig gis byin gyis brlab pa/ nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje snying po la bdag nyid rdo rje phag mor bsgom par bya'o/ /de las snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyi dra bas sems can thams cad de'i gzugs su

275b3(rgyud 'grel): ni phreng ba'i rnam par dkar po 'khor lo 'khor bzhin pa bzhin du sbyor bas zhal gyi sgo nas 'thon te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi tshogs dang/ nor bu dang/ sngags dang/ /sman dang/ zla ba dang/ skar ma dang/ ri mo dang/ bstan bcos dang/ sgyu

275b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i ye shes pa'i lha mo mdun du bltas te/ sngon du gsungs pa'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyi mchod yon la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas mchod nas pheM yig gi sngags brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dpral bar

277a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /rgol ba por yang 'gyur ro/ /rims dang/ ngan thabs dang/ dug dang/ mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams kyis bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro/ /gang thos pa de thams cad kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro/ 'di'i sngags bzlas pas

279a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ /'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen mo'i bklags pas 'grub pa'i sgrub thabs so/ /zla ba gzas gzung ba 'am/ nyi ma gzas gzung ba mthong nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bklag par bya'o/ /de nas dngos

279a4(rgyud 'grel): rma bya'i sgro la lan cig bzlas nas nam mkha' la bskor na slar yang zhi bar byed do/ /ka ra la lan cig bzlas nas phyogs bzhir gtor na dpung tshogs yan lag bzhir mthong bar byed do/ /rma bya'i sgros phyir bzlog nas bskor na slar yang
279a5(rgyud 'grel): med par byed par 'gyur ro/ /nga ni sgyu ma chen mo'i dur khrod brjod par bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi cha la dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa po rjes 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i dur khrod do/ /byang du gnyis su med par byed pa'o/ /nub tu khro ba'i gdong ngo/ /lho ru
279a6(rgyud 'grel): mun pa mi bzad pa'o/ /me ru 'jigs pa chen po'o/ /bden bral du rnal 'byor mang po'i 'dus pa chen po'o/ /rlung du seng ge'i sgra phags chen po sgrog pa'o/ /dbang ldan du chu skyes sa bon zhes bya ba'i dur khrod rnams so/ /'di rnams su ji lta ba

279b1(rgyud 'grel): a mra dang/ shi rI Sha dang/ u dum ba ra dang/ a shwadtha dang/ nA ga ge sar gyi shing rnams so/ /go rims bzhin du ma he dang/ byi la dang/ dom dang/ stag dang/ bya rgod dang/ phag dang/ sha za'i gdod pa can rdzu 'phrul chen po'i gnod sbyin rnams so/ /kun nas dur

280a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan mo gtor ma dang yo byas lnga sbyin par bya'o/ /gang 'ga' zhig tuAng smra bar mi bya ste rdo rje rnal 'byor mas 'dir byin gyis rlob par the tshom med do/ /dpal ldan rdo rje phag mo'i
280a2(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa don thams cad sgrub pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ mai tra ye sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ byams pa'i sgrub thabs mgon po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho ga 'dis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du

280b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i g.yon pas nA ga ge sar gyi me tog gi snye ma bsnams pa'o/ /lha'i rgyan dang na bzas sku la rnam par mdzes pa'i bdag nyid mngon du byas te phyag rgya bcings par bya'o/ /de la lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcings te sdigs mdzub dag mtheb

280b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i phyi'i khor yug cung zad ser ba'i 'od zer gyis tshogs mgo'i steng du 'phro ba'o/ /de las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i 'og tu rtse mo bzhi pa stong rtse lnga pa sbyar ba las rtse mo dgu ste/ gsung rab yan lag dgu'i rnam par dag pa'o/ /gzhan las steng dang
280b7(rgyud 'grel): 'og gi rtse mo gcig tu byas nas dbus kyi rtse mo dang dgu'o/ /hUM yig bzhin du kha dog dang byang ba dang chang ba'i nang du zla ba la gnas pa'i de dang 'dra ba'i hUM dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ste/ de nas yi ge dang rdo rje dag las 'od zer 'phros

281b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'jog po dmar pos snyam dkris pa/ pad+ma chen po pad+ma'i rtsa ba lta bu dkar pos do shal mdzad pa/ dur pa'i mdog lta bu'i mdza' yas kyis mchod phyir thogs mdzad pa/ /nor rgyas dkar pos ske rags mdzad pa/ pad+ma kun de ltar shin tu

283a1(rgyud 'grel): mo dang/ sbas ma dang/ lha mo dbyangs can ma zhes te gnod sbyin ma 'di rnams bsam par bya'o/ /nor rgyun ma ni dzam b+ha la dang lhan cig tu'o/ /gnod sbyin mo thams cad ni nor rgyun ma ji lta ba bzhin no/ /gnod sbyin rnams
283a2(rgyud 'grel): dzam b+ha la bzhin to de bzhin du bsams nas sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de la gnod sbyin gyi sngags ni oM dzam b+ha la dza lin drA ya swAhA/ oM tsa ren trA ya swAhA/ de nma ni b+h drA ya swAhA/ oM pur Na b+ha tra yE swAhA/ oM d+ha na dA ya swAhA/ oM bai sha ba Na ya swAhA/ oM ka li nA
