283b6(rgyud 'grel): rin po che chen po la sogs pa'i char rab tu 'bebs bzhin pa rang gi khang pa'i gnas kyi phyogs gcig tu bsam par bya'o/ /mgon po dzam b+ha la sku mdog ser po ud pa/ la'i phreng ba bsnams pa'o/ /de thams cad kyang gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyi b+ha ga'i
283b7(rgyud 'grel): dbus su gnas pa/ rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs bzhin pa dzam b+ha la dang 'dra ba bsgoms par bya'o/ /shar sgor nor sbyin dang/ nor sbyin chen po dang/ lho sgor gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin chen po'o/ /nub sgor ki li mA li dang/ ki li mA li chen po dang
284a1(rgyud 'grel): byang sgor gang ba bzang po dang/ gang ba bzang po chen po dang/ de thams cad kyang gtser bu 'bras bu 'phyang ba/ lto ba 'phyang zhing rin po che'i char rab tu 'bebs pa'o/ /de nas spyi bor nor bu bzang po'o/ /mig gnyis la rnam sras so/ /kha
284a2(rgyud 'grel): la mu kha na dra'o/ /nu ma'i bar du gang ba bzang po'o/ /lte ba la nor sbyin no/ /brla ngag la ki li mA li dang/ ki li mI li dag go /tsi pi kun Da li rkang pa dag la'o zhes pa'i lha rnams bkod nas yi ge rnams dgong par bya'o/ /oM ni spyi bor ro/ /dzlam? ni dpral dur
284a3(rgyud 'grel): ro/ tsum ni rna ba dag la'o/ /mgo bo'i rgyab tu swAhA'o/ /'khrig mgul du tsa lu mo/ /lag pa dbus su sru mo/ sor mo thams cad la oM dzam b+ha la dza len tra ya swAhA/ oM dzlum tslum swAhA zhes pa'i sngags so/ /de bzhin du mdzub mo la nor bu bzang po'o/ /gung mo la
284a4(rgyud 'grel): gang ba bzang po'o/ /ming med la nor sbyin no/ /mthe'u chung la rnam thos sras so/ /bi tsi kuN Da li naM mtheb chen la'o/ /khrig 'tshams su ki li mA li'o/ yi ge 'di rnams lag pa la bkod nas snga bar rdo rje'i tshul sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga ste/ de'i ngo bo
284a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa yang rdo rje'i chu tsam dang bsras te khyor bas mthungs nas lag pas chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /thun mtshams su gsum gyis yun mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /oM dzlum tslum sluM saM zhes brjod nas chu khyor pas sbyin
284a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o/ /gal te de bzhin du byas pas ma grub na dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms nas dzam b+ha lI gzugs la dug dang skyes tshe dang tshwa dang myos byed kyi lo ma'i khu ba dang dur khrod kyi sol bas byugs te dur khrod kyi me
284a7(rgyud 'grel): la khros pa bsros na nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes so/ /dzam b+ha la'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI dzam b+ha la sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ dpa' dzam b+ha la'i sgrub thabs/ dpal dzam b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong
284b1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid bsgom pa'i rjes la nyi ma la dzam las ser po zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa mi bskyod pa dang ral pa'i cod pan can/ phyag g.yas pa gsum na ma tu lung ga dang/ lcags kyu dang/ mda' bsnams pa g.yon gyi phyag dang po gcig gis
284b2(rgyud 'grel): rtsib logs g.yon du gnas pa'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa/ phyag g.yon pa dag gis zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sre mo dang/ gzhu bkad ba'i bdag nyid du bskyed la/ mdun du de'i sku bsam shing lhag par gnas nas de'i spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
284b3(rgyud 'grel): po bsams nas de la rab tu bzhugs shing dbang bskur nas rdo rje'i chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad blud par bya'o/ /oM dza ma b+ha la dza len drA ye swAhA/ zhes pa ni sngags so/ /bar gyi man ngag dzam b+ha la'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
284b4(rgyud 'grel): saM k+Shi pa ta sh+rI dzam b+ha la sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal dzam b+ha la'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus la/ dpal dzam b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'di snying khar zla ba'i dbus su sa bon gsum pa'i gsum pa kha dog
284b5(rgyud 'grel): ser po stong pa'i lhas mnan pa zla ba phyed pas dbu brgyan pa/ de nyid rdzogs pa'i las dpal dzam b+ha la sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas na bi dza pU ra ba phyag g.yon na rin po che'i tshar rab tu 'bebs bzhin pa'i ne'u le bsnams
284b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ zhabs gnyis kyis dung gi mgo dang pad+ma'i mgo'i gter chen po dag mnan pa/ ud pal sngon po'i phreng ba bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i dzam b+ha la'i skur bdag nyid bsgoms par bya'o//
284b7(rgyud 'grel): rang gi khyim du yang rin po che la sogs pa char 'bab bzhin par rab tu 'jug pa'i bdag nyid bsam par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings par bya ste/ lag pa gnyis khu chur bcings te gung mo dag gis dbus ma'i tshigs gsum pa bkug pa ni
285a1(rgyud 'grel): dzam b+ha la'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o/ /oM dzam b+ha la dza len drA ye swAhA/ /sngags 'dis rje btsun la chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /phyi nas mchod pa byas te sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas dngos grub ni sbyin
285a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag chen por gyur te the tshom med do/ /dpal dzam b+ha la'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa slob dpon chen po tsan drA go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ saM k+Shi pa ta dzam b+ha la sA d+ha na/ bod skad du/ dzam b+ha la'i sgrub
285a3(rgyud 'grel): thabs mdor bsdus pa/ bcom ldan 'das dzam b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas snying khar sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la dzaM yig las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa yang dag par mchod nas sdig pa
285a4(rgyud 'grel): bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas dus phyis stong pa nyid mngon du byas te/ de la de bzhin du gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma dang zla ba la dzam las byung ba'i sa bon gyis gang ba sa bon gyi sems can snying po can de'i 'od zer gyis sems
285a5(rgyud 'grel): can dpag tu med pa'i don sna tshogs pa mdzad nas/ de yongs su gyur pa las dzaM b+ha la gser gyi mdog lta bu sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ mdzes pa'i gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ /zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas na ba'i
285a6(rgyud 'grel): dza pU ra ka bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon na kha nas rin po che sna tshogs sgyugs pa'i ne'u le bsnams pa/ /ud pal sngon po'i phreng ba bsnams pa/ logs gnyis na rin po che'i snye ma'i char 'bebs pa'i gnod sbyin gnyis gnas pa/ zhabs
285a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'og na gnas pa'i rin po che'i bum pa dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i bdag nyid du rab tu rnam par bsam mo/ /oM dzaM b+ha la dza len trA ye swAhA zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings
285b1(rgyud 'grel): te gung mo'i dbus su tshigs gsum pa bcag pa'i phyag rgyas snying kha dang/ mgrin pa dang/ spyi bo dang/ mdzod spu rnams su sbyin par bya'o/ /snga bar yang de bzhin du skad cig gis bsgoms nas 'dis chu snyim pa brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o/ /oM dzam b+ha
285b2(rgyud 'grel): la dza len tra d+ha naM me de hi da da dA pa ya swAhA/ dzam b+ha la'i sgrubs thabs mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI dzam b+ha la sA d+ha naM bi sta ra/ bod skad du/ dpal dzam b+ha la'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa/ dpal dzam b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por
285b3(rgyud 'grel): re shig gnas kyi don thams cad rang gi lus kyang stong par bsgoms te/ de'i rjes la cung zad dmar ba'i dkyil 'khor la thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin de nyid gnod sbyin gyi shing rta gru gsum pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i rnam pa'o/ /de'i dbus su
285b4(rgyud 'grel): bam yig las nor rgyun ma sku mdog ser mo phyag na 'bras kyi snyim dang mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba 'di lta ste/ bzang mo dang/ rab tu bzang mo dang/ spas ma dang/ rab tu spas pa dang/ lha
285b5(rgyud 'grel): mo dang/ dbyangs can ma dang/ 'phags ma dang chu shel rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba lha mo chen mo de'i b+ha ga'i dbus su dzam gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ phyag g.yas na bI dza pU ra ka bsnams pa/ g.yon na ne'u le bsnams pa/ de bzhin
285b6(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa lngas rin po che sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs bzhin pa/ dung can gyi mgo dang/ pad+ma chen pos mgo'i gter chen po la zhabs gnyis bzhugs pa/ rin po che la sogs pa'i char 'bab bzhin pa rang gi khang pa'i phyogs gcig tu bsam par
285b7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /sku mdog ser po ud pa la sngon po'i phreng ba bsnams pa/ dpal ldan mgon po dzam b+ha la nor rgyun ma la 'khyud pa byang chub sems kyi thig le las skyes pa'i rin po che'i tshogs kyis nam mkha' ma lus pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /'bab
286a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dus su shar phyogs su gang ba bzang po kha dog sngon po'o/ /lho phyogs su rnam thos sras kha dog ser po'o/ /nub phyogs su nor sbyin kha dog dmar po'o/ /byang phyogs su nor bu bzang po kha dog ser po'o/ /me'i phyogs su tsi bi kuN Da li kha dog
286a2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po'o/ /bden bral du ki li mA li sngon po'o/ /rlung du spyod pa'i dbang po ser po'o/ /dbang ldan du kha'i dbang po ser po'o/ /de thams cad kyang gnod sbyin mo'i b+ha ga'i dbus na gnas pa rin po che'i char 'bebs bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /shar sgor
286a3(rgyud 'grel): nor sbyin chen po dang/ gtser bu 'bras bu 'phyang ba rin po che'i char 'babs pa'o/ /lho sgor pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po dag go /nub sgor ki li dang/ ma hA ki li dag go /byang sgor gang ba bzang po dang/ gang ba bzang po chen po dag go /de rnams kyang /tser
286a4(rgyud 'grel): bu 'bras 'phyang ba'o/ /mgon po dzam b+ha la go rims bzhin du sngags kyi yi ge rnams dgod par bya'o/ /oM ni spyi bor ru'o/ /dzam ni zhal 'o/ /b+ha la dag phyag gnyis la'o/ /dza thugs dkar ro/ /len lta ba la'o/ tra ye brla gnyis la'o/ /swAhA lus
286a5(rgyud 'grel): mo gnyis la'o/ /spyi bor nor bu bzang po'o/ /spyan gnyis la rnam thos sras so/ /de bzhin du kha la mu khen dra yang dag par gnas so/ /nu ma'i bar du bzang po'o/ /lte bar gnod sbyin nor sbyin no/ /brla gnyis la ke li ma li'o/ /rkang pa dag la tsa bi
286a6(rgyud 'grel): kuN Da li'o/ /yan lag thams cad la tsa ren dra'o/ /de bzhin du mgon po dzam b+ha la'i bdag nyid bsgoms la/ de ni yi ga dgod par bya ste/ oM spyi bor ru'o/ /dzlum dpral bar ro/ /tslum rna ba dag la'o/ /saM mgo bo'i rgyab tu rnam par dgod par bya'o/
286a7(rgyud 'grel): da ni lag pa dgod pa brjod par bya ste/ lha rnams kyi yi ges oM 'khrigs mgul du/ dzlum lag pa'i dbus su/ tslum sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mo'o/ /sa(rgyud 'grel): sor mo thams cad kyi tsa ba la'o/ /oM dzam b+ha la dza len trA ye swAhA zhes pas rab tu
286b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas par bya'o/ /mdzub mo nor bu bzang po'o/ /ming med nor sbyin/ mtheb chen rtsam thos sras/ de bzhin du kha'i dbang po lag pa'i logs su/ 'khrigs mgul du ke li mA li/ mtheb chen la tsi li kuN Da li/ /mdzub mo dang mtheb chen gyi bar du tsa ran tra'o/ /lag pa'i
286b2(rgyud 'grel): dbus su dzam b+ha la dza len tra'o/ /rdo rje'i chu la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga de'i ngo bo ma yin kyang rdo rje'i chu dang chu bsres nas khyor bas 'thungs te chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad thun mtshams gsum du dbul bar bya'o/ ring po mi thogs par dzam b+ha la dang 'dra bar
286b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /nor dang gser 'phel zhing sa gzhi rdzas kyis yongs su gang bar byed do/ /oM dzlum tslum sa(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing chu khyor bas dbul bar bya'o/ /grub par ma gyur na dpal rdo rje hUM mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms la dzam b+ha la'i sku gzugs la
286b4(rgyud 'grel): dug dang/ skye che dang/ nim pa'i lo ma dang/ da tu ra dang/ dur khrod kyi sol bas rab tu byugs la bsro zhing bskam par bya'o/ /phyi nas dur khrod kyi me la khros pas bdugs na nges par 'grub po/ /dpal dzam b+ha la'i sgrub thabs rgyas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad
286b5(rgyud 'grel): du/ d+ha ra dzam b+ha lo pa de sha/ bod skad du/ dzaM b+ha la la chu rgyun dbul ba'i man ngag /dpal ldan dzam b+ha la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ming med kyi rtse mo la ram yig ser po bsams la phyag rgya la sogs pas snod la dzam b+ha la bsgoms nas/ ming med kyi
286b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba la chu rgyun lag pa'i bar lhung pa'i de'i khu la de bzhin du 'bab cing dzam yig brgya rtsa brgyad/ bzlas la rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /dzam b+ha la la chu rgyun du dbul ba'i man ngag go /lag pa g.yas pa la brum/ dang po'i lnga pa'i sa bon yongs su gyur ba las de
286b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsams nas/ de la yang zla ba dang lhan cig tu khu ba byas te mdun du dzam las rab tu grags pa bskyed nas sngon du gsungs pa'i khu bas de'i spyi bor chu dang lhan cig tu brgya rtsa brgyad mdzub mo brgyad pa'i bar du'o/ /khu tshur phyed
287a1(rgyud 'grel): bcing ba'i lag pas chu khyor ba lhungs pas ma lus pa'i phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /dzam b+ha la'i man ngag go /rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad zhes grags rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ de bzhin 'od dpag med dang don yod grub
287a2(rgyud 'grel): pa mi bskyod grags/ /'di rnams sku mdog dkar ser dmar dang ljang khu sngon po rnams/ byang chub mchog dang mchog sbyin bsam gtan mi 'jigs bsam gtan sa gnon phyag /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sa bon ni oM aM dzrim?
287a3(rgyud 'grel): kham hUM zhes so/ /zla ba lag pa g.yas pa yis/ /yi ge lnga las byung ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsam nas/ /khu ba yi gzugs su rnam par bsgom/ /dzam las byung ba'i dzam b+ha la/ /bsams nas chu khyor gus pas dbul/ /de'i sngags ni
287a4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa yis/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni dbul bar bya/ /dzam b+ha la la chu rgyun dbul ba'i man ngag rdzogs so// // !/ (/lha so so'i sgrub thabs rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ ta ya grI ba sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ dpal
287a5(rgyud 'grel): rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs/ dpal rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas sna tshogs chu skyes dang nyi ma la haM yig dmar po'i ye shes rdzogs pa las rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po zhal gsum pa phyag brgyad pa/ zhal
287a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa la spyan gsum pa sngon po dang dkar po ni g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal lo/ /sbrul gyis brgyan pa zhabs rol stabs kyis bzhugs shing/ khro bo'i lta stangs kyis gzigs pa/ zhal dang po bzhad pa/ zhal g.yas pas ljags
287a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgril ba/ zhal g.yon pa'i mche ba dag gis ma mchu bsdams pa'o/ /stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can no/ /rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang mda''phyar ba ni g.yas kyi phyag bzhi na'o/ /sdigs mdzub dang rang gi nu
287b1(rgyud 'grel): ma bzung ba dang pad+ma dang/ /gzhu 'phyar ba ni g.yon gyi phyag bzhi na'o/ /mi bskyod pas dbu rgyan pa bsam par bya'o/ /zhes pa ni rta mchog gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin no/ /bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM haM ha ya grI ba swAhA/ rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
287b2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sabta sa ti ka kalpa ka kalpa ha ya grI ba sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rtog pa bdun brgya pa las gsungs pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs/ dpal rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos po thams
287b3(rgyud 'grel): cad rang bzhin gyis mi gnas pa zhes pa ni bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs par rig par byas nas/ de nas ri rab yan lag brgyad pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin la de'i dbus su dpag tshad stong gi tshad kyi gdan la nye bar
287b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dug ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlabs la/ de yis de bzhin du nam mkha' khyab pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la mngon par khyab par ba sprul nas/ de la de bzhin du hUM
287b5(rgyud 'grel): yig 'bar ba las 'od zer gyi rnam par bsam zhing/ de nas lus ngag yid thams cad rdo rje rnams kyis phyag 'tshal bas/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa 'dis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan
287b6(rgyud 'grel): drangs nas ye shes kyi rnam pas rab tu zhugs te/ slar yang hUM yig gnyis pas rta mgrin yang dag par bskul zhing gdan drangs nas rab tu zhugs te hUM yig gsum pas bdag nyid de bzhin du rta mgrin bzhin du rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can dmar po
287b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs su rung ba spyan gsum pa/ drag po sma ra dmar ser can/ gsus pa che ba/ zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba can/ ral pa'i cod pan can/ 'od dpag tu med pas dbu brgyan pa/ zhal gnyis pa sngo zhing 'jigs su rung ba hI hI'i sgra sgrogs shing 
288a1(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo nas rnam par gnon pa/ gnyis pas srid pa la sogs pa'i mthar thug pa la'o/ /klu brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ mi'u thung gi rnam pa can/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ sprul gyis rgyan gyis brgyan
288a2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ lha dang lha ma yin mdza' dag la sdigs par mdzad pa/ rdo rje dang dbyug pa bsnams pa/ rta las kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba bsam par bya'o/ /sngags ni oM ha ya grI ba h+rI(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA zhes te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i
288a3(rgyud 'grel): mthus yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang/ bum pa bzang po dang/ dpag bsam gyi shing dang/ bcud dang/ bcud kyi len la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams bsgrubs pas mngon du 'gyur ro zhes rtog pa bdun pa las gsungs so/ /cis kyang bcom ldan 'das
288a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bzlas pa 'bum phrag gsum byas pas 'khor los sgyur ba dang rgyal srid gnyis mngon du 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu mo dpag tu med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor zhing rig 'dzin du mas mdun du byas te/ de la bde ba'i 'bras bu nyams su myong zhing gnas so/ /
288a5(rgyud 'grel): lha'i dbang pos gdugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i sngags pa dang/ thag bzangs ris kyi dmag dpon dang/ phrog byed dang/ so sor phrog byed dang/ lha rnams mdza' dag stobs med par 'gyur ro/ /gcer bu ba'i slob dpon bde byed
288a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ mdza' dag gi yon tan rnams nye bar ston par byed do/ /ji srid bcom ldan 'das byams pa mngon par ma rtogs pa de srid du gnas so/ /mngon par rtogs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /rtog
288a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bdun pa las gsungs pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba tan+t+ra h+ri nga yo t+ta ra ha ya grI ba sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po phyi ma'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs/ dpal rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal
288b1(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /de nas rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya'o/ dang por re zhig sngags pas yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bdud rtsi lngas byugs te/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i stan la nye bar 'dug nas rang gi snying ga nas hUM yig gi 'od zer gyis yang dag par
288b2(rgyud 'grel): bskul nas/ bla ma dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar spyad pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'tshal ba dang/ sdig ba bshags pa la sogs byas nas/ yang dag par brjod par bya ste/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarba
288b3(rgyud 'grel): d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ sngags 'dis rang bzhin stong par bsgom par bya'o/ /phyi nas nam mkha' i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i ze 'bru'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la bdud rtsi dang
288b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i 'od pa bsam par bya'o/ /de la hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi thugs drag po rnam par bsam par bya ste/ zhal bzhi pa/ zhabs bzhi pa/ g.yas brkyang ba dag dang/ g.yon brkyang ba dag go /phyag brgyad pa/ dpa' bo chen po lha
288b5(rgyud 'grel): mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba'o/ /bdag nyid gang zhig grub 'dod pas/ /khyab bdag chen po rta mgrin ni/ /sku mdog dmar po mche ba rno/ /spyan ni gsum po dmar po dang/ /nag po dkar po rtsa pa dang/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal nyid do/ /steng zhal rta yi rnams
288b6(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /pA la sha yi kha dog bzhin/ thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang/ /sha chen chang nyid dag kyang ngo/ /rta yi zhal sogs dbu la ni/ /dbang bskur rab tu sbyin par bya/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ lcags
288b7(rgyud 'grel): kyu mda' dang thod pa dang/ /rdo rje rnams ni phyag g.yas na/ /zhags pa gzhu dang kha TwAM ga /dril bu rnams ni phyag g.yon na/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su sgrub pa pos/ /'di lta bu nyid 'dir bsgom bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis yang dag mchod/ /mchod pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par
289a1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /shar du lha mo bri bar bya/ /rta yi rdo rje 'jigs chen mo/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig las ni yang dag byung/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag ni bzhi/ g.yon na gzhu dang thod? pa la/ /bdud rtsi dang bcas g.yas pa na/ /mda' nyid dang ni rkeng rus te/ /sna tshogs
289a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can 'bar ba ste/ /lho ru phyag rgya bri bya ba/ zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste/ /haM yig las ni yang dag skyes/ /phyag g.yon kha TwAM ga dang ni/ /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams/ /g.yas na zhags ba chen po dang/ /keng rus brtul zhugs
289a3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas pa'i/ /sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba che/ /phag mo zhes pa bri bar bya/ /nub tu lce spyang rdo rje ma/ /thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig las byung lha mo ni/ /sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig ma/ /phyag
289a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi g.yon gyi thod pa na/ /dri chen gyis gang rgyal mtshan zhags/ /g.yas kyi Da ma ru dang ni/ /keng rus brtul zhugs bsnams pa'o/ /byang du phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje'i lag /'dab ma bzhi la bri bar bya/ /cha bsags rta mgrin mchod
289a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dri chen dri chu dang bcas pas/ /lha mo thams cad g.yas brkyang gi/ zhabs gnas 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum mche ba rno zhing 'jigs/ /bdag nyid dngos grub 'dod gang gis/ /sngags kyi rgyal
289a6(rgyud 'grel): po dran par bya/ /de la sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM ha ya grI ba h+rI(rgyud 'grel): a haM a haM/ AM AM/ hUM hUM swAhA/ sngags 'di bsam gtan byas nas ni/ /rtag tu bzlas shing dran par bya/ /'bum phrag gnyis dang bye ba dang/ /stong phrag gcig gis nad med 'gyur/ /sngon du nges
289a7(rgyud 'grel): par bsags pa yi/ sdig pa'ang cung zad med par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug dus kun du/ /srung bar byed cing bgegs med 'gyur/ /de yi sems kyis rta yi zhal/ /lha mos khams brtan par bsgom/ /byams pa 'phro ba'i sems kyis ni/ /me long
289b1(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i ye shes sbyor/ /lha mo ce sbyang gdong de yis/ /chu yi khams kyis dbang bskur nas/ /snying rjer gyur pa'i sems kyis ni/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes gzugs/ /phag mo zhal gyi sbyor ba yis/ /me yis mi shes sreg gyur nas/ /dga' bas rnam
289b2(rgyud 'grel): par dgyes pa yis/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so/ /lha mo glang po gdong de yis/ /rlung zhes mngon par brjod par bya/ /btang snyoms dran pa'i sems kyis ni/ /bya ba bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba las/ sems ni dkar po'i gzugs kyis ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs su
289b3(rgyud 'grel): mngon par brjod/ /snying rjes brlan pa'i chos rnams ni/ /nag po'i sgra yis sgra nyid la/ /dkar po sdig pa 'joms pa ste/ /ser po dri ma med pa'i cha/ /dmar po byed pa'i chos rnams kyi/ /chags pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs/ /zhabs bzhi rnam
289b4(rgyud 'grel): par dag pa ni/ /de yi rdzu 'phrul rkang par bzhi/ /zhal nyid kyang ni 'dir gsungs so/ /sems kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' mtshungs/ /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa las/ /lam ni rnam par dag pa yis/ /gsang ba thob par mngon par brjod/ /gang tshe rgyu yis de nyid mthong
289b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras de nyid kyi rgyas btab bo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi/ /thar pa spyan gyis gzigs pa nyid/ /shes rab med cing sems med pa'i/ /dud 'gro'i gdong can rnams kyis mthong/ /bla ma dam pa'i gsung las ni/ /lha yi rnal 'byor gyis sbyangs pas//
289b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyud thams cad kyi snying po phyi ma'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta pra b+ha ka ras mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ trai lokyA bi dza ya sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs/ dpal
289b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan rje btsun 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dir dang po ma bskyed ba rnams la sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas nyi ma la hUM yig nag po las skyes pa'i rje btsun 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
290a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba sku mdog mthing nag zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal dang po khro zhing sgeg pa/ g.yas pa drag po/ /g.yon pa rnam par 'jigs pa/ rgyab zhal dpa' bo'i nyams can/ /phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu dang bcas
290a2(rgyud 'grel): shing/ thugs kar hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bsnams pa/ g.yas kyi phyag rnams kyis ral gri dang/ lcags kyu dang/ mnga' bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag gsum gyis gzhu dang/ zhags pa dang rdo rje bsnams pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang bas dbang
290a3(rgyud 'grel): phyug chen po'i mgo mnan pa/ zhabs g.yas kyis gau ra'i nu ma bzung mnan pa/ sangs rgyas me tog phreng ba la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang/ na bza' bsnams par bdag nyid/ bsgoms nas/ phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ de la khu
290a4(rgyud 'grel): tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar nas/ mthe'u chung lcags sgrog gi rnam par bya'o/ /sngags ni/ oM grih+Na grih+Na/ grih+Na pa ya grih+Na pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga wAn bidyA rA dza hUM phaT/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
290a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ badzra dzwa lA na larka sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs/ rdo rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nyid bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi rjes la nyi ma la hUM yig mthing ga yongs su gyur pa las/ rdo
290a6(rgyud 'grel): rje me dang nyi ma 'bar ba sku mdog mthing ga 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od can zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa/ sgeg pa dang/ dpa' ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ snying rje'i nyams dang ldan pa'i zhabs bzhi pa/ g.yas kyi
290a7(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhis rdo rje dang/ /ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang/ mnga' bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag bzhis dril bu dang/ gzhu dang/ zhags pa dang/ kha TwAM ga ban sna tshogs dang bcas pa bsnams pa/ dbu skra skya bo'i tshogs me 'bar
290b1(rgyud 'grel): ba can/ shin tu 'jigs pa sprul chen po 'khyil bas lag gdub dang/ rkeng rgyan dang/ rkang gdub dang/ mgul rgyan dang/ rna brgyan dang/ cod pan du brgyan pa/ sgyu ma chen mo'i 'khor lor byas pa bzhi la chung ma dang bcas pa'i khyab 'dug g.yas brkyang pa'i
290b2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs kyis mnan pa dbang du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ lag mthil rdo rje bcings pa'i sor mo 'bar ba'i snying po'i dbus su mthe bong gnyis blang bar bya'o/ /de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste/ oM badzra dzwa lA na larka hUM zhes so/ /rdo rje
290b3(rgyud 'grel): me dang/ nyi ma 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ bar mA shwa sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rta mchog gi sgrub thabs/ rta mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin du nyi ma la hUM yig mthing ga las skyes pa'i rta mchog dmar po zhal bzhi pa/ phyag
290b4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa/ zhabs bzhi pa/ zhal dang po khro zhing sgeg pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas zhal drag po/ g.yon zhal 'jigs su rung ba/ steng zhal mchu rol zhing rta'i zhal ljang gu/ phyag g.yas kyi gcig gis sna tshogs rdo rje dang bcas shing bzhengs pa'i tshul
290b5(rgyud 'grel): du byas pa/ phyag g.yon gyi gcig gis ral gri dang bcas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /slar g.yas kyi ba dan gsum phyag gis blangs pa'i tshul mdzad pa/ slar yang phyag g.yon gyis mdung bsnams pa/ slar yang g.yas kyi phyag gis ral
290b6(rgyud 'grel): gri dang/ mnga' bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag lhag mas dbyug pa dang gzhu bsnams pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang dang/ g.yas kyi gcig gis dbang mo dang/ dpal mo mnan pa/ g.yas kyi zhabs gnyis pas 'dod lha dang/ 'dod lha'i chung ma mnan pa/
290b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i zhabs gcig gis dbang po dang/ sbrang rtsir byed pa mnan pa/ g.yon gyi zhabs gnyis pas rgyal bar byed pa dang/ dpyid kyi lha mnan pa/ bdag nyid de lta bur bsgom par bya'o/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dang ba dan gsum pa bsgreng ba ni/ rta mchog
291a1(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag rgya'o/ /sngags ni/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM zhes so/ /rta mchog gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya rAShta ya mA ri sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs/ bcom
291a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig sgrub pa pos stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug nas/ A(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar po yongs su rdzogs pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi snying gar bsgoms te/ de'i steng du hUM yig dmar po rnam par
291a3(rgyud 'grel): bkod nas/ mdun du gshin rje gshed dmar po dang/ bla ma dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs te/ me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa
291a4(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes so/ /de'i rjes la A yig dmar po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM yig de yongs su gyur pa las/ mgo bo rlon pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar
291a5(rgyud 'grel): po hUM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las gshin rje mthar byed bsam par bya ste/ bdag nyid sku mdog dmar po zhabs g.yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/
291a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yon na khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas na mgo bos mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po bsnams pa/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ 'jigs su rung ba/ dbu skra ser po gyen du rdzes pa/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs
291a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa/ rang 'od kyi shes rab ma brgyan sna tshogs pa can/ zhabs g.yas brkyang gi bzhugs pa la 'khyud pa'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM yig gis byin gyis brlabs
291b1(rgyud 'grel): pa de yongs su gyur pa las mgo bo rlon pas mtshan pa'i dbyug pa dkar po mi g.yo ba bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su nyi ma dmar po la gnas pa'i hUM yig dmar po kha dog dmar po bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gsang ba'i rdo rjer hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las/
291b2(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsang bar chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa la A(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar po/ de'i rjes su sngags brjod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de'i rjes la lte ba'i 'og tu chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad dang bcas pa dmar
291b3(rgyud 'grel): po'i steng du h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar po 'bar bzhin pa de la bsam par bya'o/ /shes rab ma dga' bas myos pa gos bud pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig ma'i bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyor bar bzhugs pa/ de lta bur
291b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed dmar po ma he'i steng du sna tshogs chu skyes la bzhugs pa bsgom par bya'o zhes so/ /dam tshig la sogs pa'i cho gas sngon du 'gro bas de nas gnyis gsum bzhi'i thun mtshams su bsgom par bya'o/ /oM aM dzri khaM
291b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM sa ma ya zhes pa ni dam tshig byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TI bi kraM tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM ya mAn+ta ka hUM snying po'i sngags so/ /'phags pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
291b6(rgyud 'grel): kriSh+Na yA ma ri sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i dgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig sgrub pa pos stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste/ aM yig dmar po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i
291b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rang gi snying gar bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i steng du hUM yig mthing nag bkod la hUM yig mthing nag gi 'od zer gyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i bla ma dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs la/
292a1(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag bar mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa byas te stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de'i rjes la
292a2(rgyud 'grel): aM yig dmar po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM yig/ de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa nag po hUM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par bya'o/ /hUM yig gi 'od zer gyis bskul nas de bzhin gshegs
292a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad rab tu gzhug pa sngon du 'gro bas so/ /de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las gshin rje gshed mthar byed bsam par bya'o/ /zhabs g.yon brkyang gis bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig ba/ phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog mthing nag/ phyag g.yas kyi rdo rjes
292a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan pa'i dbyug pa mthing nag bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa sdigs mdzub mdzad pa da lta bur gyur pa'i gshin rje gshed spro ba dang/ bsdu ba'i tshul gyis sna tshogs chu skyes kyi steng du nyi ma la bzhugs pa ma he'i steng du bsgom par bya'o/ /de
292a5(rgyud 'grel): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las/ hUM yig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbyug pa mthing ga las hUM yig gi 'od zer gyis 'gro ba rnams snang bar byas te/ slar yang de la de
292a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rab tu gzhug par bya'o/ /rim pa 'di nyid ji srid 'dod kyi bar du spro ba dang bsdu bar bya'o/ /dam tshig la sogs pa'i cho ga sngon du 'gro bas so/ de bzhin du gnyis gsum bzhi'i thun mtshams su bsgom par bya'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ti bi
292a7(rgyud 'grel): kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags bzlas bar bya'o/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya ma rI sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan
292b1(rgyud 'grel): 'das gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi brtse ba'i dbang gis dman dang mchog rnams kyang/ /stobs kyis gdul bya'i skye rnams drag po ston mdzad cing/ /phan pa sna tshogs sgrub mdzad sgrub ma'i gar gyi skur/ gshin rje mthar byed
292b2(rgyud 'grel): de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por sgrub bcas mchog tu bder bstan la 'dug/ bsam gtan khang pa dri bzangs kyis byugs yid mngon dga' / /bsam gtan 'dzin yid kyis snying khar A(rgyud 'grel): yig las/ /dmar po'i rnam bar
292b3(rgyud 'grel): rab byung gtum po smig rgyu'i gzugs/ /de yi steng gnas 'od zer dang bcas kha dog mthing/ /hUM yig 'od zer brgya 'gyed gshin rje gshed la sogs/ /yang dag mchod bya yid kyis rnam sprul me tog spos/ /mar me la sogs rnam mang ba'i
292b4(rgyud 'grel): mchod gus phyag 'tshal/ /sngon du byas pa'i sdig pa rnams bshags pa la sogs bya/ /'gro rnams ma lus stong nyid mngon bya de nas kyang/ /oM shu n+ya tA sogs sngags mchog tu bya/ /bdag nyid rang gi ngo bo gus pas yongs bsgom pa/ /aM
292b5(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar po las byung nyi ma la gnas mthing/ /hUM yig gzugs la rdo rjes mtshan pa dbyug pa mthing/ /dbyug pa la gnas hUM yig rab 'phro 'od dra can/ /rgyal ba ma lus bskul zhing gdan drangs rab tu gzhug/ de nyid blta zhing ma lus yongs?
292b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngo phyi nas ni/ /bdag nyid myur du gshin rje mthar byed rnam bsgom bya/ /sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro bcas pa/ /phyag g.yas na ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug mthing bsnams/ /phyag g.yon thugs kar sdigs mdzub zhags pa
292b7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa/ /zhal gyi pad+ma smin ma sla ra dmar ser 'bar/ /stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsang phyogs yang dag bsnams/ /zhal nas ljags ni ltos 'gro bzhin du rnam par bskyod/ /sna tshogs chu skyes 'dab bcas steng du nyi ma la/ /yang dag
293a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shing drag po ma he la zhon sgrogs/ /zhal ni mche gtsigs mi thung lto ba rab tu 'phyang/ /spyan ni gnyis pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa/ /klu brgyad khros pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan cing thod pa yi/ /phreng ba dkar po
293a2(rgyud 'grel): mnyam gshibs bcings shing zhal 'phro ba/ /mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal mgul du rab bcings shing/ /a Dha Da'i gad rgyangs bdun gyi dpung las rgyal/ /phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma la/ /rab zhugs hUM yig dang ldan
293a3(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa sngon bo bsam/ /der gnas hUM yig 'od kyis khams gsum snang byas shing/ /der zhugs yun mi ring bar slar yang nang du bya/ /rim pa 'dis ni spro bsdu ji ltar 'dod par bya/ /slar yang dam tshig sngon ma bzhin du kun byas te//
293a4(rgyud 'grel): thun mtshams bzhi ru 'di ni ma lus bsgom bya zhing/ /ngal bar gyur na ji bzhin bsgrub la sngags bzlas bya/ /bcom ldan gshin rje mthar byed sgrub thabs bsdus byas pas/ /byams pa dpal bdag dpag med bsod nams gang 'di yis/ /'gro
293a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ma lus bcom ldan gshin rje mthar byed gyur/ /bdag kyang myur du 'di ni gshin rje mthar byed shog/ de la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'o/ /oM h+rI Sh+Ti bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //
293a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ kriSh+Na ya mA rI sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can/ /sbrul sogs rgyan gyis rngam byas pa'i/ /gshin rje gshed mgon phyag
293a7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal nas/ /de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /bde ba'i stan la yang dag 'dug /snying gar nyi ma hUM yig dgod/ /der skyes mchod pa'i khyad par gyis/ /gus pas khyab bdag yang dag mchod/ /de yi mdun du phyogs byas te/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs
293b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /'gro kun rang bzhin med par ni/ /skad cig gis blta de nyid las/ /snying ga'i sa bon rtags las byung/ /zhabs kyi chu skyes g.yon brkyang ba/ /khro gnyer bsdus shing zhal 'jigs la/ /smra ra smin ma dbu skra ser/ /zhal gsum lags? na bskyod pa yis/ /'jigs
293b2(rgyud 'grel): byed mche ba gtsigs pa can/ /spyan ni dmar zhing gsus che la/ /sprin nag gsar pa'i 'od zer can/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing/ /ma he yis ni mtshon la bzhugs/ /stag gi sham thabs me'u spung/ /nga rgyal thams cad 'joms mdzad pa/ /nyi
293b3(rgyud 'grel): ma'i 'od zer gzi mdangs che/ /sa stengs ma lus kun tu mchod/ /'bar zhing 'bar ba'i phreng ba rno/ /dus mdza' i yis ni me dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje ral gri gtun shing drag /ro langs sta re zhags pa bsnams/ /phyag g.yas dang ni g.yon pa yis/ /drug po
293b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams su mdzad par bsnams/ /khro bcas 'jigs byed shin tu drag /gshin rje mthar byed bdud 'joms pa/ /hUM yig gis gang mgrin bsams nas/ /'dir ni de yi nga rgyal bu/ /snying gar rdor snying 'od kyis/ /gshin rje ldang ba bza' bar bya/ /mdun
293b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs de nas mchod nas ni/ /rang dang rnam pa gcig byas te/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): sa bon bzhis/ /yang dag 'gug dang gzhug pa dang/ /bcing dang mnyes pas bdag mchod cing/ /bsam gtan gyis ni mchod byas nas/ /yang dag bstod nas sngags bzlas bya/ /
293b6(rgyud 'grel): dge ba yongs su bsngo bya zhing/ /langs nas lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /btse ba gcig pu'i yid kyis spyang/ /de bzhin nyi ma so sor bya/ /dngos grub thob pa'i mtshan ma 'byung/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub bya ba/ /las mchog rab tu brkyang na yang/ /las kyi rjes su
293b7(rgyud 'grel): 'brangs pa'i tshul/ /mangs pas kho bos ma bshad do/ /bla ma'i man ngag de yang ni/ /rgyud las mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya/ /mkhas pas 'khor lo gzhan rnams kyang/ /kun nas 'bad pas shes par bya/ /gtor ma nyer spyad rnal 'byor gyis/ /thun mtshams
294a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi ru cho ga bya/ /bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): Sh+Ti bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ bdag gis bla ma'i man ngag las rtogs nas/ /sgrub thabs cho ga byas pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /'jig rten pa rnams thams cad gyur pa 'dis/ mngon
294a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu myur thob shog/ gshin rje dgra nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ya mAn+ta ka sA d+ha hUM/ bod skad du/ gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/ gshin rje mthar byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba
294a3(rgyud 'grel): can/ /klu sogs rgyan gyis gsal mdzad pa/ /gshin rje gshed mgon phyag 'tshal nas/ /de yi sgrub thabs bri bar bya/ /bde ba'i stan la yang dag 'dug/ snying gar hUM yi mthing nag dgod/ /de skyes mchod pa'i khyad par gyis/ /khyab bdag mchog tu rab
294a4(rgyud 'grel): mchod bya/ /de yi mdun du phyogs byas te/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya/ /'gro kun rang bzhin med par ni/ /skad cig gis ni thams cad blta/ /snying ga'i sa bon rtags las byung/ /zhabs kyi chu skyes g.yon brkyang ba/ /khro gnyer bsdus shing zhal 'jigs la/
294a5(rgyud 'grel): sma ra dmar ser sngon ma bzhin/ /zhal gsum ljags ni bskyod pa yis/ /'jigs byed mche ba gtsigs pa can/ /spyan ni dmar zhing gsus chend la/ /sprin nag gsar pa'i 'od zer can/ /nyi ma' dkyil 'khor la gnas shing/ /ma he yi ni mtshon la
294a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /mi thung stag gi sham thabs can/ /khengs pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer gzi mdangs can/ /ma lus phyogs rnams 'gengs byed pa/ /'bar zhing 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ /bskal pa tha ma'i me dang mtshungs/ /'khor
294a7(rgyud 'grel): lo ral gri gtun shing 'bar/ /ro langs 'gro dgra sta zhags pa bsnams/ /phyag drug rnams la mdzes pa ste/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag rnams su/ /khro bcas 'jigs byed shin tu drag /gshin rje mthar byed bdud 'dul ba/ /hUM yig gis gang
294b1(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par bsgom/ /skrag pa rnams ni rnam par spang/ /nyi shu phyed kyi stong phrag gis/ /sngags rnams sngags ni rtag tu rig/ sems ni gzeng bstod bzlas par bya/ /'dis ni 'dod pa'i dngos grub bo/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga yis/ /'di yis sngags ba'i
294b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags rnams 'grub/ /las kyi rjes 'drangs kha dog rnams/ /mangs pa'i bdag gis ma bshad do/ /bla ma'i man ngag bsams nas ni/ /de las 'dod pa'i dngos grub bo/ /'bad pa yis ni shes byas la/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis bsnyen pa'ang bya/ /gtor
294b3(rgyud 'grel): ma nyer spyod rnal 'byor gyis/ /thun mtshams bzhi ru bsgrub par bya/ /bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI bi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ ya mAn+ta ka sA d+ha naM bod skad du/
294b4(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/ /dpal gshin rje mthar byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgom pa pos dang por zhal bsang ba la sogs pa bya ste/ rang gi snying gar a yig las skyes pa'i zla ba la yaM yig nag po bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i 'od zer gyis
294b5(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dang/ sangs rgyas rnams gdan drangs nas yang dag par mchod cing sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /de nas yaM yig rtse las rnal 'byor pas bdag nyid stong pa nyid mngon du bya zhing byin gyis brlab bar yang bya ste smon lam rje
294b6(rgyud 'grel): su dran par bya'o/ /de'i rjes su raM las byung ba'i nyi ma la hUM yig las byung ba'i rdo rje tho ba/ rang gi sa bon gyis mtshan pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de las skyes pa'i sa gzhi dang/ rdo rje'i ra ba dang/ rdo rje'i gur bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil
294b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la dbyangs yig gnyis 'gyur gyi rang bzhin/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin yang dag bar blta'o/ /de'i steng du dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i rnam pa dag pa la/ Da Dha da d+ha ya ra la wa bzhi gnyis
295a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur dang bcas pa dang/ ka la sog pa'i gsal byed gnyis 'gyur yongs su rdzogs pa las/ gzhan yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la thabs kyi ngo bo mdza' yas pa 'bar ba 'phro zhing bsam par bya'o/ /de nas de gnyis yongs su
295a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM mthing ga dang yi las yang dag par byung ba'i char sprin nag po gsar pa'i kha dog can gsus pa che ba/ smin ma dang sma ra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ thung zhing rgyas
295a3(rgyud 'grel): la ma he la bzhugs pa/ stag gi pags pa'i shab thabs bsnams pa/ ri dags bdag po'i pags pas stong g.yogs byas pa/ shin tu 'jigs par byed pa/ rang gi sku'i 'od zer gyis khro bo lnga 'phro bzhin ba sprul nas/ gdengs
295a4(rgyud 'grel): ka'i rgyal pos brgyan pa/ khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo bo brgya'i phreng ba bsnams pa/ phyag drug pa g.yas kyi phyag rnams kyi tho ba dang/ ral gri dang/ rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yon gyi phyag gsum gyis sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhabs pa
295a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o/ /zhal drug pa dang po khro zhal dang/ mthing ga dang/ dkar po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po rnams gzhan rnams su zhal gyi rim pas so/ /zhal thams cad ni zlum zhing dmar po'i spyan gsum pa'o/ /zhabs
295a6(rgyud 'grel): drug pa/ zhabs gnyis g.yon brkyang mdzad pa/ zhabs gnyis gar stabs mdzad pa/ zhabs gzhan gnyis sems dpa' i skyil krung mdzad pa/ nyi ma 'bar ba'i dbus su bzhugs shing bgegs rnams 'joms par mdzad pa/ thod
295a7(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyan gyis legs par brgyan cing shin tu 'jigs pa'i mgo bo'i phreng ba can no/ /de'i rjes la khaM khaM khaM/ laM skaM saM gyi sa bon rnams las byung ba'i sa'i snying po dang/ phyag na rdo rje dang/ nam mkha' i snying po dang/ 'jig rten dbang phyug
295b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang/ kun tu bzang po zhes pa rnams mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang lce dang/ nu ma dag dang/ lte ba zhes pa rnams kyi 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ chu skyes dang/ mda' dang/ rdo rje rnams phyag g.yas
295b2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis bsnams pa/ g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs mdzub kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ dkar po dang/ nag po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ ljang gu dang/ dkar po rnams su bzhugs pa/ de'i rjes su mgo bo dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying ga ste/ sku dang gsung dang/ thugs
295b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams su gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes pa las byung ba kha dog dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po dang/ rdo rje dang/ chu skyes dang/ rdo rje rnams phyag g.yas pa rnams kyis bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon pa rnams kyis sdigs
295b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzub kyi phyag rgya mdzad pa'o/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer rnams kyis ye shes sems dpa' gdan drangs nas ro gcig tu bsgoms te/ mi bskyod pas dbu rgyan pa'i bdag nyid rab tu bsgom par bya'o/ /de la sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): Sh+TrI wi kra
295b5(rgyud 'grel): tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /de nas gshegs su gsol nas ldang bar bya'o zhes pa ni gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ big+h+nan ta ka sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ bgegs mthar byed kyi sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan
295b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das bgegs mthar byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig sgrub pa pos stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste/ aM yig dmar po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rang gi snying gar bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i steng du hUM yig nag po bkod nas/ hUM
295b7(rgyud 'grel): yig las skyes pa'i 'od zer gyis bgegs mthar byed dang/ bla ma dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs nas me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag bar mchod nas phyag 'tshal te/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la
296a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa byas nas/ stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya ste/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+mako haM zhes pas so/ /de'i rjes la AM yig dmar po las skyes pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM yig /de yongs su gyur pa
296a2(rgyud 'grel): las rdo rje hUM yig byin gyis brlab par bsgom par bya'o/ /hUM yig gi 'od zer gyis bskul nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu gzhug pa sngon du 'gro bas/ de thams cad yongs su gyur pa las/ bgegs mthar byed
