319a1(rgyud 'grel): shing/ 'gying ba'i tshul dang ldan pas bzhugs so/ /rgyal ba mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la a las byung ba'i lha mo gser gyi mdog can zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ g.yas

319b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdan la h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal bzhi pa/ g.yas bsngo ba/ rgyab dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas dang po na bum ba/ gnyis pa na bgrang phreng/ gsum pa na gdugs/ bzhi pa na gaN+Di/ g.yon dang po na a mra'i 'bras bu/

319b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa bsnams ba/ zhabs gnyis skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /dkar mo chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan steng na/ so las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ser 
320a1(rgyud 'grel): mo/ /glang po che dang seng ge'i steng na rol bas bzhugs pa'o/ /phyag gnyis na rdo rjes mtshan pa'i ud pa la ser po bsnams nas skyabs sbyin dang mchog sbyin stsol bar mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//

320a7(rgyud 'grel): mo chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du yaM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dung kha zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa/ g.yon na tri shul dang g.yon na spu gri bsnams pa/

320b5(rgyud 'grel): pas mtshan pa bsnams pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa/ sku la 'od 'phro ba'o/ /'og ma gnyis na rnga yab dang ting ting shag bsnams pa/ 'bar ba'i 'od mnga' ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog

320b7(rgyud 'grel): ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du hUM la sbyang ba'i lha mo mdog dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas mchog sbyin zhing g.yon pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa

321a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis yang dag par brgyan pa /g.yas mchog sbyin /g.yon chang gis gang ba'i bum pa'o/ /zhabs ros bas bzhugs pa'o/ /myos bar byed ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so/ /pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la raM las byung ba'i lha mo
321a5(rgyud 'grel): mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ khro mo'i cha lugs sbrul gyis rgyan can/ g.yas rdo rje g.yon sdigs mdzub kyis bsdig pas/ zhabs rol bas rgya mtsho'i dbus na bzhugs pa'o/ /rengs par byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so/ //
321a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang nyi ma'i steng du hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog nag mo/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma g.yas rdo rje gri gug g.yon thod pa khrag gis gang ba/ glang chen gyi pags pa/ phag gi zhal mnga' ba/ spyan gsum/ khro gnyer can sprul gyis brgyan pa zhabs rol
321a7(rgyud 'grel): pas bzhugs pa'o/ /nag po chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ba/ g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang gis bzhugs
321b1(rgyud 'grel): pa na bza' nag po gsol ba/ mdog dmar mo/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag g.yas dang po na 'khor lo/ /gnyis pa na ral gri/ g.yon gyi dang po na srid pa'i 'khor lo/ /gnyis pa na sdigs mdzub bo/ /mtshan mo nag mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang nyi ma'i
321b2(rgyud 'grel): steng du/ oM las byung ba'i lha mo sgrol ma mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ phyag g.yas na 'khor lo/ g.yon khu tshur sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol bas bzhugs pa'o/ /srung bar byed pa'i

326a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdan la/ taM las byung ba'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ phyag g.yas a sho ka'i sdong po la 'khyud pa'o/ /g.yon na bum pa bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /zhi bar byed pa'i sgrol
326a2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo sngo ljang zhal gsum phyag drug ma g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas g.yon gyi dang po gnyis kyis ral gri dang po ti/ bar ma gnyis ting nge 'dzin du bsnol ba/ tha ma gnyis
326a3(rgyud 'grel): na mda' gzhu'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /zhi zhing phra ba zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ oM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas 'khor lo
326a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa'o/ /rtag pa ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ saM las byung pa'i lha mo mdog ser mo/ zhal gcig phyag
326a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ma/ g.yas rgya gram g.yon ne'u le'i rkyal bu bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /kun 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i lha mo mdog
326a6(rgyud 'grel): dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas rin po che/ g.yon dar 'phan lce'u gnyis pa bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon brkyang pas bzhugs pa'o/ /rjes 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang
326a7(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i steng du/ taM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na sil byed bsnams pa/ g.yon na pad+ma la gnas pa'i rgya gram bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /don kun grub par byed
326b1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la/ hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas bum pa g.yon lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /dbang
326b2(rgyud 'grel): po ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la a las byung ba'i lha mo rgyan thams cad dang ldan ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na mya ngan med pa'i shing/ g.yon mchog sbyin no/ /mdog ser mo zhabs skyil krung du bzhugs
326b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gsang byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la swa las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na rin po che gtsigs pa bsnams pa/ g.yon ut pa la dang/ mchog sbyin dang bcas pa'o/
326b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /gso byed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la/ tsuM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas rin po che dang bcas pa'i mchog
326b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin/ g.yon rin po ches gang ba'i nor bu'i rgyal ba bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /nor ster ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan
326b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas dang po skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya can/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la paM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog
326b7(rgyud 'grel): sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na ut pa la sngon po/ g.yon shel gyi phreng ba bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /bsod nams can zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i
327a1(rgyud 'grel): gdan la h+raM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ser mo/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon dang po gnyis kyis spyi bor rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya bcings pa/ g.yas kyi 'og ma na ral gri/ g.yon
327a2(rgyud 'grel): 'og ma na shing mya ngan med pa'i yal ga gzung ba'o/ /ge'u ta ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la/ h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas ril pa spyi blugs dang bcas pa'i
327a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon ut pa la sngon po dang bcas pa'i skyabs sbyin pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i na bza' bsnams pa'o/ /zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs
327a4(rgyud 'grel): so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la/ hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar mo/ g.yas na phreng ba dang dpal be'u/ g.yon pad+ma dang bum pa bsnams pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bum pa'i steng na bzhugs
327a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /mi 'jigs pa srid len ma zhes bya ba sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la/ a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas na 'bras kyi snye ma/ g.yon na me long phreng ba dang bcas pa bsnams
327a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /dka' thub chen mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la/ taM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu /phyag g.yas skyabs sbyin par mdzad pa/ g.yon
327a7(rgyud 'grel): utpa la bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa/ rkun po dang chom rkun mnan pa'o/ /chom rkun las rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la dzi las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang
327b1(rgyud 'grel): gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas na rma bya'i sgro bsnams pa/ g.yon skyabs sbyin pa'i phyag gis ut pa la bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /sprul las skyob par byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //
327b2(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon ut pal dang bcas pa'i skyabs sbyin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs rol pas bzhugs pa'o/ /seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyob
327b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ a las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa phyag na zla ba bsnams shing/ skyabs sbyin par mdzad pa/ g.yon ut pa la bsnams shing
327b4(rgyud 'grel): skyabs sbyin par mdzad pa/ zhabs rol pas me'i sa bon las gzhil bar mdzad pa'o/ /me las skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du/ oM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog ljang gu/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis
327b5(rgyud 'grel): ma rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon ut pa la dang bcas pa'i skyabs sbyin pa/ zhabs rol pa dang bcas pas glang chen mnan pa'o/ /glang po che las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i
327b6(rgyud 'grel): steng du/ hUM las byung ba'i lha mo mdog dkar ljang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ g.yas skyabs sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas srin lag mthe bong gis mnan pa'o/ /g.yon utpa la dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing zhabs rol pas
327b7(rgyud 'grel): stag? la bcibs pa'o/ /stag las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la li las byung ba'i lha mo mdog sngo ljang/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas skyabs sbyin zhing/ g.yon ut pa la
328a1(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar skyabs sbyin dang bcas pas bzung ba'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing zhag /rol pas chu'i steng du bzhugs pa'o/ /chu las skyob par byed pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //pad+ma dang zla ba nyi ma'i steng du/ h+ri las
328a2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i lha mo mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ g.yas skyabs sbyin pa/ g.yon utpa la'i steng du lcags kyus mtshan pa bsnams pa/ zhabs rol pas mi'i dbang po mnan pa'o/ /rang gi lus kyi
328a3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dmar pos de'i lus bkang la rang gi gnas su bzhag go /zhi mdzed ma zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so/ //de nas thub pa'i lha mo zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma ni/ sngar bstan pa'i cho ga las bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du sa bon
328a4(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i sde mtshan gyi dang po la dang po gnyis pas mnan la zla ba tshes phyed pa'i thig les brgyan pa'o/ /de las grub pa'i sgrol ma bsgom par bya'o/ /mchog tu rnam par mdzes ma/ zhal gcig pa yid du 'ong ba mo ljang gu phyag gnyis
328a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ g.yas mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon na utpa la 'dzin pa'o/ /pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bsam mo/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo'i sen mo bkab la/ srin lag nas du gcug ste mthe
328a6(rgyud 'grel): bong mnan pa ni ut pa la kha bye ba'i phyag rgya 'o/ /oM tA re tu ta tA re tu re swAhA/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las 'od 'phros pas dzwa? dang hUM la sogs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la gzhug cing dbang du bya'o/ /gnas gsum du ni rdo rje
328a7(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /byin gyis brlabs la sku la sogs/ /'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje dang/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM las rtag pa dang/ 'od dpag med dang mi bskyod pa/ /de nas thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /snga ma'i tshul can spyan drang ste/ /dbang
328b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur rigs kyi bdag po ni/ /'od dpag med kyi spyi bor brgyan/ /de nas sa bon las byung ba'i/ /'od kyi lha yi spro bsdu las/ /skyo na thugs ka'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros snod bcung? ma lus zhu/ /bdag kyang sa bon de dag las/ /shin tu pra bar bsam mi khyab/ /rnam
328b2(rgyud 'grel): par mi rtog de dmigs shing/ /nam mkha' i dkyil ltar rab dben pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /de nas skyo na bzlas pa ni/ /'bum phrag bzhi 'aM 'on te drug/ /'bum phrag bcu yis las rnams 'grub/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis/ /'di don nyan
328b3(rgyud 'grel): gang len ba/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba'i/ /sgrol ma yum mchog nyid 'gyur nas/ /dngos grub gnyis sogs 'thob 'gyur te/ /yon tan dpag med 'byung bar gsungs/ /de ltar stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /srid pa gsum skyes zad nges shes dang ni/ /shes bya
328b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med sku kun tu bzang mo spyod pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs yum/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs rgyud 'dzin legs par bkod ba las bsod nams dri ma med/ /bdag gis gang thob des ni 'gro ba ma lus rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob shog /lha mo sgrol
328b5(rgyud 'grel): ma'i sgrub thabs brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan pa dI paM kA ra sh+ri dz+nyA na dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal pas bsgyur ba'o// //slad kyis rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dA na sh+rI da
328b6(rgyud 'grel): bod kyi lots+tsha ba blo gros grogs pas bcos te gtan la phab ba'o// // !/ (/sgrol ma'i bstod pa la sogs pa bzhugs/) /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ma tA dA ra sto tra na ma(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ dpal chen mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal chen mo sgrol
328b7(rgyud 'grel): ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba'i grong khyer 'jug la grong sgo'i mi mo bzod byas 'dra ba dang/ /rgyal pa'i lam du 'jug la dbyibs can mdun na gnas pa'i gzhung lam lta bu dang/ /shin tu bzlog par dkar ba'i bdud kyi rgyu las thar mdzad yang na gsang sngags
329a1(rgyud 'grel): lha/ /kho po blo gros blun po 'dis ni dpal chen mo bstod bgyi ba ji lta lags/ /gang yang rgyal sras bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin sa bcu'i pha rol phyin rnams kyi/ /khyod kyi yon tan rin chen tshogs ni gsal mdzad lha rnams
329a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang glu len te/ /de lta na yang gus pa 'ba' zhig gis bstod lha mo bdag la bzod mdzod kyi/ mi shes byis pa yis ni rang gi ma la thal gyis mthong ram ci/ /mdza' dag mi dbang 'dus pa'i gtsug gi nor bu rnams kyis btud byas 'dam skyes
329a3(rgyud 'grel): zhabs/ /gdugs dkar thig le gyen du 'bar zhing sa bdag khyed kyi 'dod pa yis ni 'gyur/ /rnam rgyas rdzid bur skyes pa'i 'od 'phrog can gyis gang la gzigs byung de la ni/ /bcom ldan glang chen seng ge'i gdan rta rkang thang mchog rnams rjes su 'gro/ ngang
329a4(rgyud 'grel): gi phyag gi stobs kyis nyer skyes rnam grangs pha rol gnon bas dgra rnams thul/ /'bar ba chen po dkyil 'khor mchog gi phun sum tshogs gyur mi bdag rnams la ni/ /ster bar bsngags shing des 'byed sngags kyi yul la mi dbang blon po'i blor gyur la/
329a5(rgyud 'grel): ri skyibs zab mor sa phug zab mo'i gzhi la rnal 'byor rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ /rab tu myos ma pad+ma'i tshal la ma la ya rlung dal bus g.yo zhing bskyod/ /'dab ma rnams la phul byung bung ba'i tshogs kyis nye bar glu len me tog gi /'byung gnas
329a6(rgyud 'grel): ya mtshan mdzes ma khyod yin lha mo khyod kyi bsngags pa rnams kyis ni/ /rgyal srid 'bras bu 'grub mdzad 'gram rgyas rtsi logs myos chu'i mtshan la 'gro /khyod zhabs bka' drin gyis ni rang dbang khang pa'i skyed mos tshal la yun ring du/ /
329a7(rgyud 'grel): rtsed mo'i spro la spyan mig drag tu g.yo zhing dga' mchog rnams kyis ni/ /zhal gyi pad+ma'i dbugs rlung gis skyong bud med rnams dang nye bar longs spyad nas/ /de ni a smra sar pas bran las dri zhim sbrang rtsi rnams la 'thung bar 'gyur/ /rab
329b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' i nags la me tog khur 'phyar myos pa'i skad snyan khu byug gis khyab cing/ /sbrang rtsis myos pa'i bum pa tshogs pa'i dar dir ldan la sog? gi'i dpal yin te/ /'o ma'i rgya mtsho rlabs phreng g.yo bar bzhad gang kumu da yi 'byung gnas dang//
329b2(rgyud 'grel): shel gyis sa gzhi bla gab med par phul byung zla ba'i cha shes khyed 'di lags/ /b? pos byas pa'i rtsed mo'i ra rtser bkod pa zla ba'i nor bu'i chu rgyan ni/ /bsrubs pas 'khrul 'khor chu srin kha nas 'thon cing rnyog bral lhung lhung sgrog pa'i chu/ /dpyid
329b3(rgyud 'grel): dus chang gis myos shing tshim pa khu byug skad snyan sgrog pa'i nam mkha' la/ sa skyong gis sbrul khang pa dpe med pa la rab tu gnas mdzad khyed nyid lags/ /glang chen mche ba gnyen la bzo byas skar khung dra mig las 'thon bya 'dab la/ /gnas shing rnam par
329b4(rgyud 'grel): sgog bcas myos pa'i phug don sgra snyan mgrin pa nas grag ste/ /nor bu'i rkang gdub mchog tu 'jam zhing sil khrol bskyod pa btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sa skyong rag gi khyim la ti si'i gangs mtshungs phun sum tshogs pa khyed nyid lags/ /zu mar nyer
329b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag lag pa cig gis smad gos bshar ba g.yo ba'i mdza' bzung ste/ /rkyal zhing rtse mo'i bde ba yun ring myos nas khar ba'i rdzing bu nas 'thon cing/ /skye 'o 'dris pas skra rtse zlum zhing cung zad zur mig lta ba tsha ba'i dus/ /ri mo bris 'dra'i yan lag mchog
329b6(rgyud 'grel): ma rnams dang nyams dga' khyed kyi mthu yis su/ /zla ba'i chos las brdungs shing 'khrul 'khor khang khyim rtsed mo'i ri las bab/ /rab tu myos ma'i nags kyis nyi logs pad+ma'i ljon shing khang par sa bdag rnams/ /rgyun chad med par rlung yab dal bus
329b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yabs pa yis ni dbu skra g.yo zhing bskyod/ /nyi ma tsha ba'i dus la khyed kyi bka' drin la ni nyin zhag mnga' bar 'gyur/ /chu 'bab sprin tshogs 'brug sgra sgrogs shing rma bya'i dkyil 'khor kun nas bskad snyan 'don/ /'dam skyes me thon la ni 'dzam
330a1(rgyud 'grel): rlung rab tu g.yo zhing glu dbyangs chu gter dus/ /snyan ngag mkhas pa'i dri zas bsgor zhing 'jam zhing 'jam pos bsnun pa'i gtid ring sa rnga skad kyis/ /khang pa'i nang rnams yongs su gdab khyed 'dod pas ni rgyun du thos par 'gyur/ /

330a3(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ /khyed kyi mchog la sgrub pa po rnams bde nyid nyin der rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs 'gugs sngags phyag rgya'i cho gas sbrul rdo rje'i gur gyis me stag 'bar ba la/ /bgegs kyi gtso bo rnams ni skrag cing 'jigs pas rgya mtsho dag
330a4(rgyud 'grel): tu 'bros 'gyur te/ /myur bar bskyod pa gtum po'i hUM yig sgra yis bsnun pas sgra ldan lcags sgrog gtor/ /lha mo khyed kyi gsang sngags bzlos pa'i khang par rang nyid 'du zhing 'od bar 'gyur/ /gar gnas khang sa'i skyor la glu dbyangs 'du
330a5(rgyud 'grel): sad rab brdung ting ring rnga skad kyis/ /'dris shing yid 'ong gling bu'i rjes 'gro'i sgra dbyangs nye bar long spyod mdzad nas ni/ /de rjes gya tshoms bud ba me tog snyim par gar gyi cho ga yid 'phrog la/ /rab tu myos pa rnams kyis khyed nyid gar gyi dpon
330a6(rgyud 'grel): por nges par gar gyi lha/ /rgyun chad med par lag pa'i rtsol ba'i bya bas bsnun pa'i yid 'ong rdza rnga'i bzhin/ /g.yer ga'i sgra yis myur bar rnam rol 'debs shing rma bya'i mjug sgro rnam par btsugs/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mkhas shing yid 'ong snod ldan
330a7(rgyud 'grel): skye bos yongs gang khang khyim la/ /byed pa bsten pas glu dbyangs bde ba nyin rer bde la longs spyod 'gyur/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni gdugs dkar seng ge'i gdan dang gser gyi bum pa rnga yab dang/ /zla zer dkar ba'i bsil khang mgyogs 'gro'i phreng
330b1(rgyud 'grel): ba dri zhim chad ldan glang chen rnams/ /khyed kyis gzugs brnyan rtag tu dran byed bud med de yis rna lung rin chen 'od/ /lha mo cung zad bzhad pa'i rnam pas rnam par rgyal?  bar de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /skad snyan rang pa'i dbyangs ni mchog tu 'gying 'gro nor
330b2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i rkang gdub sgra yis pham/ /'gram legs dkyil 'khor 'jam rlung gis gdang ba lo zhing 'khyil ba'i sgra yis mdud pa 'byed/ /rked rmad mdoms kyi cha ni 'od 'phro'o do shal nu ma'i khud bu'i ljing kyis dud/ /lha mos gang la gzigs pa de la rnga yab
330b3(rgyud 'grel): dkar 'dzin bud med 'du bar 'gyur/ /rgyun mi 'chad par lha mo khyod kyi yon tan rjes dran mi skyo gang yin te/ /nor bu'i rang bzhin zhal da'i? gzhi mar zla zer lo 'dab rnams lha 'gyid ba yis/ /nu mar lag gcig nyer bzhag bud med skye bo dag
330b4(rgyud 'grel): gi gzung ba'i ga bur chu/ /kha 'bus ut pa la sngon po dri ldan sbrang rtsi 'thungs 'gyur mi 'jigs sbyin pa skye/ /mo btsun rnams kyi 'gram pa'i logs la rna rgyan mchog tu 'gying zhing rgod/ /spyan mig la yang khro ba so mes bskyed pa'i mchi ma'i chu yis
330b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' rlabs g.yo/ /mkhres shing 'bur ba nu ma so ma'i tshogs la gur gum 'dam gyi kha dog ser/ /rab rig sngon po dbu skra me tog kha 'bus tshogs la'ang mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur/ /sprul byas pad+ma ra ga'i stegs la 'gre ldog 'gyur
330b6(rgyud 'grel): ba lha mo'i skye bo las/ /sbrul te gcal bkram mu tig do shal gyis khyab rin chen ljon shing khang shin bdes lhung me tog rdul gyis kun nas yongs sgos dga' ba'i sa yi dkyil 'khor la/ /bcom ldan 'das ma khyed kyi zhabs zung mchod khyad
330b7(rgyud 'grel): gang de yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /skad cig re rer rnga ring rdza rnga mdza' dag brdungs pa'i sgra yis rkang pa 'gying/ /glang po 'jengs pa'i spyi la/ lag pa'i rna lcags rab 'god phyed btsums mig /a mra sar bran dri zhim 'bab cing 'gram pa'i
331a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dri ldan glang chen rnams/ /bcom ldan 'das ma mi gang yung tsam dran byed de la 'du bar 'gyur/ /spyi bo phug pas steng du 'bur te rna ba'i rnga yab dang ni lcags kyu g.yo/ /rkang ba srung byed rnams kyi rnam mar ca co'i
331a2(rgyud 'grel): bde bas chu thig gzer ma 'thor/ /bar du rgol ba'i glang chen chad gis khong khrugs khyed mtshan grags pa las/ /glang mo mi rnams g.yul 'byed pa na dgra de'i sgrib pa rnams kyi sbring? par 'gyur/ /gser gyi rang bzhin ri yis skyibs? dang lha yi skyes mos
331a3(rgyud 'grel): tshal gyi khad pa dang/ mjug sgro rnam par rgyas pa'i rma bya rtse mor gnas pa sa bdag khang ba dang/ /nam mkha' chu bo'i rlabs kyis byas pa dri med rin chen ljon shing khang pa dang/ /bud med skye bo'i zhal gyi pad+ma'i 'byung gnas la yang gnas
331a4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad khyed nyid da/ /pad+ma'i skyo ma sbrang rtsi'i khu ba'i chad gi btud bas sred cing skor/ /sbrang bu'i tshogs pas dar dir mang? ldan me tog tshogs pa'i dri zhim ldan/ /dad pa'i rgyal po rab dga' i tshogs kyis zos te pad+ma gzhon nus mche ba
331a5(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs/ /lha mo ze 'gru'i rdul gyi mdog ser rlabs ldan rdzing ldan yun ring gnas par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das ma rgyal ba dkon mchog bcod pan spyi bor ldan pa pad+ma'i rigs/ /khyod nyid kun don mdzad par lha rnams kyis kyang
331a6(rgyud 'grel): bstod de mang po smras mod kyi/ /de slad lha mo khyod kyis bstod pa 'di yis mchog tu dge ba bdag gis kyang/ /gang thog de yis 'gro ba khyad gsong dbul ba'i 'jigs pa zhi bar shog /paN+Di ta chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'i dpal chen mo
331a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i bstod pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po rgyal ba'i snyan gyi zhal snga nas/ lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyi lots+tsha ba blo gros rgyal pos bsgyur ba las cung zad dag par byas so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra stotra
331b1(rgyud 'grel): da sha dI gA thA/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bzlog dka' i grid? pa'i mun pa ni/ /'joms byed nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' 
331b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dung/ /shin tu rmongs pa'i sems can gyis/ /glang po che rnams gsod byed ma/ /lha mo seng ge khros pa yang/ /khyor 'byung pa las 'jigs shing bros/ /mche ba'i mdungs rtse rtse mo yis/ /brag 'joms shing drur rtsa ba 'don/ /khyod kyi sngags
331b3(rgyud 'grel): kyi bzlas pa las/ /'jigs shing glang po 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa'i/ /du bas khyab cing bzod par dka' / /'bar ba yis ni khro tshig pa/ /khyod stod char ba me? zhar? 'gyur/ /ma lus gdengs ka las byung pa'i/ /phaT sgra sgrogs cing dug mig can/ /sbrul
331b4(rgyud 'grel): ni lha mo khyod bstod pas/ /nam mkha' lding ni bzhin du 'dzoms/ /ral gris gcod pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ /khrag gis yan lag bskus pa ste/ /khong ni ming tsam dran pa yis/ /chom rkun nus pa med par 'gyur/ /rgyal po khros pa'i bran rnams kyis/ /skra?  nas bzung nas zhags
331b5(rgyud 'grel): pas bcings/ /btson pa spangs nas lha mo kye/ /khyod la bstod byed 'jigs med 'gyur/ /dpa' rlabs tshogs ni nam mkha' dang/ phyogs bcur yang ni khyab byed ba/ /gru log na yang rgya mtsho las/ /khyod kyis 'phangs nas pha rol phyin/ /khrag dang klad pa'i 'dam gyis byugs/
331b6(rgyud 'grel): de dag bza' ba la chags pa/ lha mo khyod kyi sngags bzlas pas/ /sha za de dag 'jigs par 'gyur/ /yan lag chad cing dri ngan pa'i/ /khrag dang zhag ni sna la 'dzag/ /khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis ni/ /mdze can 'dod pa'i lhar 'drar 'gyur/ /bkres skom gyis gdungs gcer
331b7(rgyud 'grel): bu dang/ /slong ba'i yi dags 'gro ba la/ /khyod la 'dud pa tsam gyis ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /'jigs pa chen/ po 'jigs med pa/ /de ltar dang pas khyod bstod pas/ /dge ba gang bsags de yis ni/ /'jig rten bde ba can thob shog /rje btsun 'phags
332a1(rgyud 'grel): ma sgrol ma la bstod pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa/ tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya ta rasto tram bi sa karmA sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa phrin las sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma
332a2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tAM yig ljang gu utpal las byung ba'i/ /sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /phyag gnyis sku la rin chen sna tshogs spras/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /don grub la sogs rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing/ /bcu drug lo lon bzhin
332a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan/ /gzi brjid bzod dka' sna tshogs lhag par 'dud/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag g.yas sbyin phyag g.yon utpal 'dzin/ /sna tshogs pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gyis rab tu b?
332a4(rgyud 'grel): yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la rtag tu gzigs/ /sku la 'jigs pa brgyad skyabs sgrol ma 'phro/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun las sgrol byed pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang
332a5(rgyud 'grel): dang drag po dang/ /las tshogs thams cad myur du grub mdzad ma/ /phrin las thams cad yongs su grub byed pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /seng ge glang chen mo sbrul chom rkun dang/ /lcags sgrog chu dang bgegs dang 'jigs pa brgyad// 
332a6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa kun las yongs su sgrol byed pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gdon dang rims dang smyo 'bog la sogs dang/ /gnod byed la sogs dus min 'chi bas skrag /sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi byed pa'i/ /yi dam
332a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye bo sngon bsags las dang nyon mongs kyi/ /mtshams med lnga dang mi dge bcu sogs sdig /sdig pa'i las rnams bdag gis ci bsags pa/ /de dag thams cad ma lus byang bar shog /bdag ni da ltar skye ba 'di la
332b1(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /rmi ngan mtshan ngan 'chi ltas dus min skrag /bkra mi shes pa thams cad dag gyur nas/ /tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod rgyas par shog /bdag ni ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du/ /yi dam sgrol ma rjes su dran gyur nas/ /mchog dang thun mong dngos grub la sogs pa/ /las
332b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs thams cad yid bzhin grub par shog /yi dam sgrol ma thugs rje che ldan pa/ /bdag gis rab tu brtse ba'i gdung sems kyis/ /bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang bsags des/ /yi dam sgrol ma lha dang mi 'bral shog /'phags ma sgrol ma'i
332b3(rgyud 'grel): bstod pa/ phrin las thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra de bi sto tra pu shA ma la nI ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa me tog phreng ba zhes bya ba/ mgon po thugs rje
332b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la gzigs pa'i/ zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni btud de/ tshogs gnyis rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir du/ /lhag pa'i lha la bstod par bya'o/ /phyag 'tshal sgrol ma
332b5(rgyud 'grel): lha yi lha khyod/ /dngos grub ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin po che ltar/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal ngo mtshar khyad du 'phags pa'i/ /yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i sku la/ /ye shes lnga yi rang mdangs rgyas pas//
332b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro ma/ /phyag 'tshal chu bzhi'i pha rol legs gnas/ /las dang nyon mongs srid las rnam grol/ /sangs rgyas yon tan phyir mi ldog pa'i/ /sa lam ma lus mthu ru phyin ma/ /phyag 'tshal srid pa'i dra ba 'joms mdzad/ /
332b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi snying po yi ge bcu pas/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang mngon spyod/ /'phrin las 'od kyis nam mkha' gang ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'gro ba'i skyabs mchog sgrol ma/ /bud med gzugs kyis 'gro ba 'dul mdzad/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug sras mo//
333a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa'i spyan chab las ni 'khrungs ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'gran zla med pa'i sku mdog /zag med bde chen zla ba'i gdan la/ /bzhugs pa'i zhabs kyi pad+ma la ni/ /lha dang lha min cod pan gtugs ma/ /phyag 'tshal che ba'i nang na tsha
333a2(rgyud 'grel): mchog /'byung po ro langs ma lus tshogs 'joms/ /gzhan gyis mi thub drag rtsal chen mo/ /stobs chen pha rol mnon par mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das ma khyod kyi zhabs la/ /skyabs pa'i mi de mya ngan 'das
333a3(rgyud 'grel): thob/ /mchog gi don chen 'grub par mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma/ /rigs drug bur 'dzin brtse ba'i thugs kyis/ /snying rje chen po'i gru bzhings kyis ni/ /srid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol ma/ phyag 'tshal phongs pa
333a4(rgyud 'grel): kun las skyob mdzad/ /mtsho bas mnar te mchu mgul skams nas/ /bkres pas khyod la gsol ba btab pas/ /longs spyod mi zad char rgyun 'bebs ma/ /phyag 'tshal dpa' mo rdo rje sgrol ma/ /dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog can/ /rdo rje la sogs
333a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan brgyad kyi/ /phrin las rnams kyi 'gro don mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal skye 'gro rnams la dbang bskur/ /'jig rten gsum na thu rtsal ldan pa'i/ /dregs pas myos pa rnams kyi cod pan/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi mthil gyis brdzis ma/ /phyag
333a6(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal thub dbang stobs bcu'i rtsal ldan/ /sku lnga'i rang bzhin khyab bdag chen mo/ /bsrung med gsum dang ma 'dres dran gsum/ /yongs su dag pa bzhi pa mnga' ma/ /phyag 'tshal srid pa'i 'ching pa las grol/ /ye shes sku la rdzu 'phrul thogs mang
333a7(rgyud 'grel): thabs dang shes rab mchog la mnga' brnyes/ /sdug bsngal 'khor ba'i dri ma dag ma/ /phyag 'tshal mthu stobs bdag mo'i snying po/ /yi ge bcu pa spyi 'or btags nas/ /dpung tshogs bde bzhi'i nang du phyin pas pha rol dmag gi g.yul ngo bzlog
333b1(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /phyag 'tshal mkhyen dang brtse ba'i bdag nyid/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin rnam thar mang pos/ /brgyan pa'i gter mdzad dpal gyi be'u ra/ /shes bya'i dkyil mdza' rtag tu chung ma/ /phyag 'tshal nyi ma 'bum gyi mdangs can/ /shes rab chen po'i 'od zer 'bar
333b2(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /khams gsum sems can rnams kyi rgyud la/ /ma rig sgo da'i mun rum sel ma/ /phyag 'tshal ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid/ /dpal ldan dri ma med pa'i sku la/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras ma/ /phyag
333b3(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal khams gsum dbang du sdud ma/ /tshangs pa'i khyab 'jug ma hA de ba/ /lha chen rnams kyi dbu yi cod pan/ /khyod kyi zhabs la rab tu btung ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'jig pa kun las skyob mdzad/ /me dang chu dang rgyal po'i chad pa/ /stag dang seng ge sbrul?
333b4(rgyud 'grel): dang srin po/ /glang po che yi breng dbang sel ma/ /phyag 'tshal byin brlab rmad du gyur nas/ /'byung ba 'khrugs dang gdon gyis bskyed pa'i/ /srog 'phrog nad kyi bye brag ma lus/ /khyod la gsol btab gdung ba sel ma/ /phyag 'tshal btsun mo rin po chen
333b5(rgyud 'grel): cha byad/ /smin pa'i bar nas mdzod spu 'od 'bar/ /spyan dgu ud+pal mdog 'dri'i 'dzum mdangs/ /thugs rje chags pas 'gro la gzigs ma/ /phyag 'tshal dpa' mo bdud kyi dpung 'joms/ /'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba 'dren mdzad/ /shul
333b6(rgyud 'grel): nor 'phreng la thugs rjes bzung nas/ /thar pa'i lam la khrid par mdzad ma/ /phyag 'tshal bdud bzhi 'joms par mdzad ma/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos rje btsun ma khyod/ /phung po lnga spangs lnga'i bdag nyid/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs nyon mongs
333b7(rgyud 'grel): spangs ma/ /phyag 'tshal dge legs gzi brjid chen mo/ /zhal bzangs bcu drug zla ba rgyas 'dra'i/ /'od kyis khams gsum mun pa 'joms mdzad/ /shes rab dpal dang blo gros spel ma/ /phyag 'tshal bud med sgyu 'phrul khyod la/ /mA ma kI
334a1(rgyud 'grel): dang spyan ma gos dkar/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams kyi/ /che ba'i che mchog rnams kyis bstod ma/ /phyag 'tshal hUM gi sbyor ba dang ldan/ gnas gsum du ni de nyid bkod pas/ /nus pa'i rdzu 'phrul mdza' la rgyal nas/ /phrin las
334a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yi rtsal dang ldan ma/ /phyag 'tshal dge ba rgyas par mdzad ma/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar bas/ /mun pa rang sar dag pa bzhin du/ khyod bsgom sgrib pa spangs par byed ma/ /phyag 'tshal phrin las du ma'i bdag mo/ /khyod sku sna
334a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ngo bo shel bzhin/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan gcig tu ma nges/ /gang la nye bar tha dang 'tshar ma/ /phyag 'tshal don dam rgyal ba'i yum las/ /ma g.yos kun rdzob lha mo'i gzugs can/ /sku mdog sngo ljang gar gyi nyams dags?/ ?
334a4(rgyud 'grel): gsal mi rtog pa yis 'gying ma/ /phyag 'tshal 'khor ba'i g.yul rdo do zlog ma/ /nga bdag dngos por zhen pa'i snying la/ /spros bral ye shes ral gri bsnun nas/ gzung 'dzin 'khrul ba'i dpa' bo gsod ma/ /phyag 'tshal tshogs ?
334a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i dbu skra/ /mthon mthing lcang lo 'khyil ba'i dbus na/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med las/ /thugs rje'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phro mdzad/ /gang gis me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa/ /klog gam kha don 'don par byed
334a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /de yis bsod nams dpag med 'thob cing/ /sdig sgrib stobs chen ma lus dag 'gyur/ /gang zhig skye bo tha mal rnams kyis/ /'di 'don pa de dge sbyong du 'gyur/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis rlob
334a7(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /su yi blo la bstod pa 'di 'dzin/ /'dul khrims sdom pa dam tshig rnams kyi/ /nyer byas bsam pa rtsa ltung dri ma/ /ma lus dag nas dngos grub thob 'gyur/ /'di 'don blo yi pad+ma kha 'byed/ /rgol ba ngan pa'i lung rigs
334b1(rgyud 'grel): tshar gcod/ /rig pa'i gnas la shes rab chen po/ /zla ba yar ngo bzhin du 'phel 'gyur/ /e ma bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di ni/ /lan cig yid la dran pa tsam gyis/ /zhing mchog dam pa bde ba can der/ /the tshom med par nges par skye 'gyur/ 'gro
334b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i skyabs mchog rje btsun ma la/ /bdag gi me tog phreng bas bstod pa'i/ /dge ba gru gzings lta bu des ni/ /srid gsum 'khor ba'i mtsho las sgrol 'gyur/ /me tog phreng ba'i bstod pa 'di ni/ /rje btsun ma la lnga brgya pa rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen ba'i
334b3(rgyud 'grel): khur che ba'i yon tan du ma dang ldan pa/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mi zhes bya bas bstod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra de bi sta ba nA ma(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la
334b4(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bzlog dka' srid pa'i mun pa ni/ /'joms byed nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /thugs rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud/ shin tu rna ba'i sems rnams kyis/ /glang po che rnams gso la byed pa/ /lha
334b5(rgyud 'grel): mo seng ge khros pa yang/ /khyod bstod pa las 'jigs shing 'bros/ /mche ba'i mdud rtse non po yis/ /brag 'joms shing gi rtsa ba 'don/ /khyod kyi sngags ni bzlas par las/ /'jigs shing glang chen 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa/ /du
334b6(rgyud 'grel): bas khyab cing bzod par dka' / /'bar ba yis ni 'gro tshig pa/ /khyod bstod char pas me zhi 'gyur/ /ma rungs gdengs ka las byung ba'i/ /phung sgra sgrog shing dug mang can/ /sbrul ni lha mo khyod bstod pas/ /nam mkha' lding ni shin tu 'jigs/ /ral gri gcod
334b7(rgyud 'grel): cing 'dral ba rnams/ /khrag gis yan lag bskus pa ste/ /khyod kyi ming tsam dran pa yis/ /tshom rkun nus pa med par 'gyur/ /rgyal po khros las bran rnams kyi/ /skra nas bzung zhing zhags pas bcings/ /btson ra spangs te lha mo kye/ /khyod la
335a1(rgyud 'grel): bstod byed 'jigs med 'gyur/ /dpa' rlabs tshogs kyis phyogs bcu dang/ /nam mkha' yang dag khyab byed pa/ /gru log na yang rgya mtsho las khyod kyi 'bangs ni pha rol phyin/ /khrag dang slang pa'i 'dam gyis byugs/ /de dag bza' ba la chags pa/ /khyod
335a2(rgyud 'grel): la bstod pa tsam gyis ni/ /sha za de ltar 'jigs par 'gyur/ /yan lag chad cing dri nga ba/ /khrag dang snag ni sna nas 'dzag/ khyod la bstod pa tsam gyis ni/ /mdze can 'dod pa'i lha 'drar 'gyur/ /bkres skom gyis gdungs gcer bu dang/ /slong ba yi dags dang
335a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra ba/ /khyod la bstod pa tsam gyis ni/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa/ /de ltar sems nas khyod bstod pas/ /dge ba gang bsags de yis ni/ /'jig rten bde ba can thob shog /'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa slob
335a4(rgyud 'grel): dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //seng ge glang chen me sprul chom rkun dang/ /lcags sgrog chu dang sha za'i 'jigs pa ni/ /'joms mdzad zla 'od phung po ltar 'dzin ma/ /sgrol ma bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal 'dud// //
335a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra aSh+Ta b+ha ya tra ta nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i bdag po lhan cig skyes pa'i chos sku de
335a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /longs spyod rdzogs dang sbrul ba'i sku ste pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du yangs pa'i spyan/ /rnal 'byor dag par rnam par thar gyur srid dang srid las bral ba'i sku gsung thugs chags pa/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med lha dang lha min mis mchod
335a7(rgyud 'grel): de la phyag 'tshal te/ /skye 'jig rnam par spangs phyir chos nyid mi 'gyur yang dag nyid du dbyer med kyang/ /'khrul bcas 'gro ba'i don phyir sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las khyad par gsang sngags lam/ /sgrib ba myur 'joms sna tshogs phyag rgya'i gzugs
335b1(rgyud 'grel): 'phros sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed byed yum/ /'jigs pa brgyad las sgrol ba 'di deng bsgrub la dga' phyir dang pas brtsam par bya/ dad ldan rab brtson dam tshig ldan/ /rje btsun sgrub la dga' ba yis/ /rnam par 'chi med dben pa'i gnas/ /nyams dga' 
335b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub 'byung gnas su/ /rten dang mchod rdzas sna tshogs pa/ /rab bshams bde ba'i stan nyid la/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs tshul gyis/ /phyi nang khrus kyis dag byas te/ /de nas rang gi snying ga ru/ /nga ro dang po las byung ba'i/ /chu shel dbus su yi ge ni/ /sde
335b3(rgyud 'grel): tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la/ /lnga pa'i tha ma'i thig les brgyan/ /de yi 'od kyis rje btsun dang/ /'phags pa'i tshogs rnams spyan drangs te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/ /gti mug ldongs pa'i sems can gyi/ /ma rig mun pa sel mdzad ma/ /bde gshegs sgrol ma phyag
335b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /dri zhim me tog thams cad dang/ /a ke ru sogs bdug spos dang/ rab tu mun sel sgron me dang/ /ga bur la sogs dri yi mchog /gtsang sbyar bshos dang gzhan yang ni/ /sgra snyan la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs/ /thams cad dbul te sngags dang ni/ /phyag rgya'i rgyas
335b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang gdab bar bya/ /'khor ba thog ma med par du/ /sdig bgyis gang lags ma lus pa/ /da lta nyid du bshags bgyis nas/ /slan chang nam yang mi bgyid do/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas sogs 'phags rnams dang/ /'gro ba kun gyi dge ba ni/ /zag med zag dang bcas pa la/
335b6(rgyud 'grel): bsam pas rjes su yi mang po/ /'gro mgon sprin bral nyi ma yi/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas par gyur rnams la/ /'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /rgyal ba zag med dbyings nyid du/ /mya ngan 'das gzigs bzhed rnams la/ /ji srid 'khor
335b7(rgyud 'grel): pa gnas kyi bar/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol/ /don dam rang bzhin mtshan ma med/ /rnam par mi rtog chos sku las gzugs sku lta bu'i tshul 'chang ba'i/ /'gro mgon khyed la skyabs su mchi/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub mchog tu thugs
336a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed ltar/ /bdag kyang 'gro rnams bsgral ba'i phyir/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs bgyis pa las/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pas/ /sems can ma lus sangs rgyas kyi/ /sa ni myur du thob par shog /
336a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba bde dang phrad la sogs/ /tshad med bzhi yang bsgom bar bya/ /de nas 'phags rnams gshegs byas la/ /brtan g.yo'i chos kun stong par bsgom/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas chu skyes steng du ni/ /chu shel de stengs sa bon no/ de yongs
336a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur las utpa la/ /sa bon nyid kyis mtshan pa'o/ /de yi 'od kyis skye dgu rnams/ /sbyangs nas yongs gyur bcom ldan ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dur ba'i mdog/ bcu drug na tshod rgyan rnams rdzogs/ /mchog sbyin pa dang utpa la/ /g.yas dang
336a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon du shes bya ste/ /byed krung gis bzhugs 'dzum pa'i bzhin/ /mcho stengs rin chen brag phug nang/ /ltos 'gros zhabs brten bsgom par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi dang po ni/ /maM dang praM las lha mo ni/ /'od zer can dang so sor 'brang/ /ser mdog zhal
336a5(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /rgyan mdzes g.yon na shing lo ni/ /mya ngan med dang rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yas pa bdud pa'i tshul du'o/ /g.yas kyi 'og mar phag gdong ma/ /pa la sha mdog rgyan gyis mdzes/ /chos 'chad pa yi phyag rgya can/ /g.yon gyi 'og mar khro gnyer
336a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /mig sman mdog can khro mo'i tshul/ /gri gug thod khrag bsnams pa'o/ /de dag rnams kyi phyogs mtshams ni/ /brgyad na 'jigs pa rnam pa brgyad/ /bgegs dang dgra dang glang chen dang/ /me dang sbrul dang mi rgod dang/ lcags sgrog gis bcings chu rnams
336a7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /skyob byed sgrol ma brgyad 'phro ba/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /de nas snying ga'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros ye shes sems dpa' ni/ /snga ma'i tshul can spyan drangs la/ /mchod nas yi ge bzhi po yis/ /gnyis su med par bstim par bya/ /
336b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gsum gyis gnas gsum du/ /byin gyis brlab bya de yi rjes/ /dbang bskur rigs kyi bdag po ni/ /don yod grub pas spyi gtsug brgyan/ /de nas sa bon las byung ba'i/ /'od kyi spro bsdu cung zad bya/ /skyo na gsang sngags bzlas pa ni/ /yi ge bcu pa bgrang bar bya/ /oM
336b2(rgyud 'grel): tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ /'bum phrag 'am yang na drug /'bum phrag bcu yis las rnams 'grub/ /gal te 'byung po rnams la ni/ /gtor ma sbyin na snod gtsang du/ /zan blugs cho gas byin rlabs te/ /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba las/ /mdzub gnyis gung mo gnyis
336b3(rgyud 'grel): ba la/ /legs bcad pa ni ut pa la/ /kha 'bye bas ni phyag rgya ste/ /gnas gsum dag tu gtugs byas nas/ /'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /oM A kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA naM a dya nut pan Ta twAt oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ /las kyi yan lag thams cad
336b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /rgyas bar rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyir/ /'di ru ma bkod de ru blta/ /rnal 'byor pa ni gang zhig gis/ /'di don nyams su len byed na/ /dngos dang dngos med zad gtso bo/ /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ /skye dang zag pa rnams spangs pa/ /dpal ldan yum nyid
336b5(rgyud 'grel): thob 'gyur te/ /bum pa bzang sogs dngos grub dang/ /gzhan yang gsang dang bskrad dang dbye/ /dgug dang zhi dang rgyas pa yi/ /las grub 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /de ltar stong dang snying rje bdag can srid pa gsum skyes zad dngos shes dang ni/ /shes
336b6(rgyud 'grel): bya gnyis su med sku kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i bdag nyid sna tshogs yum/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i sgrub thabs rgyud bzhin legs bkod pa las bsod nams dri ma med/ /bdag gis gang thob des ni 'gro ba ma lus rtog ba de mya ngan 'das thob shog/
336b7(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa zhes bya ba'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po tsan dra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI baM kar sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba las/
337a1(rgyud 'grel): slad kyi rgya gar gyi mkhan po byang chub sems dpa' dA na sh+rI dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba mal gyi blo gros grags bas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sI ta tA ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/
337a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ched du zla ba drug gi par/ /sgrol ma'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'o/ /dngos grub thams cad 'thob 'gyur zhing/ /'chi ba'i skyon gyis mi gos so/ /ngag gi dbang phyug gnang byas ba/ /'chi bdag bslu ba bsdus
337a3(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ /byung nas sgrol ma dkar mo 'di/ /bsgoms na 'jigs pa nyams byed pa/ /bzhi pa'i sde mtshan dang po a/ /bcas nas nam mkhar 'od zer 'phro/ /pad dkar zla ba'i gdan bltas la/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro yang brjod la/ /rang bzhin sgro
337a4(rgyud 'grel): btags gzhom phyir du/ /skad cig stong pa nyid du blta/ /de nas sngon gyi smon lam dbang/ /byang chub sems kyi yi ge bsgom/ /pad+ma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du ni/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas pa/ /mchog sbyin pa dang utpal
337a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od gnas can/ /zla ba'i rgyab la mnyam brten pa/ /rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs/ /bcu drug lo lon lus can ma/ /sangs rgyas kun dang de sras dang/ /yum ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma/ /sgrol ma de yi thugs kar bsgom//
337a6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dkar po 'od zer can/ /re mig brgyad la yi ge brgyad/ /yongs su bskor bar bya ba'o/ /oM hA gsal byed dbus gnas pa'i/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni lte bar bya/ /zla drug rtse gcig pa yi yid/ /nges par brtan pa rtag tu bya/ /yi ge bcu pa'i sngags 'di ni//
337a7(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod yid kyis bzlas bya ste/ /oM gyi yi ge dang por sbyin/ /phyis ni tA re rab tu sbyang/ /tut+tA re la tu re phyis/ /swAhA mdza' ru las kun byed/ /tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi zla dang/ /drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang/ /ba spu'i rtse mo'ang gcod mi nus
337b1(rgyud 'grel): 'chi bdag las rgyal sgrol ma bzhin/ /skra dkar gnyer ma skal ngan nang/ /dbul ba la sogs mdor bsdu na/ /seng sogs 'jigs pa che brgyad dang/ /sdug bsngal rab tu che 'joms byed/ /bskul ba med par gos btung ba/ /khang bzang rin chen tshogs kyang 'du/
337b2(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang ni mig sman dang/ /rkang ba bum pa bzang sogs 'grub/ /tshigs bcad ma/ ban dang ngag snyan dang/ /blo gros shes rab dri med 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ci 'dod dngos grub ni/ /'khor lo de las 'byung par 'gyur/ /sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs
337b3(rgyud 'grel): nad dang 'jigs pa rnam nyams pa/ /gang zhig phyung nas dge bsags pa/ /des ni skye 'gro sgrol mar shog /sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i slob ma thu bos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang
337b4(rgyud 'grel): lo ts+tsha ba khams pa dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o// //bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdor bsdus pa la dga' rnams phyir/ /sdom tshig le'ur byas pa yin/ /phyogs rnams gtsang mnyen bde ba dang/ /kun tu dri ngad ldang gyur ba/ /bde ba can
337b5(rgyud 'grel): gyi zhing khams ltar/ /sa gzhi byin gyis brlab bar bgyi/ /phyi nang ma bsgribs gsal ba dang/ /rin chen rnams las grub ba yi/ /thub pa'i dbang po sras bcas kyi/ /gzhal yas khang du byin brlab bo/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang/ /phyogs
337b6(rgyud 'grel): bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sras/ /bka' sdong phyogs skyong ma lus pa/ /de ring spyan 'dren gshegs su gsol/ /gtsang zhing dri zhim bsil ba yi/ /dri chab bdud rtsi rgyun lta bus/ /rgyal ba sras bcas ma lus la/ /chu gsum gyis ni mnyes par
337b7(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i bla ma lha/ /rin chen gsum ni nam mkha' la/ /til gyi gang bu ltar dmigs nas/ /sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /me tog la sogs nyer spyod dang/ /rgyal srid bdun du grub pa'i rdzas/ /mchod sbyin nam mkha' 
338a1(rgyud 'grel): gang dmigs te/ /'gro ba bsgral phyir dbul bar bgyi 'o/ /bdag dang sems can mkha' mnyam gyis/ /thog med dus nas da lta'i bar/ /ma lus sdig ba ci bgyis pa/ /shin tu 'gyod pas bshags par bgyi'o/ /mngon mtho
338a2(rgyud 'grel): nges legs rgyur gyur pa'i/ /skye bo'i dge ba gang bgyis dang/ /'phags pa'i tshogs kyis gang bgyis la/ /lhag par spro bas yid rang ngo/ /sgo gsum nyams len mi dge bcom/ /ched du bya ba gzhan don brtson/ /lam bde tshogs chung 'jug pa
338a3(rgyud 'grel): zab/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas par bgyi'o/ /btang bar dka' ba'i lus 'di ni/ /mgon dang bde gshegs sras bcas la/ /bran g.yog nyid du dbul lags kyis/ /deng nas khyed kyi 'bangs su mchi'o/ /rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang/ /'bru dang
338a4(rgyud 'grel): rta glang bran du bcas/ /sa gzhi gser sogs rin po che/ /gus bas thung mchog rnams la mchod/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bsgom pa dang/ /thos bsam tshogs gnyis ci bsags pa/ /dus gsum bsdus pa'i dge ba gang/ /thub pa chos kyi spyan la dbul//

338a6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang/ /yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs te/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi'o/ /rgyal ba byang chub mchog brnyes nas/ /cung zad snyoms par bzhugs pa la/ /
338a7(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa lta bur gus pa?/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /byang chub mdzad pa mthar phyin nas/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'da' bzhed la/ /ji srid 'khor pa mdza' yod par/ /sems can don du bzhugs su gsol/ /ji ltar sngon gyi skyob pa yis/ /byang
338b1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang sems can phyir/ /byang chub chen por sems bskyed do/ /rgyal sras 'jig rten skyong rnams la/ /sku gsum grub dang rigs pa 'dzin/ /las tshogs phrin las rnam dbye sogs/ /las bcol de ni grub par mdzod/ /'dir ni nyes pa
338b2(rgyud 'grel): gang bgyis pa/ /gang yang lus can skyabs gyur la/ /ma 'tshal ba rnams bshags par bgyi/ /gtso bos cis kyang bka' snang 'tshad/ /'bras bu mchog dang thun mong ste/ /ma nor tshig dang shes rab dang/ /spobs pa mthu rtsal phun tshogs pa'i/ /dngos grub de dag gnang bar rigs
338b3(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum bsags pa'i dge ba ni/ /tshogs gnyis bdud rtsi lta bu 'dis/ /sku gsum 'bras bu grub gyur nas/ /gzhan don 'bad med 'byung bar shog /dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa/ slob dpon ba pa b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
338b4(rgyud 'grel): !/ (/'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i bya ba la sogs pa bzhugs/) /rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra maN+Da lA ba tA ra kri tA nA ma(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i bya ba zhes bya ba/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags
338b5(rgyud 'grel): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin/ /gos pa med pa'i ye shes ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu ltar/ /ma lus mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad dang/ /sna tshogs 'gro ba'i ma khyab
338b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /gus pa'i blo yis sgrol ma yi/ /cho ga'i rim pa brjod par bya/ /de la 'dir lha mo sgrol ma la lhag par gus pa'i gang zag gang yang rung bas/ /gnas khang brgyan cing byi dor legs par byas pa la sku gsung thugs kyi rten dgram khyad par sgrol ma 'am/
338b7(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje chen po'i rten bzhugs su gsol la/ tshul ji lta ba bzhin nu dkyil 'khor bzhengs la/ der tshogs pa rnams la sha chang sgog gcod spangs nas khrus legs par byas la lus la dri bzang pos byugs te/ gos gtsang ma gyon la/ mchod pa'i yo byad
339a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ ba'i lci bas la ma lhung ba yang sta gon bya/ gzhan yang nye bar mkho ba rnams kyang tshogs pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /de nas thams cad kyis rang rang gi mdun du sa la ba'i lci bas byugs pa la maN+Dal gyi cho ga las byung ba ltar
339a2(rgyud 'grel): me tog sil ma'i chom bu bcu dgu pa'i dbus kyi ri rab kyi steng du po ta la nas spyan drangs pa'i sgrol ma 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs par bsam pa la thog mar phyag bya/ /nye bar spyod pa lngas mchod la mtshan gyis dngos gzhi bstod pa lan
339a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum brjod/ snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la tsog tsog por 'dug pas gso sbyong blang bar bya'o/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras
339a4(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dbang phyug bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs pa'i byang chub
339a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang/ bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang/
339a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ gso sbyong nges par byas te yang dag par blangs pa de bzhin du/ bdag med 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang dus 'di nas bzung nas/ sang gdugs rtse shar gyi bar du sems can
339a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang/ bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongs su
339b1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gso sbyong nges par byas te yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o/ /deng nas srog gcod mi bya zhing/ /gzhan gyi nor yang blang mi bya/ /'khrig pa'i chos kyang mi spyad cing/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang mi smra'o/ /skyon ni mang po mnyam brten pas/ /chang ni yongs
339b2(rgyud 'grel): su spang bar bya/ /khri stan mthon po mi bya zhing/ /de bzhin dus ma yin pa'i zas/ /dri dang phreng ba dang ni brgyan/ /gar dang glu sogs spang bar bya/ /ji ltar dgra bcom rtag tu ni/ /srog gcod la sogs mi byed pa/ /de ltar srog gcod la sogs spang/ /bla med
339b3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub thob par shog/ sdug bsngal mang dkrug sems can kun/ /srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ ces pa lan gsum du bya'o/ /de ltar gso sbyong blangs nas dus kyi khyad par la nyin gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ thun gcig la sogs pa yang
339b4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de la bsnyung bar gnas pa 'am dkar gsum la brten pa yang rung bas 'phags ma sgrol ma lhag par gus pa'i blo rtse gcig par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis der gnas pa thams cad kyis bsam pa bcos la byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral
339b5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdung bdag gis gzung snyam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la bdag gis spyad snyam pa dang/ mdza' yas pa'i sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral snyam pa'i bsam pa rgyun mi
339b6(rgyud 'grel): 'chad pas cho ga thams cad bya'o/ /de nas sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i sa phyogs 'di rnams thams cad kyang gser gyi sa bzhi brdal pa la rin po che sna bdun
339b7(rgyud 'grel): dang baiDUryas mig mangs ris su bris pa'am shel bzhin pa ltar ba la rin po che sna tshogs pa'i phra bkod pa'i tshul khyad par 'phags pa/ kun nas rab tu dang ba dang ldan pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang tshad rab tu mnyam par 
340a1(rgyud 'grel): grub pa ste/ reg na bde zhing 'jam la mnyen pa phyogs mtshams rnams kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byas pa'i sa gzhi bltar ba kho na la rab tu mdzes pa dums brgyan pa/ nam mkha' 'am lag mthil ltar mnyam pa/ yangs
340a2(rgyud 'grel): shing bde ba 'byor pa dang ldan pa mnan na nem zhing bteg na 'bar ba/ dam grog dang g.yang sa dang cong rong dang bya skyibs dang bral ba/ gseg ma dang gyo dum dang tsher ma la sogs pa dang brel ba ste/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab
340a3(rgyud 'grel): pas brgyan cing mdzes par spras pa'i sa gzhi la nye bar 'tshe ba med pa'i chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa sgra snyan pa 'bab ba/ mtsho dang rdzing bu dang lter ka la sogs pa la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pas khebs pa/ mya ngan med pa dang u dum ba
340a4(rgyud 'grel): ra dang n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la yid du 'ong ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu g.yur zab dang ldan pa du mas brgyan pa/ rma bya dang khrung khrung dang bzhad dang sa ra la sogs pa g.yur za zhing ldem pa dang bcas pa'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs pas bdag
340a5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dang ldan pa/ seng ge dang glang po che rol pa dang/ kri Na dza Ti dang lto 'phye ba la sogs pa'i ri dags rnams kyang 'khrul ba med pa'i sems kyis dga' zhing brtse bar spyod pas byams pa la gnas pa dang/ pad+ma dang ku mu ta
340a6(rgyud 'grel): dang pun? dir? ka dang/ utpa la dang pad+ma ge sar la sogs pa kha dog dang dri la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas nye bar mdzes par byed pa'i sa gzhi dam pa dang/ phyogs mtshams thams cad kyang ga bur dang gla rtsi dang a ka ru dang tsan
340a7(rgyud 'grel): dan sbrul gyi snying po la sogs pas sa'i phyogs kun dri bsung chen pos yongs su khyab pas sems can thams cad kyi yid tshim par byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang mi 'am ci la sogs pa'i tshogs rab tu yang dag par rgyu zhing lha'i bu dang
340b1(rgyud 'grel): bu mo dang dri za'i bu mo la sogs pa'i tshogs rnams kyang dam pa chos kyi sgra dang ldan pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i glu dbyangs du ma sgrogs pa chos kyi ro'i dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas rang dang gzhan gyi rgyu yongs su dang ba chen po skyes pa thob par 'gyur pa zhi g.yas dang
340b2(rgyud 'grel): lhag mthong gi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma dang ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin las grub pas nye bar 'tshe ba'i gnod pa dang bral ba'i sa phyogs dam pa ste/ mdor na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rnam par bkod pa dang mtshungs par 'byor cing
340b3(rgyud 'grel): dar ba bde zhing skyid pa nyams dga' ba byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba'i sa phyogs dam par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ de yang chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa/ /chos
340b4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthu dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya a ra ha te samyaksaM bud+d+hA ya/ tadya thA/ oM su k+Sh+me su k+Sh+me/ sa ma sa ma ye shAn+te shAn+te
340b5(rgyud 'grel): a sa ma ro ye/ ya na m+b+he ta ra m+b+he ya sho ba ti ma hA te dzo ni ra ku le ni ro pa Na sarba bud+d+ha a tiSh+Thi te swAhA zhes sngags dang bcas pa 'di lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas sa phyogs dam pa rgya yongs su ma chad pa de dag gi dbus su sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
340b6(rgyud 'grel): dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthu khyad par can las grub pa'i zhing gi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing sna tshogs pa rin po che las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang dam pa la khor yug chen po'i rgyan gyis nye bar
340b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzes bar spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis phyi dang nang kun tu gang bas dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba las byung ba'i bde bar gshegs pa'i gzhal yas khang chen por yongs su grub pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
341a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa nyid kyi phyir sgo bzhi dang ldan pa dang/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir gru bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i phyir bsil khang bzhi dang/ rdzu
341a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pas khrus khang gi rdzing bu bzhi yis spras pa dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po che'i stegs gru bzhi las gnas shing bum pa las byung ba'i rin
341a3(rgyud 'grel): po che'i ka ba las nor bu du mas mdzes par bcings pa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa bcu gnyis dang ldan zhing gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag pas bang rim bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rta babs kyis mdzes pa/ sems can
341a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi rgyud tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la brtse ba chen po dang ldan pas gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha dang/ mu tig la sogs pas spras ba'i ri dags pho mo gnyis kyi brgyan pa dang/ rta babs kyi logs de dag la yang lha'i na bza' 
341a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bla re dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan dang kha dog sna tshogs me tog gi phreng ba dang gser dang nor bu sna tshogs pas brgyan cing mdzes par gyur pa dang/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du
341a6(rgyud 'grel): dag pas rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs pa las rin po che gzhan gyis kha dog gis legs par spras pa'i 'dod yon gyi snam bu shel bzhin du bstar ba dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang ldan pas rin po che'i snam bu kha dog lnga'i rin po che'i
341a7(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba brgyus pas mig mangs ris su bris pas mdzes pa'i logs rnams dang/ me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'i rnam par dag pas dngul dang/ gser dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ in+d+ra nI la dang/ bai bUrya las grub pa'i rtsig pa yang rgya dang
341b1(rgyud 'grel): dbang su mtshams pa las/ /sgyu ma lta bu dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par sprul pa dang/ chos yang dag par grub pa'i phyir dra ba dang/ dra ba phyed pa 'phyang ba dang/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i do shal kyang bar bar du spras pa la dra ba'i nang du pad+ma dang zla ba dang/ rdo rje
341b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ nyi ma dang/ nor bu la sogs pa du mas brgyan pa'i steng du sku gsung thugs kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan pas na rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i zar chogs dang ldan pa dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs
341b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi yon tan du ma dang ldan pas dngul las grub pa'i rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi mnga' yab la rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams kyi spras pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i so sor nges pa'i phyir rin po che'i dbyug pa rtse gsum pa dang rnam
341b4(rgyud 'grel): par rol ba mi'i rgyal mtshan la gser gyi dril bu g.yer ga nges par bcings pa la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i ras kyi rlung gis bskyod pa'i 'khyog pa dang bcas pa spyangs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ bden pa dang/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i rang
341b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin gyi gdugs bzhi dang/ rnga yab dang/ dung dang me tog gi chun 'phyang gis brgyan pa'o/ /phyi nang gi dngos po yang ma bsgribs par gsal zhing rig pa dang ldan pas rang bzhin las grub pa'i ka ba dang gdung la sogs pa yang so sor mnga' thang dang
341b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams par grub pa dang/ pad+ma'i ze 'bru la sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su chos nyid mi 'khrug pa'i de kho na nyid la nges par gnas pa'i phyir brtan par byas pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams su khor yug la bum pa bzang po las 'thon pa dgongs pa nges
341b7(rgyud 'grel): par bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub kyi shing rnams la 'khor la sogs pa'i rin po che sna bdun dang tshal dang pags pa la sogs pa'i nye ba'i rin po che rnams dang/ gzhan yang bdag med pa'i rin po che sgra dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong bas sems
342a1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su tshim par byed pa'i dbyangs du ma dang ldan pa'i ri dags kyi rgyal po rnams dang/ ngang pa'i rgyal po dang/ rma bya dang shin tu mi 'am ci pho mo dang sprin dang khrus kyi rdzing bu las lus phyed 'thon pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa rnams
342a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis brgyan pa dang/ mdor na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs rnams kyi so so'i bsod nams dang ye shes las grub pa gang yang ma tshang ba med pa gzhal yas khang dam par byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum
342a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthu dang/ chos kyi dbyings las grub pa'i byin rlabs dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i mthus de bzhin du gyur cig/ na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dza ta thA ga tA ya
342a4(rgyud 'grel): arha te samyksaM b+hud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM bi ma la sarba saM ska ra sid+d+ha s+tha na sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa s+tha ku Da g+ha ra a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA zhes lan gsum du brjod pa dang bsam par bya'o// //de nas de ltar byin gyis brlab pa'i gzhal yas khang
342a5(rgyud 'grel): de dag gi dbus su seng ge'i khri pad+ma'i snying po zla ba rab tu rgyas pa'i gdan la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
342a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa dang/ de dag gi phrin las ma lus pa grub par byed pa'i rig pa'i
342a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo 'phags ma sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams kyang so so'i zhing khams dang/ gnas nas rang gi gdan 'dzoms pa la di ring mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren/ cing mchis na/ che ge mo la sogs pa mdza' yas pa'i 'gro ba
342b1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus pa bla na med pa'i go 'phang la dgod pa'i phyir/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can la gzhes te/ deng gnas 'dir byon par ci gnang/ /zhes lan gsum du bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
342b2(rgyud 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
342b3(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don yod grub pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
342b4(rgyud 'grel): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum du gyur pa rdo rje sgrol ma dang/ rin chen sgrol ma dang/ pad+ma'i sgrol ma dang/ las kyi sgrol ma dang/ bdug spos sgrol ma dang/ me tog sgrol ma dang/ mar me sgrol ma dang/ dri mchog sgrol ma la sogs pa rnam ?
342b5(rgyud 'grel): chog mo la sogs pa mdza' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i go 'phang la dgod pa'i phyir/ /de ring mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas so so'i
342b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing khams dang gnas nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las bzhengs nas yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par gdan 'dzom par byon par gnang bar 'dzod cig ces lan gsum mo/ /deng sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ?
342b7(rgyud 'grel): yum du gyur pa rig pa'i rgyal mo chos kyis sprin gser du snang ba'i sgrol ma dang/ yang dag pa'i mdza' rab tu mi g.yo ba'i sgrol ma dang/ chos kyi don yang dag par sngon du gyur pa'i sgrol ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi blo gros sgrol ma
343a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ kun nas 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i sgrol ma dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad ring du gyur pa'i sgrol ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi 'od byed pa'i sgrol ma dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rab tu
343a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs par gyur ba'i sgrol ma dang dri ma med par rab tu snang pa'i sgrol ma dang/ yon tan gyi tshogs ma lus pa rab tu dga' ba'i sgrol ma dang/ rnam par grol bar gyur pa shes rab sgrol ma dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sgrol
343a3(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs mnyam par mnyam pa'i sgrol ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i stabs kyis sgrol ma dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las la brtson pa'i sgrol ma dang/ smon lam gyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu
343a4(rgyud 'grel): phyin pa'i sgrol ma dang/ brtul zhugs mchog tu gyur pa'i rab tu bzod pa'i sgrol ma dang/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ldan pa'i sgrol ma dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan ma lus par 'gyed pa'i sgrol ma dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
343a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma dang/ chos thams cad kyi srog rnam par 'dzin pa'i sgrol ma dang/ sems dang las rab tu mkhyen pa'i sgrol ma dang/ yo byad kyi dbang phyug za ma tog gi sgrol ma dang/ las dang skye ba yang dag par mkhyen cing grub pa'i sgrol ma dang/ thabs nges par
343a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par sgrol ba'i sgrol ma dang/ chos yang dag par grub pa rgya mtsho'i sgrol ma dang/ smon lam gyi mchog legs pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrol ma dang/ mos pa'i rtsa ba rab tu brtan pa chos kyi sgrol ma dang/ rdzu 'phrul kun nas nges par 'gro ba'i sgrol ma dang/
343a7(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pas rnam par mdzes pa'i dpal gyi sgrol ma dang/ rin po che'i blo yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrol ma dang/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma dang/ kun nas 'od zer rnam par 'gyed pa'i sgrol ma dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang 'dzin
343b1(rgyud 'grel): ri khrod lo ma'i sgrol ma dang/ shes rab kyi sgo yang dag par 'phel ba'i sgrol ma dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad mi zad pa'i ye shes za ma tog gi sgrol ma dang/ las thams cad yang dag par sbyor zhing 'dren pa'i sgrol ma dang/ spongs pa ma lus par skyed
343b2(rgyud 'grel): cing dug sel ba'i sgrol ma dang/ rnam par bkod pa kun nas mdzes pa tsun da'i sgrol ma dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal rnam par mdza' yas pa'i sgrol ma la sogs pa yang/ che ge mo la sogs mdza' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i byang chub
343b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'god pa'i phyir di ring dpung gnyen dang mgon skyabs su spyan 'dren cing mchis na/ so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can gzhes te thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ /spyan gyis gzigs nas yid du 'ong pa'i pho brang dam
343b4(rgyud 'grel): par mchod pa'i tshogs 'byor pa'i dbus na gdan 'dzom pa chen po la byon par mdzod cig /ces lan gsum du bya'o/ /deng 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ byang chub sems
343b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi bzad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
343b6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' chen po nam mkha' i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
343b7(rgyud 'grel): po byad na rdo rje dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bar 'gro ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dbang
344a1(rgyud 'grel): phyug dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas chen thob dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan song kun sbyod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
344a2(rgyud 'grel): dra ba'i 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spobs pa brtsegs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od mdza' yas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan kun sel dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
344a3(rgyud 'grel): po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad sel ba la sogs pa rnams kyang/ che ge mo la sogs pa mdza' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i go 'phang la dgod par bya ba'i phyir
344a4(rgyud 'grel): de ring mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las bzhengs te/ thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par mchod
344a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs 'byor pa'i dbus gdan 'dzom pa chen po la byon par mdzod cig dang zhes lan gsum du'o/ /deng dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis nges pa'i tshig yang dag par rig pa lcags kyu sgrol ma dang/ chos yang dag par rig pa zhags
344a6(rgyud 'grel): pa sgrol ma dang/ spobs pa yang dag par rig pa lcags sgrog sgrol ma dang/ don yang dag par rig pa dril bu sgrol ma la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo skyong ba rnams kyang che ge mo la sogs pa mdza' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa bla na med pa'i byang chub la dgod
344a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir/ de ring mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis na/ so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa nas sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las glegs nas thugs kyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs te/ yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam
344b1(rgyud 'grel): bar mchod pa'i tshogs 'byor pa'i dbus gdan 'dzom pa chen po la byon bar mdzed cig dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyis byin gyis brlab dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthu dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i stobs kyis de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /na mo ratna tra ya ya
344b2(rgyud 'grel): a mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ arha te sa myaksaM bud+d+ha ya/ na ma Arya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwA ya mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tadya thA/ oM tA re tA re tut+tA re tut+tA re tu re tu re ku ma ri pad+ma gard+he sid+d+he b+ha ga ban/ /ak+Sho b+hya rat na saM b+ha ba bai ro tsa na a mo g+ha sid+d+hi badzra tA? ra?
344b3(rgyud 'grel): ratna tA ra pad+ma tA ra d+hu pa tA ra puShpa tA ra dI pa tA ra gand+ha tA ra sarba bud+d+hi bo d+hi satwa da sha dik bya ba lo kas+thi ta A gats+tsha A gats+tsha swA hA/ zhes lan gsum du'o/ /deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar dbang po dang me lha dang/ gshin rje dang/ srin po dang/ chu bdag
344b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rlung lha dang/ nor 'dzin dang/ dga' ldan dang/ tshangs pa dang/ thags bzangs ris dang/ sa'i lha mo dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ klu'i rgyal po rnams dang/ nag po chen po dang/ dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po dang/ gza' dang/ rgyu skar la sogs pa chos
344b5(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba'i srung ma mthu dang gzi brjid phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa rnams kyang so so'i zhing khams rnam par dag pa nas/ che ge mo la sogs pa mdza' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa'i tshe dang bsod nams la sogs spel ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dar zhing
344b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i slad du di ring mgon skyabs dang dpung gnyen du spyan 'dren zhing mchis ma sngon gyi thugs dam khyad par can las glengs te/ thugs dam gyis dgongs/ snyan gyis gsan/ spyan gyis gzigs nas yid du 'ong ba'i pho brang dam par gdan 'dzom pa chen po
344b7(rgyud 'grel): la byon par ci gnang zhes lan gsum du'o/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs dang/ che ge mo la sogs pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa ma lus par mngon sum du byon bar gyur pa rnams la/ sman gyi rgyal
345a1(rgyud 'grel): po rnams dang mchog tu gyur pa'i dri phun sum tshogs pa legs par sbyar ba rnams kyis chu shel gyi bum pa la rin po che du ma'i phra bkod pa'i tshul la nges par thon pa'i rgyun gyis rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i zhabs la bkru bar
345a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de yang phyogs mtshams rnams su dri zhim po'i ngang dang ldan pa'i tsan dan dang a ka ru dang du ru ka la sogs pa mi las khyad par 'phags pa dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar bar byed pa'i lha rdzas mchog tu gyur pas bla ma dang de bzhin gshegs pa sas dang
345a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa dkyil 'khor du nges par grub pa rnams kyi sku la byugs par bya'o/ /de yang dri ma med cing yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bdud rtsi mo ma'i rgyun lta bur dkar zhing bsil ba legs 'dzin gyi dbang po tshim par byed pa phyi dang nang rnams khyad
345a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag par sbyar ba'i chus bla ma dam pa rnams dang rgyal ba sras dang bcas kyi zhal bsil zhing mnyes par bya'o// //na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hya(rgyud 'grel): bo d+hi satwa b+hya(rgyud 'grel): sa ta tsa ra ni li bya pra ba ra sad ka ra arg+haM pra tits+tsha any+tsa ma ye swAhA/ /de ltar chu gsum
345a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi mnyes par byas pa las dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang/ tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i mnga' thang dang/ rig sngags kyi mthus de bzhin du gyur cig/ de ltar de'i byin gyis brlab kyis sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
345a6(rgyud 'grel): snyed dang mnyam pa'i zhabs 'bring du gyur cig /'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab thams cad dang mnyam pa'i grangs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mnyes par byed par rgyur cing?/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par spyod pa dang/ rgyal

345b4(rgyud 'grel): cad kyi gnod pa zhi bar gyur cig /de nas sngar spyan drangs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing zhabs la gtugs pa'i phyag gsum gsum bya'o/ /gdan 'dzom pa chen po la bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas
345b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs rnams la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi'i me tog gi bye brag rang rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yid las byung ba dang/ chu dang thang dang spang ri dang/ ljon shing las khrungs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs phun

345b7(rgyud 'grel): A puShpe pu tsa me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi bdug pa'i bye brag rang bzhin ni ting nge 'dzin las byung ba dang/ lhan cig skyes pa dang/ rab tu sbyar ba la sogs pa'i phyogs thams

346a2(rgyud 'grel): bo d+hi satwA naM oM A(rgyud 'grel): d+hu pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu tra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi snang ba'i bye brag yid las byung ba 'am rin po che las skyes pa 'am 'bru mar la sogs pa la
346a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba dang/ nyi ma dang zla ba dang rab tu snang bar gyur pas phyogs mtshams go 'byed pa legs par 'khrungs shing 'bar bas lus can rnams kyi mig gi dbang por gsal bar byed pa'i mar me'i phreng ba la sogs pa yang gdan 'dzom pa chen po la

346b6(rgyud 'grel): yab dang/ lnga lding dang/ phreng rgyud dang/ nor bu la sogs pa dgos pa'i yo byad dang/ blo rten dang/ sku yol dang/ na bza' dang/ mtho ba'i stan dag mal cha dang/ ngo mtshar ba'i rab tu bde ba'i rkyen rtsi la sogs pa yang gdan 'dzom pa chen

347a3(rgyud 'grel): blon po dang/ shugs 'gro'i rta dang/ dpa' brtan glang po dang/ brtul phong dmag mi la sogs pa'i rin po che rnam pa bdun dang/ gdugs bzangs gser g.yu can dang/ dung dkar dang/ chu skyes dang/ gser nya dang/ bum mchog dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/

347a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi'o/ /na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM sid+d+ha sa pa ta ratna aSh+Ta maM ga la pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra spha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na lha dang mi rnams kyi khyad par 'phags pa'i bye brag la mchod pa'i rdzas

348a1(rgyud 'grel): nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang sdig pa thams cad nyams pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad mi 'byung ba dang/ rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zlog pa dang/ dus ma yin par 'bum pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi

349b1(rgyud 'grel): chags kyi sgrib pa dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib pa'i tshogs ba ma lus pa rnam par dag pa dang byang bar gyur cig /mdza' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pa rnams kyi nyes skyon du gyur pa thams cad dag

349b4(rgyud 'grel): cig /dbyings dang kha 'thor la gnas pa'i dur 'gro glen zhing gti mug pa rnams kyang rang rang gi sdug bsngal dang bral nas lha la sogs pa'i lus su gyur cig /ltung ba la sogs lus dang sems gzir ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa
349b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal ma lus pa yang byad nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod par gyur cig /skye rgas na 'chi la sogs ma sdug bsngal bcu gcig gis rab tu mnar ba'i 'gro ba mi rnams kyang rtag tu bde legs
349b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi spyod par gyur cig /dkon mchog gsum gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin du gyur cig /deng rgyal ba sras dang bcas bcas pa rnams la phyag byas nas mchod de che ge mo la sogs pa'i mdza' yas pa'i sems can ma
349b7(rgyud 'grel): lus pa rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings mdza' klas pa nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa 'phags pa rnams kyi dge pa dang/ skye bo la sogs pa gzhan dag gis mngon par mtho ba dang
350a1(rgyud 'grel): nges bar legs pa'i rgyur gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mdza' dag la dga' zhing spro ba chen po dang ldan pas snying gi dkyil nas yi rang ngo/ /gzhan dag gi dge ba thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas par gyur cig /sangs rgyas thams cad

350b2(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa la che ge mo la sogs pa mdza' yas pa'i 'gro ba ma lus pas kyang bslob par bya'o/ /rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i dus su bde bas brgyan cing dri ma med par dag pa'i theg pa lam myur zhing thabs mang ba dang bka' ba med pas 'jug pa rab tu bde ba bla na med
