355a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba dang/ de kho na nyid mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid dang/ mi 'gyur ba nyid dang/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid dang/ 'byung ba med pa nyid dang/ 'jigs pa med pa nyid dang/ rtsod pa med pa nyid du ston par gyur cig/ rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa'i chos
355a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsung dri ma med pa de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngos mnyam pa des 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa rnams la thogs pa med cing khyab par gyur cig/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab?
355a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhal du med brjod du med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing/ snying rje chen pos zin pa'i sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par ston par gyur cig/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas mu med pa bzhin du rgyal sras dang bcas pa'i mkhyen pa dang/ brtse ba

360a3(rgyud 'grel): me tog gi phreng ba dbul lo/ /cho ga 'di ni rab gnas dang/ sbyin bsreg dang/ dbang bskur la sogs pa'i bya ba la slob dpon dang/ slob mar bcas pa'i rgyud yongs su dag par byed pa'o/ /dgos pa'i dbang gis mchod pa dang/ dkyil 'khor mngon par 'byung
360a4(rgyud 'grel): ba 'am/ bya ba la ni sngon du mtshan gyis bstod pa'i dngos gzhi stong phrag brgyad sgrogs par bya'o/ /cho ga dngos la zhugs pa na yan lag gi khyad par re re la yang ci nus pa'i phyag bya'o/ /shin tu rgyas par bshad zin to// //mdor bsdus pa
360a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ yang dga' ba rnams dang/ phyag la sogs pa bya ba dang/ sdom gyi tshig le'ur byas pa/ phyogs rnams gtsang zhing cha nyen pa dang/ /kun du dri dang ldan gyur pa/ /bde ba can gyi zhing khams ltar/ /sa gzhi byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/ /phyi nang ma bsgribs
360a6(rgyud 'grel): gsal ba dang/ /rin chen rnams las grub pa yi/ /thub pa dbang po sras bcas kyi/ /gzhal yas khang du byin brlab po/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sras/ /bka' sdong phyogs skyong ma lus pa/ /de ring spyan 'dren
360a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol/ /gtsang zhing dri zhim bsil ba yi/ /dri chab bdud rtsi'i rgyun lta bus/ /rgyal ba sras bcas ma lus pa/ /chu gsum gyis ni mnyes par bgyi'o/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i bla ma lha/ /rin chen gsum gyi nam mkha' la/ /til gyi gang bu ltar dmigs
360b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /sgo gsum gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /me tog la sogs nyer spyod dang/ /rgyal srid bdun dang grub pa'i rdzas/ /mchod sprin nam mkha' gang dmigs lte/ /'gro ba spral phyir dbul bar bgyi'o/ /bdag dang sems can mkha' mnyam gyis/ /thog med dus nas da
360b2(rgyud 'grel): lta'i bar/ /ma lus sdig pa ci bgyis pa/ /shin tu 'gyod bas bshags par bgyi'o/ /mngon mtho des legs rgyur gyur pa'i/ /skye bo'i dge ba gang bgyis pa/ /lhag par spro par yi rang ngo/ /sgo gsum bsdams shing mi dge bcom/ /ched du bya bas gzhan don
360b3(rgyud 'grel): brtson/ /lam bde che ges chung 'jug pa zab/ /sdom pa gsum la gnas par bgyi/ /btang ba dka' ba'i lus 'di ni/ /mgon dang bde gshegs sras bcas la/ /bran g.yog nyid du dbul lags kyi/ /deng nas khyed kyi 'bangs su mchis/ /rgyal srid bu dang chu
360b4(rgyud 'grel): ma dang/ /'bru dang ? blang bran du bcas/ /sa gzhi gser mogs? rin po che/ /gus pas thugs mchog rnams la mchod/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims sgom pa dang/ /thos pas tshogs gnyis cibs gsang/ /dus gsum bsdus pa'i dge ba gang/ /thub pa chos kyi
360b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan la dbul/ /sgeg 'dzum ldem zhing brjid pa dang/ /rngam zhing khros pas khro bo'i gzugs/ /sras bcas sku yi dkyil 'khor la/ /dang pas mig mi 'dzum bar blta'o/ /sangs rgyas byang chub ma lus pa'i/ /tshe dang yon tan mthu stobs dang/ /sku gsum
360b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa ma lus la/ /dbyangs snyan ngag gis bstong par bgyi'o/ /bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dang/ /yi dam dkyil 'khor lha tshogs te/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu gus pas skyabs su mchi/ /rgyal bas byang chub mchog brnyes nas/ /cung zad snyoms
360b7(rgyud 'grel): par zhugs pa la/ /tshangs pa lta bu gus pa yis/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /byang chub mdzad pa mthar phyin nas/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das bzhes pa/ /ji srid 'khor ba mdza' yod pa/ /sems can don du bzhugs par gsal/ /ji ltar
361a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi skyob pa yis/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang sems can phyir/ /byang chub chen por sems bskyed do/ /rgyal sras 'jig rten skyong rnams la/ /sku gsum grub dang rig pa 'dzin/ /las chogs bon las rnam
361a2(rgyud 'grel): dbye sogs/ /las bcol de ni grub par mdzod/ /'dir na nyes pa gang byas pa/ /gang yang lus can skyabs gyur pa/ /ma 'tshal ba rnams bshags par bgyi/ /gtso bos ci nas bka' gnang 'tshal/ /la 'bras bu mchog dang thun mong ste/ /ma nor cho ga don shes
361a3(rgyud 'grel): rab dang/ /spobs pa mthu rtsal phun tshogs pa'i/ /dngos grub de dag gnang bar rigs/ /dus gsum bsags pa'i dge ba ni/ /tshogs gnyis bdud rtsi lta bu 'dis/ /sku gsum 'bras bu grub gyur nas/ gzhan don 'bad med 'byung bar shog/ de ltar bya ba ma
361a4(rgyud 'grel): lus pa mthar phyin nas dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'am/ dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /yi ge brgya ba ci nus bla bzlas par bya'o/ phongs pa rnams mgu ba dang/ gzhi bdag la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /lha thams cad la mchod pa lha grangs
361a5(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam par byas pas mchod pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor la 'jug bri med cho ga 'dis/ /'gro rnams mun pa gsal nas dkyil 'khor du/ /ma lus zhugs nas bde ba che rtogs te/ /bde ba can gyi zhing du myur bgrod shog /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i
361a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyas pa'i slob dpon chen po b+ha ba b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mahA paN+Di ta sh+rI bi ma la kirti'i zhal snga nas dang/ lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa zhang grub pa dpal
361a7(rgyud 'grel): bzang pos bal bo'i grong khyer yam bu'i nub phyogs nyi ma'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tsin+ta ma Ni tAM ra sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma yid bzhin nor bu de nas bya ba'i sgrub thabs
361b1(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya bas/ /tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang/ /gzhan yang 'dod pa sgrub byed pa/ /sgrol ma la btung sgrub thabs bri/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas rang gi sems nyid tAM gser btso ma'i?
361b2(rgyud 'grel): dog lta bur blta ste/ 'od zer spros bsdus nas yongs su gyur?  pa las rin po che 'aM? byis? mtshan pa bsam/ de la yang spro bsdu byas te gyur pa las bdag nyid sgrol ma gser btso ma'i mjog lta bu la zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma pad+ma dang nyi ma la zhabs
361b3(rgyud 'grel): sgeg pa'i gar stabs kyis bzhugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan can phyag g.yas kyi rin po che brla'i thad kar bzung ba/ dpag bsam gyi shing la rgyab brten pa'i yal ga phyag g.yon gyi gzung ba/ de'i thugs kar rin po che hUM gis mtshan pa bsam?/
361b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan dang sa bon las 'od 'phros pas sems can/ thams cad kyi dbul ba'i sdug bsngal bsal te tshur 'dus pas rang gi sku bsal btab cing slar thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas ye shes pa bzhug pa dang/ dbang bskur bya ste/ rin chen 'byung
361b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyis rgyas gdab bo/ /snga ma ltar 'ong spro zhing bsdugs sku bsal btab cing mi skye ba'i bar du bsgom/ skyo bar gyur na bzlas pa bya ste rang gi sa bon dang sngags las 'phros pa'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud bskal te/ 'bru
361b6(rgyud 'grel): dang rin po che la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad kyi char bab par bsam zhing dag tu oM tA re tut+tA re tu re tsin+ta ma Ni d+harb+hya birb+hya swAhA/ /de las skyo na ye shes pa gshegs te dam tshig pa mi dmigs par bya/ dge ba bsngo 'o/ /sgrol ma yid
361b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tA ra Da pe ba d+hi/ bod skad du sgrol ma'i khrus kyi cho ga/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khrus kyi cho ga la gsum
362a1(rgyud 'grel): te/ sbyor ba dang/ dngos gzhi dang/ rjes so/ /dang po ni gnas yid dang mthum par phyag dar la sogs pa byas te/ bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par rdzas gzhan dang mthun par bsags te shel med du mi ring bar mchod pa rnams sta gon
362a2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /dngos gzhi ni sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas stong pa'i ngang las sems nyid tAM dkar por blta'o/ /de las 'od 'phros bsdus nas bdag nyid sgrol ma mdog dkar mo pad+ma dang zla ba rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis mnyam
362a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhag gi steng na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can du bskyed par bya'o/ /bum pa yang mi dmigs pa las phyi phum pa las nang rin po che'i gzhal yas
362a4(rgyud 'grel): khang chu bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su pad+ma'i pa Ta'i sdong po la rang 'dra'i dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed/ de'i mdun na las kyi khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dmar ser bzhengs pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i thal mo sbyar ba'i dbus na rin po che'i buM
362a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bdud rtsi 'bab pa bsnams pa/ zhim khro gtso mo la blta ba bsam mo/ /de dag la ye shes pa gzhug dbang bskur rgyas gdag de nas rdo rje gzungs thag dang bcas pa bum pa'i steng du gzhag dang bum pa'i lha gnyis ka'i thugs kar zla
362a6(rgyud 'grel): ba la sa bon dang zlas pa'i sngags bsam ste/ rang gi gzungs thag gzung nas ngag tu/ oM tA re tut+tA re a mri ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba pA paM hUM phaT swAhA/ /zhes brjod pas sngags gzungs thag la 'khril nas bum pa'i lha gnyis
362a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i thugs kar phog de las 'od 'phros de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs bskul/ /ye shes kyi bdud rtsi spyan drangs lha gnyis po'i bum pa la phog bdud rtsi lus 'og gi bdud rtsi dang dbyer med du bsam mo/ /de ltar gso sbyong la gnas pa
362b1(rgyud 'grel): dus ni tshes brgyad nas pha rol gyi tshes brgyad kyi par ram/ grangs ni 'bum gsum rtags ni chu khol ba la sogs pa dang lha'i zhal mthong ba'o/ /rjes la ye shes pa gshegs te dam tshig pa rang la bsdus nas rang lha'i nga rgyal gyis rang gzhan chu des bkrul
362b2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ sdig pa la sogs te mi mthun pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs kun tu gtor na yams nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyugs la gtor na phyugs nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /me la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa la gtor na thams cad spong ngo/ /sgrol ma'i
362b3(rgyud 'grel): khrus kyi cho ga slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha Ta sa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du kho sha ta bid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ gso sbyong gi cho ga rje btsun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku gzugs mdun du bzhugs la sems bskyed bya/ po ta la nas
362b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma dang sku gzugs gnyis su med par bsam/ /yan lag smad lnga khrus byas la/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'khor dang bcas pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa'i phyag bya/ /dngos sam yid kyis mchod pa dbul/ /bstod pa gang yang rung
362b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshor gsum bsgrags/ /sku gsung thugs mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ rtsa ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bgreng/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i yan lag gzhan yang byas la/ lus tsog tsog pur 'dug la me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar te/ cho ga 'di lan gsum
362b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas gso sbyong rang gis blangs par 'gyur te/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das sgrol ma
362b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag la dgongs su gsol ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sa chen po dang lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sems can thams cad la phan
363a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba'i phyir dang/ bde bar bya ba'i phyir dang/ tshul khrims kyi phung ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang/ rnam par grol pa'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gso sbyong nges par bya ste/ yang dag
363a2(rgyud 'grel): par blangs pa de bzhin du/ bdag ming 'di zhes bya bas kyang/ dus da nas gzung nas gdugs rtse shar gyi bar du sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir dang bde zhes bya ba'i phyir dang/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang/ shes rab kyi phung po dang rnam par grol pa'i ? ?
363a3(rgyud 'grel): grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gso sbyong nges par bya ste/ yang dag par blangs par bgyi'o/ /deng nas srog gcod mi bya zhing/ /gzhan gyi nor yang blang mi bya/ /'khrig pa'i chos kyang mi spyad de/ brdzun gyi tshig kyang mi smra'o/ /skyon ni mang po
363a4(rgyud 'grel): nyams bsten pas/ /chang ni yongs su spang bar bya/ /khri stan chen po mi bya zhing/ /de bzhin dus ma yin pa'i zas/ /dri dang phreng ba dang ni rgyan/ /gar dang glu sogs spang bar bya/ /ji ltar dgra bcom rtag tu ni/ /srog gcong la sogs mi byed pa/ /de ltar srog gcod la sogs spang/ /bla
363a5(rgyud 'grel): med byang chub thob par shog/ sdug bsngal mang dkrugs sems can rnams/ /srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog ces brjod do/ /lci ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod cing snyung bar gnas pas bsgrub pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa byas na mtshams
363a6(rgyud 'grel): med pa lnga'i las byas pa yang nges par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sku dngos su mthong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan mthal med pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dus ni yar ngo'i tshes brgyad yin no/ /dkar gsum dang dus cung zad thung ba la sogs pa ci rigs pas kyang btug go/ /gso sbyong rang gis
363a7(rgyud 'grel): blang ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// //sgrol ma'i dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha Tas mdzad pa'o/ /mahA puN+Di ta sh+rI rat na ra kI tA dang/ lots+tsha bzhad grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tA ra maN+Dal bid+hi bod skad du/ sgrol ma'i maN+Dal gyi
363b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngags yongs su dag pa dang/ sgrib pa zad par 'gyur ba dang/ dngos grub myur du thob par 'dod pas maN+Dal gyi cho ga brtson par bya'o/ /sngags pas yan lag lnga bkrus te khyor bar chu cung zad blugs la ngag tu oM A(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta
363b2(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM zhes brjod nas rang gi spyi bor blugs pas rang lha dang spyi gtsug gi dbang rtags dran par bya'o/ /de nas me tog la lag pa bkab ste dag tu/ oM na mo b+ha ga ba te puShpe ke tu rA dzE ya ta thA ga ta ya arha te samyaksaM b+hud+d+ha ya/ tadya thA/ oM puShpa duShpe mahA duShpe du puShpe
363b3(rgyud 'grel): puShpo h+d+ha ge puShpa pA kIr+N+Na swAhA/ zhes brjod pas me tog byin gyis brlab bo/ de nas chu cung zad blangs te ngag tu oM rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phaT ces pas gnas dang bdag bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra b+hu me hUM 'dis maN+Dal bsrung bar bya'o/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzre ge be hUM 'dis maN+Dal
363b4(rgyud 'grel): byug par bya'o/ /lag pa de'i rgyab tu me tog gzung ste maN+Dal gyi dbus su gzhag pas bsrung bar bya'o/ /de nas oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM gis me tog dang bcas pa'i lag pas rang gi gnas gsum byin gyis brlab bo/ /de nas me tog gcig gzung ste oM sarba bod+hi sor ya hUM
363b5(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes pa maN+Dal la bskor zhing por bas bgegs dang bral bar bya'o/ /de nas skad cig la maN+Dal mi dmigs pa las rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du bsam pa'i nang du me tog gzung ste/ oM tsaN+Da arka bi ma Ni b+hya swAhA/ zhes me tog maN+Dal gyi dbugs su gzhag bas
363b6(rgyud 'grel): skad cig la sgrol ma lha bcu gsum mam bco lnga la sogs pa bskyed par bya'o/ /de rnams la oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes me tog blangs te gtor bas ye shes pa dbang du byas par bsgom/ /de nas zhabs bsil dang/ zhal bsil dang/ bsang chu gsum ni oM pra pa ra sad ka ra pra
363b7(rgyud 'grel): tIts+tsha ye dang/ oM any+tsa mA nAM dang/ oM prok+Sha swAhA zhes pas rim pa ltar dbul/ /de nas phyag bya'o/ /de nas lag pa gnyis kyis me tog gzung ste/ oM tA re tut+tA re puShpe swAhA/ /zhes pas gtso mo'i dbu la dngul lo/ /oM badzra tA ri puShpe swAhA/ /shar du'o/ /oM ratna tA re puShpe
364a1(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ /lho ru'o/ /oM pad+ma tA re puShpe swAhA/ nub du'o/ /oM karma tA re puShpe swAhA/ /byang du'o/ /oM puShpe tA re puShpe swAhA shar lhor ro/ /oM d+hu pa tA re puShpe swAhA lho nub tu'o/ /oM dI pA tA re puShpe swAhA nub byang du'o/ /oM gand+he tA re puShpe swAhA byang shar da'o/ /
364a2(rgyud 'grel): oM A ku sha tA re puShpe swAhA shar sgor ro/ /oM pA sha tA re puShpe swAhA lho sgor ro/ /oM spho Ta tA re puShpe swAhA nub sgor ro/ /oM g+haN+Da tA re puShpe swAhA byang sgor ro/ /lha mo bco lngar byed na/ oM uSh+NI Sha tA re puShpe swAhA shar sgo'i de'i rgyab tu'o/ /oM sum+b+ha tA ra puShpe swAhA nub sgor
364a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyab tu'o/ /de bzhin du lha'i rigs gzhan yang shes par bya'o/ /de nas gong ma ltar rang rang gi sngags kyis bdug spos shangs la dri thugs kar mar me spyan la lha shes ljags la rol mo snyan la dbul lo/ gzhan yang nye bar mkho bo dang spyad pa'i dgos pa
364a4(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya ste/ bkur stis mchod pa la bstod pa ci rigs par bsgrags par bya'o/ /de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa'i yan lag gzhan rnams kyang byas la 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pa ste/ lhag chad skong pa la yi ge brgya ba ci rigs par
364a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod do/ /de nas lha de rnams kyi ye shes pa gshegs te/ dam tshig pa rang la bsdus dge ba bsngo bar bya'o/ /'di ni bya ba gzhan thams cad dang 'brel bar shes par bya'o/ /sgrol ma'i maN+Dal gyi cho ga snyan dngags mkhan po snying rje che bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
364a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ tA ra a grA pra b+hi na ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma mchog thob pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas stong pa nyid kyi bar bsgoms te/ skad cig la rang sgrol mar bsgoms pa'i thugs kar tAM in+d+ra ni la'i mdog
364a7(rgyud 'grel): lta bu blta bar bya'o/ /lus skyil krung la tshigs pa drang por srang ste mnyam gzhag gi phyag rgya la sogs te lus gnang lnga dang ldan pas rlung rgyu ba spangs te lte ba las me rab tu sbyar nas/ /spyi gtsug nas thig le phab ste tAM la phog/ tAM las byang chub kyi sems zhun
364b1(rgyud 'grel): tshul du lus thams cad la khyab pas bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par bsam zhing srog rtsol la 'bad na zhag bdun gyi dngos su skye bar 'gyur te/ byang sems 'dzag na gdams ngag dran par bya/ /de nas tAM las 'od spros te snod bcud thams cad rang la
364b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus rang yang tAM la bsdus te tAM yang rim gyis mi dmigs par byas la yod pa dang med pa'i rtog pa spangs la/ stong pa nyid kyi bde ba la rgyas gdab bo/ /rtog pa la shes pa 'phro na snga ma ltar bde ba bsgom/ bde ba shes chen phyi ma ltar stong pa bsgom/ rtog
364b3(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan 'bral ba spangs te zla ba drug tu bsgoms na mchog thob par 'gyur ro/ /sgrol me mchog sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Ta b+ha ya tra NaM tA ra sA d+ha naM?/ bod skad
364b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po kho nar tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas/ skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang/ lam la gnas par khas? 'che ba dang/
364b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs su bsngo ba ste bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag go /de nas chos thams cad bdag med par lhag par mos la/ oM swa b+hA ba bud+d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM dang/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes brjod pas stong pa nyid du bsgoms pas ye
364b6(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi tshogs bsag go/ stong pa nyid kyi ngang las/ nam mkha' i dbyings de nyid du pad+ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rang gi sems nyid tI gyi rnam pa yongs su gyur pa las/ byung ba'i sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig ma phyag brgyad ma/ phyag
364b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa rnams kyis bgrang 'phreng dang mchog sbyin dang/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang/ rin po che 'dzin pa dang/ g.yon pa rnams kyis utpa la dang/ bum pa dang/ skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang/ po ti 'dzin pa rab tu zhi zhing lang tsho rgyas pa'i lus shin
365a1(rgyud 'grel): tu mdzis pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis mngon par spras shing smad? g.yogs kha dog sna tshogs can du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas oM e hye hi b+ha ga wa ti pra sA daM da yaM ku ru/ pU dza grih+Na a tra san+ni hi ho b+ha wa zhes pa'i sngags
365a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcom ldan 'das ma spyan drangs pa mdun na gnas pa la mngon par mchod de/ oM b+ha ga ba ti sa ma yai shwa ri sarbA nud+d+ha mA te tA re a d+hiSh+Tha naM me ku ru swAhA/ /zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gsol ba btab pas bdag nyid la nye bar zhugs pas snying
365a3(rgyud 'grel): gar bdag ci 'dra bar ye shes sems dpa' i dang/ de'i yang thugs kar tAM gyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' gnas par blta zhing de nyid kyi tshe 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob par byed pa'i sgrol ma rnams mngon par 'phros pa ni g.yas phyogs su
365a4(rgyud 'grel): seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma seng ge'i gdong pa can mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ spyan ser mo/ phyag gnyis pa/ mdog dmar po/ skra ser po/ thugs kar mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/
365a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sems can rnams seng ge'i 'jigs pa las sgrol bar bsgom par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i g.yon phyogs su glang po che'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma glang po che'i gdong pa can zhal gcig phyag gnyis
365a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ shangs mtho zhing mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsus pa 'phyang ba/ du ba'i mdog can mthe bong mngon par brkyang ba'i phyag gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad pa'i phyag rgya can/ sems can rnams glang po cha'i 'jigs pa las sgrol bar mdzad par bsgom par
365a7(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyi 'og tu me'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma dmar mo 'bar ba'i gdong pa can/ zhal bdun ma/ ljags bdun ma/ skra gyen du 'bar ba/ phyag gnyis ma/ phyag gnyis kyis pad+ma'i phyag rgya mdzad cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
365b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams me'i 'jigs pa las sgrol bar bsgom par bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs kyi 'og gi char/ sprul gyi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma kha dog nag po/ sprul mgo'i gdengs ka bcu dang ldan zhing skra grol ba rgyan thams cad kyis
365b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'i lus/ phyag gnyis kyis mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad cing/ sems can rnams sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las sgrol ba bsgom par bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyis 'og gi char choms rkun gyi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis
365b3(rgyud 'grel): ma/ sku mdog ljang gu /zhal khro gnyer bsdus pa/ skra gyen du brdzes la/ phyag g.yas pa ral gri 'phyar zhing g.yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i lus bzhengs pa sems can rnams choms rkun gyi 'jigs pa las sgrol bar bsgom
365b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs kyi 'og gi char lcags sgrog gi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis ma/ sku mdog dmar mo/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pas lcags kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i lus bzhengs pa/
365b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams lcags sgrog gi 'jigs pa las sgrol ba bsgom par bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs kyi 'og gi char chu'i 'jigs pa las sgrol ba'i sgrol ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma sku mdog dkar mo g.yas lcags sgrogs dang g.yon pas sdigs mdzub
365b6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa zhi ba'i sku bzhengs pa sems can rnams chu'i 'jigs pa las sgrol ba bsgom par bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs kyi 'og gi char sha za'i 'jigs pa las sgrol ba zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ sems dpa' i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ kun
365b7(rgyud 'grel): da dang zla ba'i mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i lus phyag g.yas pa dang/ g.yon pas mchog sbyin dang/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad cing sems can rnams sha za'i 'jigs pa las sgrol ba sgom par bya'o/ /yang snying ga'i tAM
366a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rigs lnga spyan drangs pa la mngon par mchod nas gsol ba btab pas sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur nas thams cad don yod grub pas dbu rgyan par bsgom par bya'o/ /sngags kyi tshig
366a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag yin te/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba b+ha ya sham ni sarba durga ti tA re Ni tu re swAhA/ /gtso mo'i sngags so/ /oM si ha pa da ni ma hA daMSh+Ti/ bi hyu dzi h+ri pi ga la/ nai tre/ gardza gardza ya tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i
366a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags so/ /oM di ra da ba da ni/ e ka daMSh+Ti ma hA na se la mo da ri kard+ha kard+ha twA sa ya trA sa ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ glang po che'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngags so/ /oM shi khi ba da ne ma hA u skA mu khi dzA lA ni sa ba
366a4(rgyud 'grel): ta dzi hi/ sa pa ta mu khaM wa shwa na re/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ me'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngags so/ /oM pha Ni ma hA pha Ni kriSh+Na ba da nai tre e kA pa sha dzi hA/ kA re Na tsa la ya/ tsa lA ya/ ma hA d+hi Sha b+hak+Sha Ni/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ sbrul gyi 'jigs
366a5(rgyud 'grel): pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngags so/ /oM kharga ha sti b+h+ri ku ri mu khi urd+ha ke Sha mahA na dAM kriSh+Na any+dza na war+Ne tshinda tshinda/ b+hinda b+hinda/ ut+ta ra ya/ ut+ta ra ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngags so/ /
366a6(rgyud 'grel): oM rak+ta war+Ne bA sha AM ku sh+ra ha ti ma hA ra wi/ ma hA ba le sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi? sa ra/ grih+Na grih+Na/ kad+d+ha kad+d+ha ma hA durg+ha na/ mU tsa ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ lcags sgrog gi 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngags so/ /oM dza le dza le ma hA dza le
366a7(rgyud 'grel): tA ra ya tA ra ya/ ut+tA ra ya/ sh+rIM la la hasti/ mahA dza we e kA pI ri mahA kA ru Ne ke tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ /chu'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA gam+b+hi rye mahA kA ru ne ke b+ha ga waM sa le/ pa ra a b+ha ya ha sti/ mahA ku ninda da bo?
366b1(rgyud 'grel): pra ha si da ra da ni/ mahA ku nindu da wa li/ pra ha si ha ba da ne/ mahA wasta pra pri ta sha rI re d+he nA/ was+thi ti tA ra ya tA ra ya/ ma hA ba ya/ tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ sha za'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sngags so/ /gang gis tshe bzlas pas yid skyob gyur pa de'i tshe ye
366b2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa mdun du phyung ba la mchod nas gshegs su gsol lo/ /rang nyid dam tshig pa'i nga rgyal gyis gnas par bya'o/ /'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
366b3(rgyud 'grel): kha che'i paNdi ta ta thA ga ta b+ha dra dang/ dge slong 'phags pas rgya'i yul cod du'i mkhar du bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI si ta tE ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/ dpal sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'chi ba'i skyon
366b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gos min la/ /zla ba drug gi mthar thug par/ /sgrol ma'i thugs kyi 'khor la ni/ /bsgrims bsgoms dngos grub thams cad rnyed/ /ngag gi dbang phyug gis byas pa'i/ /'chi ba slu ba kun bsdus pas/ /sgrol ma dkar mo phyung 'di ni/ /bsgoms pas 'jigs
366b5(rgyud 'grel): pa spong bar byed/ /bzhi pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa A/ /'od zer rnam 'gro nam mkha' ni/ /pad+ma dkar dang zla gdon la/ /bdun bltas gsum la skyabs 'gro brjod/ /yud tsam stong pa nyid bsgoms nas/ /so so skye bo'i 'khrul bcom ste/ /rdo rje smon la mthu nyid kyis/ /byang
366b6(rgyud 'grel): chub sems kyi yi ge bsgom/ /pad+ma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa/ /zla ba'i gzugs kyi gdan steng du/ /rdo rje skyil krung dang bcas shing/ /'dod sbyin ud+pa la 'dzin pa mo/ /ston ka'i 'od ltar dkar pa'i mdog /rgyab tu zla ba yang dag bsten/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su
366b7(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs/ bcu drug lo lon sku mnga' ba'i/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams de yis sras/ /yum gyur 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin ma/ /de yi snying dbus 'khor lo'i 'od/ /dkar mdangs 'phags ma sgrol ma bsgom/ /brgyad kyi rtsibs can brgyad rnams kyi/ /yi ge se yongs su
367a1(rgyud 'grel): gang ba nyid/ /oM ha yi ge'i dbus gnas pa/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ldan lte bar ro/ /zla ba drug tu nges brtan par/ /mi bde med pa'i sems yin pas/ /rtse gcig sems kyis bsgom bya zhing/ /yi ge bcu ba'i sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM yig thog mar byin byas nas/ /phyis
367a2(rgyud 'grel): tA re rab tu sbyar/ /tut+tA re 'dis tu re phyis/ /swAhA mdza' yin las kun la'o/ /tshangs dbang khyab 'jug zla nyi dang/ /drag po phyogs skyong 'dod pa'i lhas/ /ba spu'i rtse yang bskyod mi nus/ /'chi ba las rgyal grol rnams bzhin/ /gnyer ma skra dkar skal ngan dang/ /nad dang
367a3(rgyud 'grel): dbul po nyams? par byed/ /seng ge la sogs 'jigs chen brgyad/ /sdug bsngal tshogs rnams sel bar byed/ /bza' dang btung ba gos dad ni/ /khang bzang rin chen ldan mi slob/ /ral gri mig sman rkang byug dang/ /bum pa bzang sogs dngos grub 'gyur/ /snyan
367a4(rgyud 'grel): dngags rtsod dang mi brjod dang/ /shes rab gcig tu dri ma med/ /'dod pa gzhan yang grub byed pa/ /'khor lo 'di las rab tu 'byung/ /sgrol ma dkar mo bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /'chi dang nad rnams 'joms byed pa/ /phyung ba'i dge ba gang thob des/ /'gro kun
367a5(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i bdag nyid shog //sgrol ma dkar mo 'chi ba slu ba'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs// //dpal chos kyi rje sa'i steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN+Di ta chen po shAka sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ sgra sgyur gyi lots+tsha ba gnubs
367a6(rgyud 'grel): byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tA ra tsin+ta ma ni sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo//
367a7(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya bas/ /tshe dang longs spyod spel ba dang/ /gzhan yang 'dod pa sgrub byed pa/ /sgrol ma la btung sgrub thabs bris sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas rang gi sems nyid tAM gser ba co ma'i kha dog lta bur bltas te/ 'od zer spros bsdus
367b1(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur nas rin po che tAM gyis mtshan par bsam/ de la yang spro ba dang bsdu ba byas pa las bdag nyid sgrol ma gser btso ma'i mdog lta bur zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma pad+ma dang nyi ma la zhabs ldem pa'i stangs kyis bzhugs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi brgyan
367b2(rgyud 'grel): can phyag g.yas rin po che brla'i thad kar bzung ba dpag bsam gyi shing la rgyab gtad pa'i yal ga phyag g.yon gyis gzung ba'i thugs kar rin po che tAM gyis mtshan pa bsam/ phyag mtshan dang sa bon las 'od 'phros pas sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba'i sdug
367b3(rgyud 'grel): bsngal bsal te chur rang gi sku? bsal btab spar thugs ka nas 'od 'phros ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang dbang bskur ba byas te/ rin 'byung gis rgyas gdab pa snga ma ltar 'od spro zhing bsdu bas gsal gdag mi skyo ba'i bar du bsgom mo/ /skyo bar gyur na bzlas
367b4(rgyud 'grel): ba bya ste/ rang gi sa bon dang sngags las 'od 'phros pa'i 'od kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud bskul te rin po che la sogs pa 'dod pa'i don thams cad kyi tshar 'bab? par bsam zhing dag tu/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re tsin+ta ma Ni d+ha b+hya swAhA/ /de las
367b5(rgyud 'grel): skyo na ye shes ba gshegs te dam tshig pa mi dmigs par dge bar bsngo'o/ /sgrol ma yid bzhin nor bu'i sgrub thabs/ /de dngos grub mnyes pa'i slob dpon b+ha ba b+ha Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po ratna rak+Shi ta dang/ lo ts+tsha ba zhad grub pa dpal bzang pos
367b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur ba'o// //lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngar bstan pa'i cho ga'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor du sa bon lnga pa'i sde tshan gyi dang po la/ dang po'i gnyis pas mnan pa/ zla tshes phyed pa'i thig les brgyan pa'o/ /de las grub pa'i sgrol ma bsgom par bya'o
367b7(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas mchog sbyin/ /g.yon utpa la 'dzin pa'o/ /pad+ma dang zla ba la gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bsam mo/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo'i sen mo bkab la/ srin lag cung du
368a1(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste mtheb mos mnan pa ni/ utpa la kha bye ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tA ra sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ rje btsun sgrol ma
368a2(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang por 'di sgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ dben pa'i gnas su stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ mchod pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa bshams shing/ gtor ma gcig kyang bshams la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes byin gyis brlabs/ oM A kA ra mu
368a3(rgyud 'grel): khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Adya nut pan na twad oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes brjod la btang ngo/ /de nas rang nyid sgrol mar mos pa byas la/ de'i snying gar pad+ma 'dab ma sna tshogs su yod pa/ dbus kyi lte ba la a las zla ba la tAM ljang gu /de'i 'od kyis rang bzhin gyi gnas nas
368a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i sgro bla ma spyan drangs la/ mdun gyis nam mkha' la spyan drangs/ phyag 'tshal/ yon chab dbul/ de nas me tog la sogs lnga dbul/ /sdig pa bshags/ rjes su yi rang bya/ /bsngo ba bya/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro /de nas bdag rje btsun ma sgrol ma dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig
368a5(rgyud 'grel): par bsam/ de nas slar gshegs su gsol/ sems can gyi don bya snyam pa'i byams pa dang/ 'khor ba nas sems can rang rang gi sdug bsngal yod pa la snying rje bsgom/ /de rnams sdug bsngal las thar nas sangs rgyas kyi bar la dga' ba bsgom/ de yang
368a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can de dag kun gdong nas stong pa dang rang bzhin med par btang snyoms bsgom/ /de nas oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ zhes mi rtog pa gcig bsgom/ /de nas rtog pa 'am byid na stong pa mi rtog pa'i ngang las/ paM las sna tshogs pad+ma de'i lte ba
368a7(rgyud 'grel): la a las zla ba de'i steng du tAM ljang gu de las utpa la/ de ltar utpa la tAM gyis mtshan pa yongs su gyur pa las bdag sgrol ma sku mdog ljang gu pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la phyed krung gis skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/ phyag g.yas
368b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya /g.yon utpa la snyan gyi thad kar bzung ba dbu brgyan dang snyan cha dang mgul rgyan dang/ phyag gdub dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ zhabs gdub dang/ rin po ches brgyan pa/ bag tsam g.yas su 'gying ba/ 'od zer sngo ljang dang bcas par bsgoms
368b2(rgyud 'grel): la/ thugs ka'i tAM las 'od zer 'phros ye shes kyi sgrol ma spyan drangs la mdun du bzhugs pa la sngar bstan pa'i mchod pa rnams yid kyis phul/ de nas bdag la gzhug /yang tAM gyi 'od zer phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
368b3(rgyud 'grel): cad spyan drangs/ mdun gyi nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol la/ sngar gyi mchod pa yid kyis phul la/ /de rnams bdag la dbang stsol gcig par bsgom/ de yang bum pa lnga bcud dang bcas pa lha mo lngas dbang bskur nas bum pa'i chu de mar blugs pas
368b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrib pa byang/ yar 'khyil bas spyi bor don yod grub pa bzhugs par bsam/ de nas mi rtag pa cung zad bsgom/ shes pa 'phro ba 'am byid ba na lha'i mchog rims gyis bsam/ de nas snying pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ dbus kyi zla ba la oM/ shar gyi 'dab
368b5(rgyud 'grel): ma la tA/ lho'i 'dab ma la re/ nub kyi 'dab ma la tut/ byang gi 'dab ma la tA/ byang shar du re/ shar lhor tu/ lho nub tu re/ nub byang du swAhA bkod la/ rim pas bzlas so/ /lag pa utpa la'i phreng ba bgrang ngo/ /brgya 'am stong bzlas la 'phro gcod tsam na/ ye
368b6(rgyud 'grel): shes pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la bton la/ bdag thal mo sbyor la/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed par gyur cig /bdag sangs rgyas ma thob par la/ theg pa chen po'i chos
368b7(rgyud 'grel): spyod cing/ sems can gyi don byed par gyur cig ces brjod la/ gshegs su gsol lo/ /sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs d+ha byang chub sems dpa' i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta ta thA ga ta rak+Shi ta dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba ba ri rin chen grags pas
369a1(rgyud 'grel): sgyur ba'o// //rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de la dang por sngags pas gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas te/ yid dang mthun par bsam gtan gyi gnas gtsang zhing dri zhim po gtsal du bkram par stan gtsang ba bde bar skyil mo krung
369a2(rgyud 'grel): gis 'dug ste/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags kyis gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la/ oM A big+h+nan ta krita hUM phaT/ ces bya ba'i sngags lan bcu'i bar du brjod de/ phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i bgegs thams cad bkrad par bya'o/ /de
369a3(rgyud 'grel): nas rang gi snying gar chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin skye ba med par ston par byed bston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba 'od zer dkar po 'phro bas rang gi lus gsal bar byed pa shin tu 'phro ba bsams la/ de yongs su gyur pa'i 'od
369a4(rgyud 'grel): zer dkar po'i thig le shel gong dag pa lta bu de rim gyis 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs su bsam zhing/ de'i steng du yi ge tAM 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phro ba'i rin po che'i sgrol ma ltar dkar ba rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas
369a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge tAM de 'od zer shin tu dkar ba'i tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa sngon du 'gro bas lha mo sgrol ma la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang bla ma rnams bskul te/ spyan drangs pa mdun gyi
369a6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' i phyogs la rnam bar bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steng du yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod par bya ba yin la/ de la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ oM badzra puShpe hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge tAM las byung ba'i me tog gi mchod
369a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshogs kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra d+hu pa hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge tAM de nyid las yang dag par spro? ba'i bdag po'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu oM badzra dI pe hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod
369b1(rgyud 'grel): la yi ge tAM de nyid las rin po che'i sgron ma spros la mchod par bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra gand+he hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge tAM de nyid la byung ba'i mchod pa'i sprin? yang dag par spros pas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas oM badzra nai bedya hUM zhes
369b2(rgyud 'grel): bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge tAM de nyid las rin po che sna tshogs su bcug pa'i lha'i zhal zas ro mchog dang ldan pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par spros pas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas oM sarba bi shi Sh+Ta pU dzam g+ha pra sa ra sa mu dra A(rgyud 'grel): hUM zhes
369b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge tAM de nyid las rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ dril bu dang/ ba dan dang/ bla re la sogs pa dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod par bya'o/ /de ltar mchod par byas nas de dag
369b4(rgyud 'grel): gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bskul ba dang/ gsol ba gdab ba dang/ bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byas la/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms te tshangs
369b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas byang chub kyi sems brtan por bya'o/ /de nas oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+ha ba shud+d+ho haM zhes bya ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod la/ 'gro ba thams cad rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang smig rgyu lta bur stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du
369b6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs par bya'o/ /de nas yi ge a yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam/ de'i steng du yi ge tAM dkar po 'od zer dkar po 'khrigs par bsam de yongs su gyur pa las utpa la sngon po de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
369b7(rgyud 'grel): steng na yi ge tAM dkar po bsam/ de las 'od zer dkar po phyogs bcur 'phros pas des sems can thams cad spangs nas lha mo sgrol ma'i skur gyur ba 'od zer de nyid kyis bkug utpa la dang yi ge tAM la stim pas/ pad+ma dkar po dbus
370a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i/ /zla ba'i gzugs kyi gdan steng du/ /rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /mchog sbyin pa dang utpa la bsnams/ /ston ka'i zla ba'i mdangs 'dra ba'i/ /zla ba la ni rgyab brten ma/ /rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs//
370a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug lo lon lus dang ldan/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de 'dra'i sras/ /kun gyi yum gyur 'dod sku 'chad/ /'phags ma sgrol ma de'i snying gar zla ba'i steng gi tAM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las/ 'khor lo 'od zer dkar po bsgom/ /rtsibs
370a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad pa la yi ge ni/ /brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba la/ /lte bar oM tA'i yi ge yis/ /dbus gnas bsgrub bya'i ming dang ldan/ /zla drug brtan zhing des pas ni/ /rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis bsgom/ /yi ge bcu po'i sngags 'di ni/ skyo bar ma gyur sems kyis
370a4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas/ /dang por oM ni gzhag nas su/ /de'i 'og tA re rab tu sbyar/ /de 'og tA re tut+tA re/ /swAhA mdza' can las kun byed/ /thugs ka'i 'khor lo de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros pas dam tshig sems dpa' 'dra ba'i ye shes sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis grub
370a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bskul nas spyan drangs pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la rnam par bsams la/ snga ma bzhin du yang dag par mchod de/ /de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi rgyab tu sbyar la mthe bong gnyis
370a6(rgyud 'grel): nang du bkug pa ni/ utpa la'i phyag rgya'o/ /de'i dbus su yi ge tAM dkar po bsams te/ de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros pa des ye shes sems dpa' la bskor bar byas la/ de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhis spyan drangs nas dam tshig sems
370a7(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bdag nyid la gzhug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ dgyes pa byas la/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes nga rgyal bya'o/ /de'i rjes la 'khor lo yi ger bcas pa las 'od zer spro ba byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga mdun gyi nam mkha' la rnam
370b1(rgyud 'grel): par bsams la/ dbang bskur ba'i tshigs su bcad ba 'dis don du gnyer bar bya ste/ byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la/ /ji ltar mchog chen gsol mdzad pa/ /bdag la srung ba'i don gyi phyir/ /nam mkha' i rdo rje deng bdag stsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku las
370b2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i lo tsa na dang/ mA ma kI dang/ gos dkar mo dang/ tA ra rin po che'i bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis gang ba phyag na bsnams pas/ rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa/ /gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
370b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bar bya/ /zhes bya ba 'don cing dbang bskur bar bsam mo/ /dbang bskur ba rdzogs ma thag rin po che'i cod pan gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can bsam mo/ /lus dang ngag
370b4(rgyud 'grel): dang yid gsum byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir/ spyi bor yi ge oM dkar po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dang/ lkog mar yi ge A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dang/ snying gar yi ge hUM nag po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnam par bkod do//
370b5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bcu po las 'od zer dkar po spros pas 'gro ba kun sbyangs nas sangs rgyas su bsgrubs nas slar bkug ste/ 'khor lo dang yi ge la bstim ste gsal bar bsgom zhing bzlas brjod bya'o/ /ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du bsgom pa dang bzlas par byas nas de las ldang
370b6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'dod na/ cho ga nyams pa bsked? bar bya ba'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa' i snying po yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba bzlas nas ye shes sems dpa' yang dag par mchod de bsod nams yongs su bsngos la gshegs su gsol lo/ /de la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs
370b7(rgyud 'grel): su gsol ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni/ /slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol/ /mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'di yin no/ /de la bzlas pa'i sngags ni/ oM tA
371a1(rgyud 'grel): re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ /de la rdo rje sems dpa' i snying po yi ge brgya pa'i sngags ni/ oM badzra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badzra satwa twe no pa tiSh+Tha Di Dho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ su bo Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karmA su
371a2(rgyud 'grel): tsa me/ tsit+taM sh+ri yaM:- ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga bAn sarba ta thA ga ta/ badzra ma me muny+dza badzri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa A(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i 'di yin no/ /bsod nams 'dis yis 'gro ba kun/ /rje btsun sgrol ma 'dra bar shog /bdag kyang ting 'dzin 'di bsgrubs nas/
371a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i don du sangs rgyas shog /rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing
371a4(rgyud 'grel): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // !/ (/'phags ma sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga bzhugs/) /rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra de bi b+ha ba na bi d+hi sta ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga rgyas pa/ lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don
371a5(rgyud 'grel): med bdag la gnod ba'i srid pa'i bya ba rnams spangs te/ rang bzhin brtan bas rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs song nas ni/ /gnas der bdag gi bsam gtan khad pa shin tu yid 'thad pa/ /shar du sgo rdod yang na nub tu bkra shis sgo ldan pa/ /legs brtsigs
371a6(rgyud 'grel): de yang dum bu bzhi bas mdzes par byas pa ste/ /shin tu mnyam zhing logs dang steng 'og thams cad legs byugs shing/ /rab 'jam gzugs brnyan 'char ba lta bur 'tsher ba'i rdzas rnams byugs/ /de rjes dri zhim ldan pa'i tshon rnams ljang gus khyab
371a7(rgyud 'grel): par byugs/ /'di ni steng logs sa gzhi byi dor rgyud rnams las bsngags pa'o/ /'og gi cha ni rab tu 'thas par brdungs pa kho na la/ /sa lam lhung ba'i lci ba dri bzangs rnams dang ni/ /bsres pas yang yang byugs pas gzugs brnyan 'char ba lta bur
371b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /de la dri zhim me tog rnams kyis kun tu gtor nas ni/ /ji ltar 'byor ba'i bla re la sogs rgyan rnams bri bar bya/ /de 'dra'i dbus sam shar gyi rtsig ngos cha la srang bu yis/ /bris sku yid 'ong mthong bar dga' bar 'gyur ba spyad par bya/ /de mdun
371b2(rgyud 'grel): me tog la sogs mchod pa 'byor tshad dgod par bya/ /de bzhin de dbus stan bzang rab tu 'jam zhing bde ba ni/ /bris sku la bltas legs par bting bas yid dang 'thun bar bzhag /de yi sgo glegs rab tu 'byar bas rlung dang srog chags ni/ /shin tu phra ba'ang
371b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jug par mi nus 'di 'drar bar 'grig bya/ /de logs kyi skar khung sgo dang bcas pa rtod pa ste/ /che ba min zhing steng nas rdod dang dma' bar rab tu smad/ /'di ni bsam gtan khang pa mchod rten lta bur 'gro rnams kyis/ /mchod par bya ba lha mo'i bzhugs gnas
371b4(rgyud 'grel): lha tshogs 'du ba'i sa'o/ /de bzhin de la sgo bltas pa yi khad pa gnyis pa ni/ /srid du khru rnams bcu bdun zheng du de'i phyed yod pa zhig /sngags pa'i 'chags kho nar brtag cing byi dor snga ma bzhin/ /der ni 'ju sa'i thag gu chad bar gzung ba 'tsham pa la/ /reg
371b5(rgyud 'grel): na bde ba'i spu gu rnams dang ldan bar gdags par bya/ /'og tu 'byor bas stan nam rtsa rnams snyoms par dgram par bya/ /'di ni khang pa dum bu gnyis pa chags bkra shis pa'o// //de gnyis su sgo btod khang ba phyogs snyoms yid 'ong ba/ /snga ma
371b6(rgyud 'grel): steng? bar byi dor byas shing don dang ldan pa yi/ /khrus kyi khang pa sgo dang bcas pa dum bu gsum pa'o// //der yang de la sgo bltas ba yi khang pa dum bu ni/ /bzhi pa brtsigs te der yang bkra shis sgo mchog gdong bar bya/ /khang pa der ni bdag gi
371b7(rgyud 'grel): yo byad rnams dang mtshon cha'i tshogs/ /mi zad pa dang sngags g.yog blo gros ldan pa mkhas pas gzhag /zas kyi bya ba rnams ni khang pa der bya der yang ni/ /byi dor ldan par brtag cing rtag tu nyi zla ldan par bcad/ /der ltar dum bu bzhi pa'i khang ba kun nas
372a1(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi par/ bsgrubs nas rim pa mang por brtsegs pas shin tu ma thob la/ /rdo leb lhag par snang ba yis dang phyir mtho sogs kyis/ /rgyal po choms rkun la sogs 'tsho ba phyir phyogs 'gyur bar bya/ /skye bo rnam mang brten pas sdug
372a2(rgyud 'grel): bsngal kho na 'byung 'gyur gyi/ /bde ba 'byung bar thub pas ma gsungs de phyir mkhas mchog gis/ /sngags g.yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gnyis las ma gtogs pa/ /skye bo 'ga' yang 'jug dang phrad dang sbyin pa 'du 'ji spang/ /snying rjes mtshon
372a3(rgyud 'grel): cha'i tshogs rnams legs par bshams shing gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin sgo shin tu dam bcad brgya dang bcas par bzhag 'di ni gnas kyi rab tu dbye ba'o/ /gnas der sngags pas mchod pa'i don/ phyir me tog dag dang ni/ /spos dang til mar dri zhim rnam
372a4(rgyud 'grel): dang de bzhin rol mo yi/ /nyer spyad rnams dang bgrad phreng yid du 'ong ba'i rnga yab dang/ /me long sen mo'i bzo dang spu gri thal gri dang/ /mchod dang gtor ma'i don du sha dang nya sha 'bru rnams dang/ /bza' ba rnams dang sman rnams thams cad legs par gzhag
372a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /mdor na gnas der gzhan gyi dor lta mi 'gyur longs spyod rnams/ /mthun par gzhag bya 'on kyang chad gi sbyor ba ring du spang/ /'byung po'i gdon dang sngags grub 'dod pas gzhan nas blang bar bya/ /dngos grub don du bkug pa ma yin bud med rnams dang
372a6(rgyud 'grel): ri/ /dkyil 'khor ma mthong mi rnams mthu yis rgyang grags nyid nas bzlog /sngags g.yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor che mchog tu/ /dbang bskur thob cing snying rje dang ldan brtson 'grus can/ /shes rab dang ldan dpa' zhing 'jigs
372a7(rgyud 'grel): bral khro med pa rgyal bral/ /blo brtan dang ba gnas shing bdag la dga' 'dzin gus par bcas/ /bsgom dang dge la brtson pa 'di 'dra gnyis ni rtag par bzhag /'di ni rdzas dang g.yog gi rab tu dbye ba'o/ /blo ldan gyis ni sngar bshad bstan pa rdo rje skyil krung
372b1(rgyud 'grel): gis/ /legs par bcas te bdag la myur du bskul ba'i bsam pa bskyed/ /bdag ni shin tu ring nas rang gi rnam par bslus pa ste/ /sngon chad don med spangs nas ting 'dzin bsgrubs na 'di 'dra ba'i/ /srid mtshor 'khyams pa'i mi 'gyur bde mdza' gcig pu
372b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid gang yin/ /'gro ba'i skyabs su bdag 'gyur 'di la 'khrul pa yod ma yin/ /de ni bdag gis rang la bslus pa spangs te brtson pa yis/ /dam pa'i gnas 'dir nges par lha mo'i mchog gyur sgrol ma gang/ /phongs pa la byams ma 'dra de nyid nges par mthong
372b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya/ /bdag ni bstod pas dag par mi bya smod pa gzhan mang gnas/ /smad pas mi dgar mi bya bstod pa'ang gzhan yang gnas pa'i phyir/ /de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ma lus bdag nyid mnan par bya/ /lus kyis ji ltar bzod pas skad cig tsam yang
372b4(rgyud 'grel): dman pa yi/ /bya ba rnams la gnas par mi bya ji srid bdag gis ni/ /lha mo mthong gyur de srid mnyam dang bsam dang 'dus par 'gro/ de bzhin tshod dang dmag dang las kyi mdza' rnams spang bar bya/ /yang dag gdam ngag bdag gis lha mo mchog las blang bar bya//
372b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis nyer bstan mun pa'i mda''dras bdag la ci zhig dgos/ /ji srid lha mo mthong bar ma gyur ji srid gnas 'di nas/ /'gro bar mi bya de phyir 'di la lha rnams mkhyen par mdzod/ /de nas sngags g.yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo can gnyis
372b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags pas bos te 'di 'dra'i bsgo ba gsal bar brjod par bya/ /bdag gis 'dod pa yongs su ma rdzogs par du gnas 'di las/ /'gro bar mi bya lha rnams dpang btsugs khyod kyis 'di shes byos/ /de srid bdag gi yid dang mthun pa'i bya ba khyed kyis
372b7(rgyud 'grel): byos/ /dngos grub cha las khyed la 'geng 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de gnyis kyis ni thal mo sbyar bas legs par smras pa gzung/ /lha rnams dpang du gnas pas bdag cag khyod kyis 'dod bzhin bgyid/ /dngos grub cha la bdag cag dran par mdzod
373a1(rgyud 'grel): la spang mi bya/ /de skad brjod de ji ltar 'dod pas rang gi bya ba brtsam 'di ni sgrub pa po dang g.yog dang dam bca' ba yi rab tu dbye ba'o/ /de nas sngags pas stan bde nyid la 'dug bzhin rab rgyas pa'i/ /gtor ma mdun du gzhag
373a2(rgyud 'grel): te de bzhin mchod pa rnams kyang ngo/ /de nas rang snying paM bskyed pad+ma'i dbus su zla 'dra ba'i/ /yi ge oM las byung ba'i zla ba rnam bsam de steng du/ gsal bya'i bcu drug pa nyid dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas brgyan/ /zla ba'i dum bu'i steng na nam mkha' mnan
373a3(rgyud 'grel): cing mdog ljang khu/ stong phrag du ma'i snang ba ldan bsam de las byung ba'i 'od/ /mtshon cha'i dbyibs can 'phros pas bla ma dang ni rgyal sras bcas/ /sgrol ma bkug ste mdun bzhugs de dag mchod pa gnyis kyis mchod/ /yan lag bdun ldan bya bas bsgrubs
373a4(rgyud 'grel): nas slar yang gshegs par bya/ /de mthar chos kun stong zhing bdag med lta bas gsang sngags ni/ /theg chen mngon par rtogs byed lan gsum bar du bzla bar bya/ /slar yang nam mkha' la sa bon mchog bsam de las byung ba'i 'od/ /sgrol mar gyur pas
373a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro? rnams dag byas slar 'dus zhugs pa yi/ /yi ge yongs gyur utpal ljang gu snying pos sa bon ldan/ /skad cig nyid 'gyur sa bon las byung lha mo ma lus bsdus/ /rang gi gnas su thim gyur de las legs byung lha mo ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog
373a6(rgyud 'grel): ljang gu spyan yangs rgyan kun 'dzin/ /phyag g.yas mchog sbyin g.yon pas yu ba dang bcas utpal 'dzin/ /bcu drug lo lon rab sgreg gzi ldan pad+ma zla ba'i gdan/ /cung zad 'dzum bcas sgrub pa po la mngon dgyes thugs rje can/ /ma lus bud med rgyan
373a7(rgyud 'grel): dang cha lugs 'dzin pa 'di 'dra bsam/ /slar yang sa bon las byung ye shes lha mo spyan drangs te/ /'chad 'gyur phyag rgya'i steng gnas zla ba'i sa bon las byung pa'i/ /mchod pas legs mchod man ngag ji bzhin rang la bstim par bya/ /sku gsung thugs
373b1(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i lha rnams byin gyis brlab/ de bzhin blo ldan bu yis gyur pas dbang bskur don gnyer bya/ /rtsog pa mi mnga' dam tshig rdo rje spyi bor byung/ de ltar cho gas legs bsgrubs rang pad+ma zla ba la/ /rnam bzhugs lha mo'i thugs kar sen zlum mnyam
373b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zla ba ni/ /rjes mthun pad+ma la gnas lha nyid mthe bong mtshon dang mtshungs/ /zla steng bcu yi ges yongs bskor dbus na sngar bshad nyid/ /ljang gu'i 'od zer dang bcas mgo rnams gyen phyogs gsal bsams te/ /dbus ma dang ni bcu pa'i bdag nyid?
373b3(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer dang bcas byung/ /snying ga nas byung phyi rol lha mo nyid gyur 'gro rnams kyi/ /sdug bsngal zhi byas mthun gyur sgo de nyid nas bsdu pa bya/ /'di ni spro bsdu'i ting 'dzin nyon mongs g.yul las rgyal byed pa'o/ /de 'dra ting 'dzin mang du byas pas sngags pa'i yi
373b4(rgyud 'grel): skyo na/ /snying ga'i rnam 'phrul la dmigs gzhan sems rab tu spangs nas ni/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad de rjes gsal bya'i bcu drug pa/ /'og tu dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas lags par bsten pa ste/ /de rjes nyi ma'i steng du e yis mtshan cing gnas
373b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de nas gsal bya'i bcu drug pa nyid u yis bcings pa la/ /phyed cha'i rta yis ma bsten pa'o de rjes sngar bzhin las/ /slar yang bcu drug pa ni us bcings me bu e dang ldan/ /slar yang uSh+ma'i gsum mthar gnas pa'i gnyis pa
373b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /de nyid dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan byas rjes su uSh+ma yi/ /bzhi pa da ro gnyis pas spras byas 'di 'dra'i gsang sngags ni/ /shin tu gsal min de bzhin mi gsal ma yin sgra che dang/ /shin tu chung min sems gzhan rnam par g.yengs
373b7(rgyud 'grel): pa spangs pa yis/ /brgya rtsa brgyad las lhag pa'am de bzhin nor bur gzung ste bzlas/ /gang tshe de yi bzlas pas skyo na sa bon las byung ba'i/ /'od zer tshogs kyis 'gro rnams bkug te man ngag ji lta bar/ /sngags 'dis 'byung po rnams la gtor
374a1(rgyud 'grel): ma sbyin bya phyag rgya ni/ /lag pa gnyis thal sbyar mdzub mo dal gyis gung mo 'khyud byas te/ /mthe bong gnyis kyis snying por byas pa 'di yis gsang sngags mchog /bzlas dang gtor ma sbyin dang bstim sogs phal cher
374a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar bar bya/ /oM a kA ro mu khi sarbba d+harmA NAM Adya nutpan+na twot oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ gtor ma phul nas yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod nas ni/ /bzod par gsol zhing yongs bsngo mngon 'dod dngos grub gsol btab nas/ /de nyid gsum mthar
374a3(rgyud 'grel): mu(rgyud 'grel): yis bskul? bas lha rnams bzhud par bya/ /de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun du rab gsal legs mchod nas/ yi ge brgya ba rang gi phyag rgya 'dzin pas legs bzlas te/ /bzod mdzod bdag blo 'khrul pas ting 'dzin mchog las nyams pa
374a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /mchod dang gtor ma dman zhing sngags dang phyag rgya 'khrug pa dang/ /brtson pa dman zhing sems ni dam pa ma lags gang skyes pa/ /thams cad khyed kyis bzod mdzod grub par byin gyis brlab du gsol/ de bzhin khyod 'drar bdag gyur
374a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro rnams srid mtsho las sgrol shog /myur du khyod kyis bdag la byams pa'i zhal bzang bstan du gsol/ /bdag la myur du thugs mchog rab tu brtse bar mdzad pa'i rigs/ /thugs rje'i lha mo khyod kyis bdag la myur du dbang bskur dang/ /dam pa'i gdams
374a6(rgyud 'grel): dgra bstan pas yang dag lam bstan rigs pa nyid/ /de rjes mchod dang bstod pa'i dam pa rab tu gus pas gdon/ /de nas rang sngags swAhA gnas su mu(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba yis gshegs/ /bdag nyid lha mo'i nga rgyal ldan pas ci bder gnas par bya/ /'di 'dra thun
374a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhir ni rab mnyam gzhag pa'i sngags pa yis/ /nyin gcig bzhin du 'bad pas bsams na de yis nges par ni/ /zla drug de bzhin lo gcig nyid dang gsum gyi nang du ni/ /lha mo mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom mi bya gzhan du na/ /cho ga nyams pas bskal
374b1(rgyud 'grel): pa sgyur ma mnyam pas mthong mi 'gyur/ /'di ni sgrub pa'i thabs kyis rnam par dbye ba'o// //shin tu khro bar 'dod cing 'dod chags tshe dang lhag par ni/ /gnyid 'byung ba dang de bzhin rab tu mi dga' du bar 'dod/ /bsam gtan khang pa spangs te gzhan du 'gro bar
374b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa dang/ bsam gtan gnas su mi bzad skra 'byung de bzhin sgo dag las/ /'jigs pa'i sgra 'byung cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra dag thos pa dang/ /nang na gnas pa'i ming nas phyir phyir 'bod pa dang ni rgod/ /sphyugs? pa dang ni glu len sgra dang se gol rdeb cing 'khun/ /
374b3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu mi bzang dri zhim pa'i dang ldang skyi bung zhes/ /'jigs dang gzugs mi sdug pa mthong dang brdeg dang 'phul bar byed/ /rtag tu rmi lam sdug bsngal mthong dang 'dre yis gnon pa dang/ shin tu dga' zhing mkha' la 'phur snyam byed dang rgyu med rgod/ /glo bur du ni
374b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi sems shes 'dre smra rna pas thos/ /'jigs par byed pa'i 'od zer khang par rab tu 'byung ba dang/ /dman pa'i man ngag ston pa'i rang lha'i gzugs ni mthong ba dang/ /mngon du steng nas shin tu gnon cing mthong bar byed pa ste/ /mdor na gang gis bzlas dang bsam
374b5(rgyud 'grel): gtan dag gis bar chad byed/ /de bzhin blo ni lnga las nyams par byed pa de ni bgegs/ /yin phyir bla ma'i man ngag kho nas bzlog par bya ba ste/ /bla ma'i man ngag med par bsgrub la brtson pa de ni 'dir/ /srog dang dngos grub gnyig gdon chen rnams kyi 'phrog par
374b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /bla ma'i man ngag can la bgegs rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /'byung yang blo can de ni bzlog par bya ba tshegs dang bral/ /'di ni bgegs kyi mtshan ma dang de rab tu bzlog pa'i rab tu dbye ba'o/ //shin tu dri zhim dang ldan yid ni dge
374b7(rgyud 'grel): la mngon dga' dang/ /lus ni rab yang gnyid ni mi 'gyur khams rnams snyoms pa dang/ /shin tu smra snyan pa dang rol mo'i sgra rnams grag pa dang/ /me tog char 'bab til mar bral bar mar me 'bar ba dang/ /rmi lam na ni 'phags rnams mthong dang dge slong bram
375a1(rgyud 'grel): ze mthong/ /rtag tu dge ba'i rmi lam mthong dang chags dang khro dang bral/ /yid ni dga' bar byed pa'i 'od chen khang bar 'byung ba ste/ /mdor na yid ni gang zhing lnga las dga' gyur bzlas pa dang/ /sgom pa dag la rab tu mi spyod 'dir ni mtshan
375a2(rgyud 'grel): ma bzang/ /'di ni bzlas dang bsgom pa ji tsam gsal ba de nyid mchog /'di ni mtshan ma bzang po'i rab tu dbye ba'o/ /sman mchog bza' ma legs pa nges par dug tu 'gyur pa ltar/ /dngos grub len mi mkhas pa rnams kyis dngos grub phyir phyogs pa'am/
375a3(rgyud 'grel): yang na srog gi bar chad dag tuAng 'gyur bas de yi phyir/ /mkhas pas dngos grub blang ba 'khrul ba med par shes par bya/ /rgya mtshor rin chen len pa rnams la 'tshe ba rnams ma 'byung/ de bzhin dngos grub rin chen len pa rnams la 'phrog pa med/ /'di ni gdon chen
375a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub 'phrog brtson rab tu mang ba ste/ /dngos grub rnams ni grub pa bas kyang bsrung ba rab tu dga' / /de bas blo ldan 'jigs pa ma lus ring du spangs pa yis/ /mi bzad mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rab tu gzhig par bya/ /'jigs par mi bya khro dang chags
375a5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam par spang bar bya/ /mtshan bzang rnams kyang sgyu ma 'dra bar blta bya rab rib bzhin/ /mtshan pa'i klung gis nges par mi g.yo mnyam par bzhag par bya/ /ngo tsha sa la lha mo yang dag la ston 'gyur ba ste/ /thun mong ma yin bde ba 'byung 'gyur gus pas
375a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod cing bstod/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol gdab yang dag gdams ngag don du 'gyur/ /ji srid gsung ba mi mnga' 'bad pas rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /gang tshe gsung ba mnga' ba 'bad pas rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /gang tshe gsung ba mnga' ba de tshe gzhan
375a7(rgyud 'grel): la ltos dang bral/ /de ni lha mo'i sras yin bsam gyis mi khyab dbang dang ldan/ /rgyal ba'i sras pa sgrib pa kun dang bral ba dpal ldan yin/ /de yis dngos grub dang ni mtshan ma gnyis ka ji srid du/ /gnad par ma gyur de srid gzhan la zur com smra mi bya
375b1(rgyud 'grel): skad cig de nyid la ni dngos grub ring 'gyur dran par bya/ /grub par gyur nas sngags g.yog dang ni sgrub pa'i grogs la/ /dngos grub cha la ser sna bral bas sbyin pas phan gdags bya/ /pham dang ni bla ma la yang dngos grub rdzas dag las/ /chos mchog skal
375b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bgo bar rgyud rnams las ni rnam par bshad/ /mdor na dngos grub dag ni ji ltar bgo ba blo ldan gyis/ /rgyud rnams nyid las ji ltar bshad pa'i rjes 'brangs shes par bya/ /'di ni dngos grub blang ba dang bgo ba'i rab tu dbye ba'o/ /gang dag dkyil 'khor
375b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu dbang bskur ma thob skye bo dang/ /sdom dang/ dam tshig mi srung bla ma'i bka' las 'das pa dang/ bla ma la ni mi gus yid kyis bla ma la ni 'bya/ /de bzhin sngon du bla ma dag la gus shing lkog na smod/ /blo ni the tshom dra bas khyab cing brtson 'grus zhan pa
375b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /blo gros mi brtan nyin gcig bzhin du lha rnams gzhan 'dzin dang/ /sdang zhing bud med bud bsnyen bkur bdag gir byed dang de bzhin du/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed ma byas gnyid la dga' ba dang/ /shin tu blun zhing chags dang sdang ba drag ldan
375b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du/ /sdug bsngal dag la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus sems stobs chung/ /cung zad smod tshig thos na rab tu mi dga' de bzhin du/ /cung zad bstod pas rab dga' rnyed pa la ni brkam pa dang/ /cung zad sngags kyi mthu snyems rmi lam tsam gyis dregs
375b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ glegs bam 'dzin cing man ngag yod ces mi rnams la smra dang/ /phrag dog dri mas sngags shing man ngag med la ser snas bcings/ /stong nyid ston pa'i chos la sdang zhing dngos por 'dzin la dam/ /nyan thos spyod pa la ni mngon zhen sngags tshul stan
375b7(rgyud 'grel): par byed/ /bdag gi phyogs la mngon zhen gzhan phyogs dag la rnam par sdang/ /rta la sogs pa zhon zhing lcag gis gzhu dang glo rdabs byed/ /chang 'thung ba dang 'jig rten gtam la dga' zhing zas la brkam/ /'dus par 'gro dang dmag dang 'thab mo'i
376a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba rnams la dga' / /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du kha 'dzin phra mas 'tshe bar byed/ /dang gis dpyad pas sngags tshul zab mo rnams la sdebs sbyor byed/ /bla ma'i lung thob med par sngags rnams 'chad par kun tu rtsom/ /bsnyen bkun de man zhing
376a2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma rnams la myur du man ngag 'dod/ /'di 'dra'i mi yis gang+gA'i bye ma mnyam par rab bsgrubs kyang/ /dngos grub mi 'byung de dag bung bo rnam par nyams par 'gyur/ /'di ni sgrub pa po yi skyon gyi rab tu dbye ba'o/ /gang gis sngar bshad skyon spangs de ni dngos
376a3(rgyud 'grel): grub snod yin te/ /de la bla mas man ngag ma lu sbyin pas phan gdags bya/ /des ni dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub bar 'gyur ba'o/ /de ni blo ldan rgyal ba'i myu gu rig 'dzin rnams kyi grogs/ /'khor bar gnas kyang pad+ma bzhin du dri mas nyams mi 'gyur/ /'di
376a4(rgyud 'grel): ni dngos grub snod kyi rab tu dbye ba yi/ /gang tshe sgrol ma'i rnal 'byor pa ni na bar gyur pa na/ /phyi nang 'chi ba'i mtshan ma dag ni legs par brtag par bya/ /'chi ba'i mtshen ma byung gyur sgrol 'byung las gsungs pa yi/ /phyi nang slu bas 'chi bdag srung phyir rab tu brtson
376a5(rgyud 'grel): shin tu bde ba lus khyab nad rnams rab tu zhi bar bsam/ /sman pa'i spyad rnams spang par mi bya 'on kyang sngags mchod dang/ /dbang bskur ba ni nad rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni 'chi ba'i dus las slu ba dang nad gso ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o/ /
376a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas sbyin sreg cho gas zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /gsod dang dgug par 'dod na rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa yi/ /tshogs sbyin bsreg rab tu brtsam bya 'di ni rtog par sla/ /tshar bcad pa dang dbab dang de bzhin 'tshe ba thams cad ni/ /zhi bar bya ba
376b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa sngags pas dpyad/ /'di ni las thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o// //de ltar sgrol ma la gus rnal 'byor ba'i/ /bsgom pa'i cho ga rnam par rgyas bshad bas/ /'gro rnams srid mtsho las brgal sgrol
376b2(rgyud 'grel): ma yi/ /go 'phang la ni myur du gnas par shog/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga rgyas pa slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dul ba'i lha dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba de dang
376b3(rgyud 'grel): slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug bsam gtan gyi dpang? zhugs te/ stan de ba la 'dug cing/ snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad
376b4(rgyud 'grel): gdon par bya'o zhes dam bcas nas/ lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya'o/ /de yang rim pa 'di ltar bya ste/ /rnal 'byor pa rang gi snying gar a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge tAM bsams /de las 'od zer lcags kyu 'dra ba spros pas/ lha mo dang rang
376b5(rgyud 'grel): gi bla ma dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mdun gyi nam mkha' la gsal bar bltas te/ de la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang/ lus dbul ba dang/ smon lam gdab
376b6(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams byas la/ de nas don dam par bdag dang lha la sogs pa rang bzhin med cing pa/ don mnas ma skyes par bsam zhing/ de brtan par bya ba'i phyir oM shU mya tA dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM zhes pas stong pa nyid du bsgom mo/ /de nas paM las
376b7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus su rang gi sems nyid sngon gyi smon lam gis yi ge tAM las lha mo sgrol ma bskyed par bya ste/ de yang sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas gnas pa/ g.yon
377a1(rgyud 'grel): bas utpa la bsnams ba/ don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can/ skyil krung byed pas bzhugs pa/ ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du bsgoms la/ skyo na bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi phreng ba rang
377a2(rgyud 'grel): gi snying gnas phyung ste/ yang rang gi zhal du zhugs yang rang gi snying ga nas 'byung ba'i rim pa/ sngags kyi kha dog dkar po dal bus 'khor bar bsam zhing bzlas par bya'o/ /bzlas pas kyang skyon mchod pa dang gtor ma btang ste smon lam btab
377a3(rgyud 'grel): la/ lha mo'i nga rgyal gyis spyod lam thams cad la gnas par bya'o/ nyal ba'i tshe stong pa nyid du zhugs te nyal bar bya'o/ /yang langs pa'i tshe skad cig tsam gyis ldang bar bya'o/ /'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa slob dpon mkhas pa dpal nas
377a4(rgyud 'grel): me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra sto tra/ bod skad du 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ lha dang lha min cod pan gyis/ /zhabs kyi pad+ma la btud de/ phongs pa kun
377a5(rgyud 'grel): las sgrol mdzad cing/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab 'bar dra bas khyab ba yi/ /mnar med me yis gdungs pa la/ /thugs rjes bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs ma/ /sgrol ma la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro drug gnas yun rings su/ /yang dang yang du 'gro
377a6(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ /dub pa dag la bde chen gyi/ ? pa mchog gi ngal so mdzad/ /gzhan don mdzad pa'i lha mo khyod/ /dran pa tsam gyis phongs sel ma/ /thugs rje brtse ldan khyod kyis ni/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzad/ /dus rnams rtag tu sems can
377a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ pu bzhin snyoms pa'i lha mo khyod pa/ 'gro ba'i lo tog thams cad la/ /char rgyun 'bebs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi/ /mun pa'i gdung ba sel mdzad ma/ /lha mo mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma zla
377b1(rgyud 'grel): ba utpa la/ /de bzhin dri med gdan stengs su/ /sku mdog sngo ljang 'gying bag can/ /ut pal bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags shing/ /bar du gcod pa'i sgrib pa kun spangs nas/ /bsdus dngos bzhi yi 'gro rnams
377b2(rgyud 'grel): sdud mdzad ma/ /thugs rje dang bcan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku yi skyon spangs mtshan dang dpe byang ldan/ /gsung gi skyon spangs ka la pir ka'i dbyangs/ /thugs kyi skyon spangs shes bya mdza' dag mkhyen/ /bkra shis dpal 'bar ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar
377b3(rgyud 'grel): nor bu chu dangs ltar/ /lha mo khyod kyi rtag par ni/ /'gro ba'i sems rnyog sel mdzad cing/ /'gro don brtson la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi khyod kyis mtshan gzung cing/ /bstod dang bsgrub pa byas pa rnams/ /rtag tu 'bras bu yod par mdzad/ /mi bsnyel? khyod
377b4(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje btsun ma la bstod ba/ dI baM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags
377b5(rgyud 'grel): ma sgro pa ma'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gsum mgon yum gyur spyan yangs ma/ /sgrol ma'i zhabs kyi pad+ma rab btud nas/ /yun rings bla ma bstan las gan 'ongs pa'i/ /sgrub thabs cho ga bsdus pa
377b6(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya/ /yid 'ong gnas ni la la ru/ me tog dri zhim gtsal bkram te/ /spos kyi nyams dgar byas nas ni/ /de dbus stan bzang bde ba la/ /srid pa'i bde ba yongs spangs pa'i/ /rnal 'byor can gyi nyer 'dug nas/ /snying ga'i sa bon
377b7(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i/ /'od zer tshogs kyi bla ma dang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /spyan drangs de dag mdun nyid du/ /mchod pas yang dag rab mchod nas/ /dkon mchog gsum sogs rjes dran bya/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha ba
378a1(rgyud 'grel): ba shud+d+ho haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas brtan pa dang g.yo ba thams cad stong pa nyid du rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas baM las byung pa'i pad+ma chen po'i dbus su rab tu rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge tAM ?
378a2(rgyud 'grel): gu bsams te/ de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ g.yon pa ut pa la 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu/ gzi brjid gzod par dka' ba dang ldan pa/
378a3(rgyud 'grel): zhal cung zad 'dzum pa dang/ ldan pa/ sgra'i tshogs lhag par bcings shing zla ba'i 'od can/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnan pa/ spyan pad+ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma lta bu'o/ cung zad 'dzum pa mdun nyid du gzigs pa'i 'phags ma sgrol ma nu ma'i dkyil
378a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mkhred ba dang ldan pa rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas rang gi snying ga'i tAM las 'od zer byung ba rnams kyis ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste/ yang dag par mchod nas ut pa la'i phyag rgyas rang gi lus la bstim par bya'o/ /de nas gnas ji lta ba rnams su
378a5(rgyud 'grel): bar snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams bsam zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bskur ba don du gnyer te/ bdag gi dbu rgyan la gsung rdo rjes rgyas gdab par bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge tAM la sogs pa rnam par bkod de/ spro
378a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gi tshe skyo ba na/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas so/ /de nas gang gi tshe ldang bar 'dod pa na rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te/ des sems can thams cad drangs la slar yang 'od
378a7(rgyud 'grel): bar spros pas de dag snying gar zhugs par lta zhing/ de nyid kyis de dag thams cad lha mo'i skur gyur bar lhag par mos par bya'o/ /de nas slar yang sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin rnams kyis gtor ma'i snod yongs su bkang la/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA
378b1(rgyud 'grel): tAM a dya nut pan na twat oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la phul la/ de nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bzhugs pa la dmigs pas yi ge brgya pa yongs su bzlas nas legs par mchod de/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsal btab la/ oM tu re tut+tA re tu re mu:
378b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su gsol/ /rim pa 'dis thun mtshams bzhir bsgoms nas myur bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /da ni srung ba'i sbyor ba cung zad bshad par bya ste/ sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis rtsa ba'i sngags 'bum phrag bcu bzlas shing sgrol ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal
378b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas bzlas pa'i cho ga snga ma lta bu nyid las khyad par du bsgrub bya'i ming sngags kyi dbus na gnas par bsam la zlas pa ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bya'o/ /de nas sa bon gyi yi ge las 'od zer byung bas bsgrub bya'i lus thams cad khyab par bltas te/ des lus rab tu
378b4(rgyud 'grel): tshim par gyur cing nyes bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang bral bar mos par bya'o/ /'di ni zhi ba'i bsrung ba'o/ /de nas phyir bzlog pa'i bsrung ba bshad pa/ cho ga snga ma dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying gar tAM ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba 'khrugs par bsams la/ de las
378b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs 'bar bas gdug ba'i lus gcer bu skra grol bar 'dar zhing skyabs dang bral ba'i snying gar zhugs pas rengs pa dang mnan pa dang/ rmongs pa dang/ bcings bar rnam par bsam mo/ /gang gi tshe de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ? sa bon gyi yi ge
378b6(rgyud 'grel): la dmigs pas gsang sngags bzlas pa bya ste/ na ma AryA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ mahA satwa ya/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tadya thA oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA sarba duSh+Tan/ pra duSh+Tan/ maM kraM te dzam b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ ma hA ya/ band+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Tan
378b7(rgyud 'grel): staM b+ha ni tA re swAhA/ srung ba 'di dag kyang thun mtshams bzhir bsgom par bya'o/ /de bzhin du lam du 'gro bas ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pas mdud pa bor nas sngags dran par ldan par byin na chom rkun pa dang/ stag dang/ dom dang/ drad dang/ sbrul dang/ ??
379a1(rgyud 'grel): men dang/ chu la spyod pa rnams kyis brdzi bar mi nus te/ gang gi tshe 'jigs pa dang bral ba na mdung ba slang 'gro bar bya'o/ /de ltar yun ring bla ma bsten las gang thob pa'i/ /sgrub thabs mchog 'di ni legs bkod pas/ /sgrol ma zhes grags sras bcas bzhugs
379a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas/ /gru 'dzin dpal du 'gro rnams myur 'gro shog /'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha ka ra ba rma dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab
379a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tso ra band+ha/ bod skad du/ chom rkun bcing ba/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lam du 'gro ba na chom rkun mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir them pa nas goms pa bdun gzhal ba'i sa nas lag pa g.yas pas sa spar ba gang blangs la/ de nas ?? skad
379a4(rgyud 'grel): cig gis rje btsun mar bskyed la/ skyabs 'gro dang sems bskyed tshul bzhin byas la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i sa de laM las ri rab tsam du bskyed de lag pa g.yon du paM las rgya mtsho chen por bskyed la/ dmigs pas de ring bdag la gcod par byed pa'i chom rkun thams cad
379a5(rgyud 'grel): mdun du bkug ste/ mi'i tshig gis bar mchod par sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re adma/ a pa ka ra sarba tso ra band+ha swAhA zhes bya'o/ /mdun gyi chom rkun ba thams cad rgya mtsho chen por blugs la/ g.yas kyis de g.yon du spos la ri rab kyis
379a6(rgyud 'grel): mnan par bsam mo/ /de nas sa de gru ba g.yon par bcings te 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i gnas dgrol par bya'o/ /'gro ba'i dus su bstod pa la sogs pa sgrogs shing 'gro'o/ /chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa rdzogs so// //ma hA paN+Di ta sh+rI ratna rak+Shi ta dang
379a7(rgyud 'grel): lots+tsha ba zhad grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra tsarya yak+Shi Ni ma drA sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i gnod sbyin me'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM dzo yak+Shi Ni pa ri tse swAhA
379b1(rgyud 'grel): me lha'i bu mo gnod sbyin mo'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ dur khrod kyi spangs leb la bris te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gcer bu ras kyi gos bsnams/ /mgo skyes li ba/ gzhon nu ma rgyan gyis mdzes pa/ shing mya ngan med pa dang bcas pa lag pa g.yon pas gzung ba/ lag pa
379b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pas ral bsnams pa/ spyan sa bon gyi grong khyer gyi 'bras bu la gzigs pa/ zhal cung zad dpangs mtho ba/ bzhad pa/ 'khrig pa la sred pa/ 'di 'dra ba spang leb la bris la/ dben pa'i gnas su rang gcig pur khrus bya zhing bkug par/ thun mtshams su mchod do/ /??
379b3(rgyud 'grel): bas maN+Dal byas la/ gtsang sbra tho ba dben par zas gtsang ba za zhing thun mtshams gsum du b+ha gar sor mo bcug la de'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyi ma bdun na 'byon no/ /byon nas tsan dan dkar po dang/ me tog dri zhim pos sbras ba'i mchod yon dbul lo/ /kho mo ci bgyi zhes
379b4(rgyud 'grel): smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa po sa smras pa/ /kho bo'i srid mo'am mar mdzod cig/ de nas gzung ste srid mo 'am mar 'gyur ro/ /bdag nyid dang bcas pa'i skye bo bcu drug gis zas gos sbyor bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi khur gyis dpal gyi ri bo ta lar khrid par byed do/ /der 'phags pa spyan ras
379b5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal mthong nas chos nyan cing byang chub kyi sems ma rmongs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /gal te 'dod na slar dzam+bu'i gling nas 'od shed de dang ro par 'gyur ro/ /gal te dang po nyi ma bdun gyis ma grub na dI tshe bdun phrag gnyis pa la tshangs pa bsang
379b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang po grub bo/ /de nas slar ma grub na khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags bzlas te/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/ oM dzo yak+Shi Ni bi ra dze swAhA/ gnod sbyin mo'i sngags nang du bcug nas bzlas na/ de nas gal te des kyang ma grub na skams pa 'am 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi bsnyen pa gang dang de ru
379b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'am 'bum phrag bzlas so/ /'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su sbyong ba'i grub spyod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi mkhan po be ro tsa na'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sra ga d+ha ra sA
380a1(rgyud 'grel): d+ha naM sastu ti/ bod skad du/ me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa bstod pa dang bcas ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi shes pa rnams 'joms pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan sgrol ma phreng 'dzin gyi/ /sgrub pa thabs kyi ris pa 'di/ de nyid 'dod ba rgyun du bya/ /yi
380a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog gtsang ma'i gnas su 'dug /dngos sam sngags kyi rnal 'byor bkru/ /mthun rkyen mchod pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /dngos sam yid kyis brten par bya/ /shar du kha bltas rnal 'byor pas/ /gzhan phan sems kyis lha mo bsgom/ /'das dkar zla gnas bzhengs pa yi/ /dpag
380a3(rgyud 'grel): med yon tan rgyan gyis spras/ /ston ka'i dbang po lta bur dkar/ /rab bzhin gsar du shar bas brgyan/ /utpal ba dang ltar sbyar mdzes shing/ /dpral bar sen d+hu ra yis bkus/ /rna ba mgul rgyan phyag gdub dang/ /do shal rked ba rkang ba la/ /g.yeng ga sil sil rab tu mdzod//
380a4(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa'i sku can rab tu mdzes/ /nu mar mu tig do shal ldan/ /sham thabs za 'og rgyan gyis brgyan/ /smin mas utpal mdangs 'phrog pa/ /rin chen gyis sbras cod pan ni/ /'dzam+bu'i gser gyi steng na bcings/ /dal bar 'od dpag med pas brgyan/ /'di nyid yid 'ong mdzes?
380a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ /mthong dang brjod dang dran pa yis/ /khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ /snying gi sdig pa thams cad 'joms/ /gang zhig bcom ldan 'das ma ru/ /skad cig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i nga rgyal du/ /rgyun tu bskyed par bya ba'o/ /mchod ba'i cho ga thams
380a6(rgyud 'grel): cad la/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs par bya/ /las kun byed pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /rnal 'byor bas ni bya ba'o/ /rtag tu 'am ni thun gsum du/ /'dir ni gtsang ma'i khrus bya'o/ /tshad pa par spyod ba gzung bar bya/ /gos ni thun gyi dus su spo/ /mi dge bcu po 'joms par bya/ /mi
380a7(rgyud 'grel): dpe'i las ni thams cad la/ yid ni sbyar bar mi bya'o/ /de bzhin sgrub pa po yis ni/ /bcom ldan 'das mar rang nyid ni/ /dngos su ma byas bar du bsgom/ /de la sngon du byed pa yis/ /man ngag dam pa bshad par bya/ /srog 'dzin ma rig ling tog ni/ /'joms par
380b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa kho na'o/ /'di ltar A li'i sbyor ba yis/ /gnyis med chu yi dkyil 'khor la/ /sgyu ma'i sa bon 'jug pa yi/ /rgyun dang bcas pa blta bar bya/ /dag par mi byed de 'og tu/ /dkyil 'khor sbrul pa'i rang bzhin la/ /kho na nyid kyis sa bon ni/ /nyi ma phyed ba'i
380b2(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang mtshungs/ /sgron ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyi/ /mi shes sreg par mdzad pa ste/ /phyogs bcu po yang spyod par mdzad/ /steng gi sa bon 'jog pa can/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun du yid kyis ni/ /yun ring dus su bsgom pa'o/ /de las skyo bar gyur pa na/ /lce  
380b3(rgyud 'grel): ni chu skyes 'dab ma la/ /bla ma'i man ngag bsam par bya/ /de nas sngags kyi phreng ba ni/ /rdza mkhan 'khor lo lta bur bskor/ /nor bu sngags kyi stobs kyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang/ /bdud rtsi gzhan yang yon tan stobs/ /rdza
