380b4(rgyud 'grel): ba khron par gzhug par bya/ /rgyun mi chad pa'i bsam gtan du/ /rnal 'byor pas ni bzlas pa nyid/ /gang zhig de ltar yid kyis ni/ /bya ba 'di ni goms pa na/ /bde ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin/ /rgyun mi chad par skye bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni 'di yi
380b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam gtan gyi/ /nyi ma bdun du byas pa na/ /shes rab che dang dag dbang rno/ /rkang drug tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad dang lhug pa dang/ /'dres pa dang ni lha yi skad/ /tshigs med dag gi dbang phyug ni/ /'bad pa
380b6(rgyud 'grel): med par 'grub ba ste /'di la tha tshom ma byed cig /de nas bstod pa brjod pa yang/ /me tog phreng ba nyid yin no/ /de dang de ni zhal las shes/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni/ /dngos su grub par 'dod pa yis/ /rnal 'byor pas
380b7(rgyud 'grel): ni rig pa 'di/ /ri bong phyed la dus gsum du/ /gong du bshad pa'i cho ga yis/ /sngon gyi brtul zhugs spyad nas ni/ /dben pa'i gnas su sems gcig tu/ /bcom ldan 'das ma'i bstod pa ni/ /rgyun chad med par brjod
381a1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de nas klog pa'i man ngag ni/ /brjod ma thag rtu yid la ni/ /rtsa ba nas ni rtse mo'i bar/ /ji ltar rim pas rjes su ni/ /kho na nyid kyi sa bon dang/ nus pa'i sa bon byed par ldan/ /sgyu ma'i sa bon brjod pa
381a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ /rim pas bcom ldan 'das ma yi/ /yon tan brjod pa'i 'od zer gyis/ /g.yeng ba med par bdag nyid ni/ /yid ni brtan pas klog pa nyid/ /de nyid shar ba'i nyi ma ste/ /de yi gdan la bsam par bya//
381a3(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma phyed pa'i nyi ma ste/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas/ /nus pa ston ka'i zla ba ste/ /pad+ma'i rtse la bsam pa nyid/ /bzlas pa'i dus su 'khor ba ste/ /klog pa'i dus su mchod pa nyid/ /rmongs dang 'jigs dang
381a4(rgyud 'grel): dug med dang/ /mi mthun phyogs las rgyal par 'gyur/ /'dod pa gzhan yang sgrub byed pa/ /'khor lo 'di la rab tu 'byung/ /nor bu'i dgos 'dod 'byung ba ltar/ /'dir ni 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ /sgron ma me
381a5(rgyud 'grel): tog phreng 'dzin gyi/ /mngon par rab brtan cho ga byas/ /dge bas mnyam pa'i 'gro ba kun/ /myur du sgrol ma nyid mtshungs shog /me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma'i bstod pa dang bcas pas bsgrub ba rdzogs so// //
381a6(rgyud 'grel): ma hA pa N+Di ta ratna pak+Shi ta pA da'i zhal snga nas dang/ zhang lots+tsha ba grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //rtag tu dpal gnas gyur/ / !/ (/sgrol ma'i bstod pa la sogs pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ Arya  
381a7(rgyud 'grel): tA ra sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das dag gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pa'i lteng ka rab tu rgyas pa la/ /'dun pa pad+ma'i rtsa ba rab tu brtan/ /rtsol ba drag po pad+ma'i gdan la
381b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba nyon mongs tshad pas gdungs pa la/ /thugs rjes bsil mdzad zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'gro ba nyam thag sgrol ma'i lha mo ste/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma khyod la phyag
381b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /tshogs gnyis shing rta'i 'khor lo lta bu yis/ /sgrib gnyis bcom nas sa bcur rab gnas te/ /lha mo'i tshul du 'khor ba ma stongs bzhugs/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs mi g.yo ri ltar
381b3(rgyud 'grel): brtan pa'i sku/ /yon tan rab rdzogs sha lus shin tu rgyas/ /byams pas thugs g.yos nu bur rgyas pa can/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor bas ma gos sku mdog 'gying bag can/ /sgeg ba'i cha lugs rin chen
381b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan cha can/ /dbu skra sngo ljang rigs lnga'i cod pan can/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zag med bde rgyas zhal ras 'dzum bag can/ /rnam snang las byung phrin las thugs rje can/ /bdud 'joms
381b5(rgyud 'grel): mda' gzhu thabs dang shes rab can/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa skyob mdzad phyag g.yas skyabs sbyin tshul/ /'gro ba'i yid 'phrog na tshong bcu drug tshul/ /las kyi rigs
381b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ut pa la sngon po'i tshul/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye rgas na 'chi'i chu bo bzhi po las/ /sgrol ba'i mnyam pa mkhas pa khyod lags te/ /byams pa'i gru 'dzin snying rje'i skye pa
381b7(rgyud 'grel): can/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar tshigs su bcad pa brgyad kyis ni/ /lha mo nyid la dad pas bstod pa las/ /des ni 'gro ba sems can thams cad kyi/ /myur du sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog /rje btsun ma
382a1(rgyud 'grel): la bstod pa/ slob dpon ma tri ci Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA re sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
382a2(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med kyi smon lam ma/ /me tog zla mdzes sems bskyed ma/ /'jig rten mgon gyi chu skyes ma/ /phyag gi mthil na bzhin bzangs ma/ /bstong rgyas me tog phreng 'dzin ma/ /bgras me 'gying bag drang po ma/ /gshegs shing
382a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa ldem ldem ma/ /phrag rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ma/ /gsung gi dbang phyug dbyangs snyan ma/ /dran pa tsam gyis byin rlob ma/ /yum ni 'dod pa'i sku mnga' ma/ /bde gshegs dbu yi gtsug tor ma/ /rgyal bas dbang bskur
382a4(rgyud 'grel): cod pan ma/ /pho nyas dus min 'chi bslu ma/ /spyan nas thugs rje'i chu 'dzag ma/ /dge slong sngom brtsen dam tshig ma/ /bdag med brtse bas mthar phyin ma/ /sa dgu 'das pa'i pha rol ma/ /ma byon snga dro gzhon nu ma/ /da lta nyin gung
382a5(rgyud 'grel): dar bab ma/ /'das so bgres mo rgongs ka ma/ /dus gsum 'gyur ba'i me stag ma/ /'jigs chen brgyad las skyab mdzad ma/ /phra mo chen mo sgrub gsol ma/ /mchog 'dod ma la mchod sbyin ma/ /sems can gso ba'i 'o rgyun ma/ /dug sel
382a6(rgyud 'grel): sman mchog ma g+hi ma/ /sdig spong dge pa'i bdud rtsi ma/ /sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i rgyal yum ma/ /bdag la thugs rjes zhal ston ma/ /rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la chos kyi rje paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pas bstod pa rdzogs
382a7(rgyud 'grel): so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra de bi sto tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo sgrol ma lha yi lha/ /'jig rten
382b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum na mchog gyur pa/ /thugs rje chen po'i dbang gyur pas/ /khams gsum 'gro ba sgrol la mkhas/ /tshor ba btang snyoms ngo bo nyid/ /mi mthun tshor ba bde sdug ldan/ /phrag dog 'joms pa'i phrin las can/ /mkhas ltar dngos po
382b2(rgyud 'grel): bla na med/ /gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yi/ /rnam rtog spangs pa'i bde ba can/ /pad+ma chu sa mi chags pa ltar/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pa/ /rang bzhin gyis dag bla na med/ /rgol ba dag ni tshar gcod pa/ /'gro ba yid 'ong phun tshogs pa/ /
382b3(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog mtshan dang dpe byad ldan/ /sgrol ma sna tshogs mdog can ni/ /'byung po las byung gdon chen dang/ /'du ba las byung nad rnams dang/ /bkra mi shis ni sna tshogs dang/ /mtshon dang dug dang rig sngags dang/ /phra men las byung sbyor
382b4(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /shin tu mi zad thabs ldan pa'i/ /stobs ni sna tshogs 'joms pa dang/ /seng ge glang po stag dang sbrul/ /chen rkun ma chu sha za yi/ /'jigs pa chen po de rnams las/ /skyabs mdzad de la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma
382b5(rgyud 'grel): la bstod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs/ dang por re zhigs sngags pas kha la sogs pa dag par byas nas/ sa phyogs dben par 'dug
382b6(rgyud 'grel): ?/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed la/ rang gi snying gar a las byung ba'i zla ba'i steng du yi ge tI ljang gu 'od zer dang ldan par bsams nas/ de'i 'od zer gyis ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal nas khams gsum du spros te/ 'gro ba'i don byas nas phyogs
382b7(rgyud 'grel): bcu na bzhugs pa'i sgrol ma spyan drangs te/ mdun du bltas la/ phyag dang/ mchod pa dang/ sdig pa bshags pa dang/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bskul ma gdab pa dang/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar
383a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab par zhes bya ba bla na med pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i mchod pa byas nas byams pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko haM zhes bya ba'i byin gyis
383a2(rgyud 'grel): brlab pa'i sngags brjod cing thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan steng du tI yongs su gyur pa las/ utpa la sngon po tAM gyis mtshan pa bsam/ de rnams yongs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ma zhal gcig phyag
383a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ma/ sku mdog ljang gu lang tsho dang ldan pa/ stong g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang ldan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas mchog sbyin dang/ g.yon gyis utpa la bsnams pa pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du g.yon bskum pa'i phyed skyil
383a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis bzhugs par bdag nyid bsgom la/ de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la dam tshig sems ma ji lta ba'i ye shes sems ma dang/ de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la yi ge tAM ting nge 'dzin sems ma'i tshul du bsam/ de'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems ma spyan drangs
383a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa dang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ bdud rtsi lhag mas don yod grub bas spyi gtsug tu rgyas btab ste/ 'od zer 'phros 'dus 'gro ba'i don mdzad par mi skye'i bar du bsgom par bya'o/ /skyo na sngags bzlas par bya ste/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAhA/ /
383a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba 'bum phrag bcu bzlas nas stong phrag bcus sbyin bsreg bya'o/ /'gyur ba med par pha rol la/ /mi bzang dga' pas bdud rtsi'i ros/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad ma/ /sgrol ma khyod sku la phyag 'tshal zhes bya bas bzlas pa'i rjes
383a7(rgyud 'grel): la bstod nas/ yi ge brgya pa brjod de bsod nams rba sngos la/ oM badzra mu(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Adya nut ban na twAt oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA zhes bya bas gtor ma'i sngags so/ /zla ba drug gi bar du zhag re re
383b1(rgyud 'grel): zhing thun gsum du 'di dag bya'o/ /bla ma chen po shAkya sh+rI b+ha dras mdzad pa rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs dza ga ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi b+hu ti tsen+d+ras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/
383b2(rgyud 'grel): spa ra swa sti sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs/ lha mo dbyangs can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang gi snying gi srog gi 'od zer gyis/ /dbyangs can ma yi 'khor lo mdun du dgug /me tog bdug pa mar me byugs bas mchod/ /'jug
383b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rlung gis snying ga srog rtsar gzhug /dbus su hI gis rnam brgyan zla bas lte bar rnam par mdzes/ /mchog tu dkar zhing 'od gsal sgron ma lta bu'i chags/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis ze 'bru'i mtshams nas shin tu rgyas pa yi/ /dri med 'jam
383b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing dkar ba'i mdangs ma re rer gnyis gnyis gnas/ /'od zer dkar po 'phro bas snying gi mun pa rnam par sel ba'o/ /sngon du rig pa 'bum phrag gcig /nyi khri lnga stong bsnyen pa bya/ /de nas rtsod pa smra ba na/ /'khor lo lce la rnam par dgod//
383b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub bya'i dbral bar 'khor lo mchog /bkod nas dbang du byed par bshad/ /dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs bram ze phur bus mdzad pa rdzogs so// (//tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can la bstod pas 'grub pa dag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs// //)
383b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ brahma su tri swa ras tyai stot+tra Na sid+ha wAk sA d+hanA ma/ bod skad du/ tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pas 'grub pa dag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang zhal gyi mche
383b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rtse las sngon sbrul zhing/ /thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul mdza' yas pha rol rjes su bzung ba'i phyir/ /tshangs pa'i bu mo mdzes ma khyod sku mdzes pa'i rnam 'gyur can/ /piSh+Nu'i gzugs can tam bur las dga' skyed tshul 'dzin ma/ /rjes su chags bcas
384a1(rgyud 'grel): rol pa'i lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i nyams/ /chu gter 'gram dogs dgu pa'i phreng bas rtse bar dga' ba can/ /dri za'i bu mo mngon bstod pa nyid kyi rnam thar bul byung rnams/ /gang gis yid la drag byed la ngag gi dbang phyug stsol/ /kho bos khyod dran bsdu shas cher g.yo ba'i lag
384a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis / /thal sbyar me tog gzhon nu kha 'bus lha bu spyi bo'i steng/ /rab gzhag snying nas rag tu gus ba lhur byed khyod kyi yon tan ni/ /mdza' dag rtogs min cung zad rnyed 'di sdob legs phreng bas mchod/ /khyod sku 'o ma'i mtsho 'dra kun ta ku mud
384a3(rgyud 'grel): zla zer mtshungs/ /rab dkor 'od kyi phreng bas kun nas bskor ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /lha dbang yid 'phrog dga' ba'i nga ros khyod la rtag tu bstong byed na/ /blo gros don gsal don gnyer lha la gus pas smos ci dgos/ /chu skyes dkar po dri med steng
384a4(rgyud 'grel): nas ge sar g.yo ba'i rtser/ /ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdan stengs tsog bu'i tshul bzhugs 'gying bag can/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis dri za'i pi wang sbrengs pa'i sgra dbyangs dang/ /rjes 'thun gsung gis gsum skye dgu'i bsam pa tshim mdzad
384a5(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /'jam gnyen 'khril zhing ring ba bung ba blta bur gnag pa'i skra/ /g.yas g.yon rgyab tu 'phyang zhing cung zad li ba'i thor cog la/ me tog dkar po'i phreng bas thod bcings spyi gtsug zla bas spud/ /gser gyi rna cha 'phyang zhing
384a6(rgyud 'grel): mkhur tshos mdzes pa 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /ka tsa lan da'i smad g.yogs chom bur spras pas sgeg pa'i nyams/ /pun da ri ka'i phreng ba chun 'phyang mgul rgyan do shal can/ /phyag zhabs rin chen phreng ba sil sil sgra ldan rgyas pa yis
384a7(rgyud 'grel): khyed sku lha dang rig 'dzin bu mo'i tshogs kun ngo mtshar gyur/ /lha mo gzhon sgeg lang tshor ldan pa skye dgu'i yid 'phrog ma/ /yid 'ong 'dzum pa'i bzhin can mig dkyus ring po'i zur gyis ni/ /smin ma g.yo ba'i gar gyis khyed sku rtag tu
384b1(rgyud 'grel): dran byed la/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i nyams kyis gzigs shing kho bo rjes su gzung/ /mdzad sbyor bags kyis ngal zhing gsong por smra ba'i ngang tshul can/ /mA li sar pa'i dri ldan nu gzhon nu par 'dod pa la/ /rag pas dga' ba'i nu zho stong byed khyed la rtag
384b2(rgyud 'grel): tu bstod pa'i bu/ /snying nas yus che shes cher du ba'i gdung ba tshim mdzad ma/ /de yi yid la bstod pa'i zol tshig ca cor ma nges pa yi sgra/ /smra ba'i ga shas 'dir spel nyid kyi thugs la gags gyur mod/ /'on kyang kho bo'i blon 'dir zang bu yi
384b3(rgyud 'grel): nyes ba rnams/ /ma yis bzod mdzod brtse bas slar yang bu ni rab tu skyongs /snying gi chu skyes 'dab brgyad dkar po ze 'bru'i phreng ba can/ /dmar ser mdzes pa'i mtshams nas 'od kyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed/ /ge sar 'jam pa'i rtse mor bsil zer can ni rab
384b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i/ /dbus su chu shel mdog 'dzin h+rI gi phreng ba sgrib gnyis 'dzoms/ /'dab ma re rer gnyis gnyis bzhugs pa'i a A la sogs dbyangs yig rnams/ /g.yas su bsgor ba'i rim pas mar me'i phreng ba 'bar ba ltar/ /kun nas 'od
384b5(rgyud 'grel): zer 'phro ba'i rgyan ldan rtse ba'i rang bzhin gyi/ /'od kyi dri ma mun nag rnam bsal blo gros mchog rtsol mdzod/ /srog gi 'od zer skra yi khyon tsam phra ba'i cha shas kyis rtsol ba'i sgo nas myur bar lha mo'i thugs la reg gyur pas/ /'khor lo gnyis pa
384b6(rgyud 'grel): bskor bas rnam pa bdun pa'i mchod sprin can/ /'jug pa'i rlung zhon rang sems ye shes rgyas mdzad de la 'dud/ /de rjes h+rIM gi phreng ba mu tig do shal mgal me yi/ /'khor pa'i tshul du 'khor ba zhal gyi sgo nas 'thon gyur cing/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas
384b7(rgyud 'grel): zhugs slar yang sa bon tsha zer rtser/ /'dar ba'i mong la dbyangs can dag gter khyod zhabs spyi bos blang/ /lha mo gtsang sbra la dga' brdzun spangs 'byung po'i zas dor zhing/ /tshangs spyod brtul zhugs can gyi nyin re dran byas yum ?/ /slar yang dag gi dbang phyug
385a1(rgyud 'grel): rtsi bzheng gsung pa'i gang mo yis/ /dkar gsum zas kyis dga' ston tshul gyis dngos grub stsol la 'dud/ /de ltar khyod bstod lhung len gang yin de ni yon tan gyis dbul gyur sna tshogs rig pa'i gzhung lugs rnams las nges pa'i
385a2(rgyud 'grel): don/ /myur rtogs sa gsum skye bo'i gzhung sgron gti mug mun pa rnams/ /rang bsal rgyal ba'i dbang po 'od dpag med 'dra thob par shog/ 'dir ni 'phags dang mkhas pa'i skye bo phul byung tshogs rnams bstod/ /bdag 'dra 'khun
385a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing mu tsor sgrog pa ngang tshul mi shes mod/ /khyod kyi rjes zhugs lan cig ma yin tshig don goms bya'i phyir/ /sdeb sbyor gtsor byas brag bya'i sgra mtshungs 'di ni bstod par rigs/ /tshig 'di gang gis mthong ngam thos sam rtag tu dran byed pas/
385a4(rgyud 'grel): klog dang kha ton byed dang bsam don chub byed pa/ /yi ger dri'am gzhan la rgya cher rab tu ston kyang rung/ /de yi sems dang dag la dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can myur drug shog/ tshangs ba'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pa thub pa ngag gi 'od
385a5(rgyud 'grel): ze zhes bya ba bram ze phur bus mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI badzra swa ra swa sti de wi rno bi ki/ bod skad du/ dpa' rdo rje lha mo dbyangs can mo'i sgrub thabs/ /rdo rje dbyangs snyan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ gangs ri lhar dkar zla rgyas zhal mnga' 
385a6(rgyud 'grel): dri med sil zhing gsal ba'i 'od zer phreng ba can/ sgeg chags 'gying dul 'dzum pa'i mdangs dkar lha yi lha mo kun nas mdzes pa'i gzi ldan ma/ /stong phrag drug cu'i yan lag dbyangs snyan rgyud mang rol me utpal ral gri phyag
385a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshan cing/ /'jig rten gsum skyabs mkha' dang rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyur blo gros lha mo rgyal gyur cig/ /pha rol rgol ba tshar gcad dang/ /mdza' yas spobs pa kun bskyed dang/ /sna tshogs phrin las bde sgrub phyir/ /dbyangs can lha mo
385b1(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub par bya/ /'phags ma de dag mgon bzung nas/ /'gro skyabs don kun nyer brtson pas/ /sman ljongs rab dkar brag ri ni/ /rnam pa/ reng spangs te tshogs rab bsags/ /dus snyigs bar chad kun bsal phyir/ /sngon du sngags pas rdo rje 'dzin/
385b2(rgyud 'grel): mnyes byas de rjes snying rje'i yid/ /rab sbyangs rdo rje lha mo bsgom/ /sngags bdag nga rgyal la bstan srog/ rtsa ba'i yi ge sgron 'dra yi/ /zer spros pas ni rgya mtsho nas/ /dbyangs can 'khor lo mdun du dgug/ oM e hyai he badzra de wi mahA tsakra sa
385b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ya stwaM sa ma ya dza(rgyud 'grel): gzhal med srog gi 'khor lo sku dang/ thugs 'khor lo/ /sna tshogs 'od 'bar dri med mdzes/ /mkha' lta zla rgyas ltar drangs te/ /rab dang kun dags khrus sogs dbul/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dri/ /zhal zas rol mo
385b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyan phreng dang/ /pi wang lha gcig sngags bcas mchod/ /'bru gsum glu gar ldan byas bstod/ /phyag mchod la sogs rgyud can gyis/ /mnyes bya gsol bya bstim par bya/ /gnas la gnas dang lus bla sku/ /snying dkyil 'khor lo phyag rgyas gdab//

385b7(rgyud 'grel): 'byams dkar skye bas/ /bum nang sgron ma 'bar ba bzhin/ /sprin med mkha' dkyil zla skar ltar/ /rnam dag 'khor lo 'od mdzad gzi/ /rim pas dbus nas mthar snang bya/ /nyi zer gyis phyi pad 'dab tshul/ /rtsa ba'i 'bru 'di snying 'dab kyi//
386a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus zhugs bzhi gnyis kha phye nas/ /gnyis gnyis nga ro bcu drug brgyas/ /de spros ge sar ze 'bru phye/ /'dab rgyas yi ge 'od 'bar pas/ /slar yang bdud rtsi'i bsil dang ra blang/ /bkar 'jam snam mnyen mkhregs
386a2(rgyud 'grel): dang srab/ /yid 'ong dri mas ma gos pa'o/ /zil dang ro snying gi mun sel la/ /snying 'dab snying pos slar yang de'i/ /zil dpar rgyas byed yang tshur 'od/ /rab skros phyi nang kun da khyed/ /ji srid ma yengs mi skyo bar/ /bdag gzhan mkha' khyab kun bkang la//
386a3(rgyud 'grel): sdig bdug yid kyi mun pa rnams/ /nyi mas mun bsal ji bzhin no/ /rtsa ba'i yi ge mchog gcig la/ /g.yeng med 'bum phrag bco lnga bzlas/ /dngos dang rmi lam brda gzugs kyis/ /ltas gsum phyi rol mthong bar 'gyur/ /de 'og pad+ma
386a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo sgyur/ /dbyangs yig ral gri phyed mtshan par/ /skal cig rnam pas bsgyur zhing bskor/ /gsang sngags 'bru bcu bzlas par bya/ /oM badzra de wi pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bard+ha h+rI hUM/ rang snying mun sel brtan pa dang/ /gzhan yid mun
386a5(rgyud 'grel): sel g.yo ba yi/ /'bum phrug gsum ni rtse gcig bzlas/ /lkugs pa'ang ngag gi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /nang skye zla rgyas pa wa sangs/ /gsung ba sgron ma 'bar ba mthong/ /brda gsum gzugs sgra yid shes te/ mtshon bya'i 'khor lo rtags gzhan

386b1(rgyud 'grel): mo la gnas lce/ /'khor la dbyangs ldan ral gri bskor/ /pha rol srog dang lce bskum nas/ /gsal byed mgrin bkang brtsed las rgyal/ /mtshan mkhan thod pa dgra bo'i gzugs/ /ma ra ya ldan lo 'bum bzlas/ /gi mtshon gyis gtubs ro ras dkris/ /'dri
386b2(rgyud 'grel): gnas sar mnan nges par 'chi/ /lhag pa'i lhas brgyan lha mo nyid/ /khro mo zhal brgya phrag stong can/ /lcags kyu zhags pa ral gri yis/ /bkug cing snun na shin tu 'joms/ /dam tshig lha mos ye shes kyi/ /lha drangs bum par bdud rtsi bsgrub/ /smin mtshams
386b3(rgyud 'grel): padmo h+rIM thig le/ /rgyun 'dzag dug gzhil dbyud par bya/ /snying dkyil ro yig rin chen sgron/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i me 'od gsal/ /a phreng ka phreng spel bskor gzis/ /gur pub rgyu 'bebs 'chi med 'gyur/ /ji skad sngar bshad lha mo nyid/ /de bzhin
386b4(rgyud 'grel): lha mo lnga lnga dgu/ /sna gsum bdag gzhan snying la bsgom/ /blo gros rab 'phel gdon mi za/ /dpal mo mgrin par chu skyes dbus/ /dung dkar g.yas la byil spubs ltar ba/ /nga ro bcu drug gsang bstod sgrogs/ /de myur tshangs dbyangs dag thob
386b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /gtsang zhing rib gtsang par snying dbus/ /'ja' ris dpal be'u zer gsal bas/ /klog phreng rgyun 'dra rdo rje'i lce/ /rnam bskyod snyan dngags mkhan'drar 'gyur/ /'dam skyes ri bong rdo rje yi/ /sbyor ba las lce rtser tshangs yig bskyed/ /lha
386b6(rgyud 'grel): mo'i ljags skyes rdo rje ltung/ /de blang ka la bing ka mtshungs/ /rje btsun ljags par zla steng du/ /dbyangs gsal rdo rje ral gris mtshan gro gar 'gyur klags ye shes bkug/ de rgyun sus 'thungs sngags 'grub 'gyur/ /thun mtshams
386b7(rgyud 'grel): gtsang zhing rab dkar zas/ /mngar gsil sna tshogs btung ba byas/ /'bru gsum rang sngags byin brlabs la/ /bdud rtsi'i sbyor bas gtor ma sbyin/ /oM A(rgyud 'grel): badzra bri ti de wi sa pa ri wA ra a mri te/ liM to khA hi khA hi/ ma ma sarba sid+d+hi
387a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT swAhA/ /'jam dbyangs lha mo dbyangs snyan ma/ /rab mdzes tshangs dbyangs blo bzang ma/ /mtshungs med snying dbus mgrin skyong ma/ /'dod dgur bsgyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde ldan ngag gi dbang phyug ma/ /mi 'chi mi
387a2(rgyud 'grel): slu tshe 'dzin ma/ /bag yod yid 'ong nor ster ma/ /tshangs spyod tshangs rigs ma khyod 'dud/ /dpal ldan dbyangs can brtag pa'i de nyid rgya mtsho mkha' dang gter ltar zab cing rgya che sbas pa las/ /rdo rje lha mo ri dbang phung po sangs rgyas khangs
387a3(rgyud 'grel): bzangs lnga phrag gnyis bsgrub nyes tshogs dri ma kun gsal 'di/ /zla zer pa sil bas ku mud ltar phye de yi laM las dge 'od rin chen 'bar ba'i gron mthus gang thob des/ /ma lus lus can rdo rje lha mo'i dbyangs snyan myur thog
387a4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs chen nga ros sa gsum rnam par rol par shog/ dpal rdo rje dbyangs snyan ma'i sgrub thabs snyan dngags mkhan chen slob dpon zla ba gzhon nus mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rnam par bshad pa'i paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po bud+d+ha
387a5(rgyud 'grel): sh+rI dz+nyA na dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ shi ba su d+ha ra sA d+ha ni/ bod skad du/ dpal nor rgyan ma'i sgrub thabs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu
387a6(rgyud 'grel): kun na bzhugs pa yi/ sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ dbul ba kun las sgrol mdzad cing/ chos min sel bar mdzad pa'o/ /phun tshogs yang dag bstsal mdzad ma/ /nor rgyun ma la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /sbyin yang sbyin pa
387a7(rgyud 'grel): po ste gsum po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du dag pa chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyi dag pa nga nyid do/ /stong nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rang bzhin nga nyid do/ /de las langs nas rang gi snying khar pa ma yig gis pad+ma dang de'i steng
387b1(rgyud 'grel): du a yig gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng de'i steng du tsum gi yi ge'i bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun mar bsgom par bya ste/ phyag gnyis ma/ rin po che'i cod pan can/ sku mdog gser mo zhal gcig ma/ rol ba'i stobs kyis bzhugs pa/ phyag mchog sbyin
387b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ bum pa bzang po can no/ /oM sh+rI ba su d+ha ro haM/ A yig gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te/ a yig gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ oM badzra pat+ma hostwa haM/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM swAhA/ gsum mo/ /oM badzro pa me Ta ke tha ke hUM swAhA/ gsum mo/ /oM badzra yak+She hUM/ gsum mo/
387b3(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra puShpe hUM swAhA/ badzra d+hu pe hUM/ badzra dI pe hUM/ badzra gand+he hUM/ badzra nai wi tya hUM/ tiSh+Tha badzra hUM/ badzra b+hu me hUM/ badzra ya k+She hUM/ ba su d+ha re swA hA/ de nas rang gi snying khar gnas pa'i tsum gi yi ge'i 'od zer steng phyogs su yang dag par bkangs nas 'og min
387b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi srid par gnas pa'i thog ma med pas grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyan ma spyan drangs par bya ste/ /oM sh+rI ka ri d+ha ni ka ri b+ha n+ya ka ri/ a gats+tsha ats+tshi prI swA hA gsum mo/ /u k+She b+hu ke warSha Ni pra wa rSha ni/ /ni ShpA ra ni ba su d+ha ra b+hu Ta rA kA yEe pArya pra tits+tshi swa na/ pro
387b5(rgyud 'grel): k+Sha na pra tits+tsha swAhA/ A tsa ma NaM pra tits+tsha swa hA/ arg+haM pra tits+tsha swA hA/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM hoM// rang rang gi gdan la bzhug par bsams nas me tog dgod par kyang/ oM A:hUM swA hA/ oM sh+rI ba su d+ha re swA hA/ oM ba su d+ha re ba su priSh+Ta pa ta ya ba su d+ha ra swA hA
387b6(rgyud 'grel): dzUM tsUM ba su d+ha ra swAhA/ la k+Shi ma b+huM ta la ni baM ya ni le swA hA/ badzra d+ha ra sA ga ra Ni go Sha ta ya swA hA/ Arya a ba lo ke ti shwa ra ya swA hA/ badzra pA Ni yak+Sha se na d+hi pa tA ye swA hA/ i la de wI ye swA hA/ dza b+haM la dza len dyA ya swA hA/ tsi bi kuN Ta le na swA hA/
387b7(rgyud 'grel): ke la mA li nE swA hA/ mu kha ne da ya swA hA/ tsa rin tra ya swA hA/ gu pa ta de wI ye swA hA/ su gu pa ta de waM ye swA hA/ sha ra sA te de wI ye swA hA/ tsan+ta kan+t+ra de wi ye swA hA/ ma Ni b+ha tra pe/ swA hA/ pu ra Na b+ha dra ya swA hA/ b+hA na d+ha ye swA hA/ bai sh+rA
388a1(rgyud 'grel): N+Na ya/ ba su Na nA ga rA dzAM ya swA hA/ in tra ya swA hA/ ya mA yA swA hA/ ba ru Na ya swA hA/ ku pe rA ya swAhA/ a ga na ye swA hA/ nai ri tye swA hA/ ba ya byed swA hA/ i shA na d+he pa ta ya ye swA hA/ i te ShI ma ma sarba satwa
388a2(rgyud 'grel): naM sarbba sh+ya N+ya h+ri ra Ndya su ba ra N+Na ni d+ha nA Ni/ nga ? mi dad pa la swA hA/ ba su d+ha re swAhA/ puShpa/ pa su mi d+ha ri swA hA d+hu pa/ ba su d+hi swA hA/ dI pa/ ba su ma ti pri ye swAhA/ g+han d+ha ba su rhyA rA Ni ye swAhA/ nI bai dwa/ badzra pAShpe swAhA/ badzri
388a3(rgyud 'grel): ba ye swA hA/ badzra dar sha na pa lA ya swAhA/ badzri tI bu ye swA hA/ oM A:- hUM swA hA/ badzra swa twa saM grahA ta badzra rang na ma nud tar badzra kar mako ro shi b+he pa/ badzra d+ha ra ma kA ya Na/ badzra l+la sye hUM/ badzra mA le traM/ badzra gi sti h+ri/ badzra nre tye A/ badzra
388a4(rgyud 'grel): puShpe hUM/ badzra d+hu pa tri/ badzra A le ke h+ri/ badzra gand+ha ma ni ma he hUM/ na ma mI hUM/ na mo na ma hUM swA hA/ rtog par gsungs pa zhes pa la sogs pas bstod do/ /dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang/ yang na bgyid rtsal
388a5(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yid rang gang/ de dag thams cad byang chub mchog ni/ spyan lnga pa ltar so sor bshags par bgyi/ /bde gshegs sras kyi tshogs gnyis zab pa dang/ rgya chen 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don/ /sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan
388a6(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo/ /byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang gtang snyoms te byams pa ni bu gcig pa ltar gnyen? gshin pa'i rnam pa can gyi mtshan nyid do/ /snying rje ni sdug bsngal laM sdug bsngal gyi las yang dag par 'don
388a7(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod pa nyid do/ /dga' ba ni sna tshogs kyi dge ba dang de rnams kyi longs spyod dang rab tu dbang phyug rnams la sems mgu bar nyid do/ /gtang snyoms ni rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang ma grags pa dang bstod pa dang smad pa dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal zhes pa 'jig rten
388b1(rgyud 'grel): chos brgyad la sogs pa las phyir phyogs pa nyid do/ /oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+ha sarb+ha rmA swa b+ha pa shud+d+ho haM/ oM shu n+yA tA dz+nyA na badzra swA b+ha pa at+ma ko haM/ /de nas sngon gyi smon lam gyis nus pas yi gis rlung gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor kha dog
388b2(rgyud 'grel): sngon po gzhu dang 'dra bas g.yogs pa'i ba dan gyis mtshan par byas pa yaM yig gis brlabs pa'o/ /de'i steng du raM yig gis me'i dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa 'bar bar mtshan par byas pa ram yig gis byin gyis rlabs pa'o/ /baM yig gis
388b3(rgyud 'grel): chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar po buM pas mtshan pas paM yig gis byin gyi rlabs par bya'o/ /laM yig gis sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa kha dog ser po rdo rjes mtshan pa'i laM yig yis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /hUM yig gis ri rab gru bzhi pa ri
388b4(rgyud 'grel): po che bzhi'i rang bzhin rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa/ hUM yig gis sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la gnas pa'i b+huM yig gis khang pa brtsegs pa bsgom par bya ste/ gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa rta babs bzhi yis mdzes pa dra ba dang dra phyed pas spras gnod pa?
388b5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdo rje phyed pa zla tshes dang rdo rje rin po che rnams kyi sgo dang sgo khyud kyi mtshams rnams su spras pa/ bum pa dang ka ba dang rdo rje chen po dang/ phyogs can gyi mda' yab can/ dril bu dang ba dan gyis mdzes pa/ rnga yab la sogs pas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /de'i nang du paM yig gis 'dab ma
388b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang ze'u 'bru dang ge sar dang ldan pa'o/ /de'i steng du A yig gis zla pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ de dbus su tslu gis ye shes? bum pa bzang po'o/ /bum pa bzang po yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig ma/ phyag drug ma
388b7(rgyud 'grel): rin po che'i cod pan can/ /rol pa'i stobs kyis bzhugs pa/ /g.yas pa'i phyag dang bas gter ston pa/ phyag gnyis pas rin po che'i char 'bebs pa/ phyag gsum pas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang rgya mche'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal ba/ g.yon pa'i phyag
389a1(rgyud 'grel): dang pos bum pa bzang po dang/ /phyag gnyis pas 'bras so ba'i snye ma dang/ phyag gsum pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti 'dzin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs ni sku
389a2(rgyud 'grel): mdog ser mo chos gos kyi gra 'dzin pa'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni sku mdog dmar po phyag na rnga yab can no/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje sku mdog ljang khu phyag na rnga yab can no/ /lha mo i la mdog ser mo rin po che'i snye ma
389a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'o/ /chu'i dbang po ji b+hi la sku mdog sngon po ne'u le dang/ shing rtog pi dza pU rA ka 'dzin pa'o/ /tsi bi kun Da li mdog dmar mo lag na me tog can no/ /ke li mA la mi mdog dmar po lag na gdug spos can no/ /sgo'o dbang po mdog ser mo lag na mang
389a4(rgyud 'grel): po can no/ /spyod pa'i dbang po mdog dkar po lag na dri chab can no/ /spas ma mdog sngo bsangs lag na rnga yab can no/ /legs sbas mdog dmar mo lag na gdugs can no/ /dbyangs can ma mdog ser mo lag na rgyal mtshan can no/ /zla ba rdzes ma mdog dkar mo lag na ba dan can no//
389a5(rgyud 'grel): nor bu bzang po mdog dkar po ne'u le dang/ shing rtog pI dza pU ra ka 'dzin pa'o/ /gang ba bshad po mdog sngon po rin po che'i snye ma dang/ bi dza pU ra kra 'dzin pa'o/ /nor sbyin mdog dmar po bum pa bzang po dang pI dza pur ka 'dzin pa'o/ /rnam thos sras mdog ser po rin po myur gu dang pa'i
389a6(rgyud 'grel): dza pu ra 'dzin pa'o/ /klu'i rgyal po chu lha mdog dkar mo sprul zhags 'dzin pa'o/ /oM A hUM/ rang gi snying khar gnas pa'i tsluM gyi yi ge'i? 'od zer gyi steng yang dag par bkang nas 'og mig gyi srid pa na bzhugs pa'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs par bya zhings
389a7(rgyud 'grel): ma ya so mya sa ma yaM ka ri ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ lan gsum mo/ zhabs bsil la sogs pas mchod cing/ dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ yid dam tshig sems dpa' dag? ro? gcig tu gyur par bsam par bya'o/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sarba ta thA ga ta/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po
389b1(rgyud 'grel): mi khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gsum gyi/ gnas la byung ba sbyin par bya/ 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ mchod pa'i 'dren pa'i cod pan te/ rigs lnga las ni byung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi cod pan che/ mahA
389b2(rgyud 'grel): mu ku? Ta pra tits+tsha swAhA/ ti la ka bi byung Sha ne swA hA/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ lha yi chu ni dag ba yis/ /de bzhin dag gis bkru bgyi'o/ /oM A:- a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+rI ye hUM swA hA/ slar yang zhabs
389b3(rgyud 'grel): bsil la sogs pas mchod do/ /slar me tog dgod cing sgeg mo brgyad kyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma ye shes kyi sku can la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i yon tan yid kyi shing rta gsang ba mo sngags sgrogs pa dang ldan ma la'o/ /'di yi
389b4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan gyi gtor dang gser dang rin po che'i char dang skyes po mang po'i nor 'phel ba dang rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i phung po dkyil 'khor pa dang bcas pa rang rig lus la rab tu bzhugs par bya'o/ /oM dzluM tsluM swA hA/ sna la nor bu bzang po'o/ /dpral ba la
389b5(rgyud 'grel): gang bzang po'o/ /kha la nor sbyin mo/ /brla brung dag la rnam thos sras so/ /rkang pa gnyis la tsi pi kunDa li'o/ /gsang ba la'i? li mA ni'o/ /snying khar zhal gyis dbang po'o/ /yan lag thams cad spyod pa'i dbang po'o/ /zhabs bsil la sogs pas mchod pa dang me tog dgod pa dang
389b6(rgyud 'grel): sgeg mo brgyad do/ /bsam gyi mi khyab rdzas ni rtag tu 'phel ched dang/ rin po che dang dum gser ni 'phel ched du/ /khang pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor yongs rdzogs pa/ dpal ldan nor rgyun ma la rtag phyag 'tshal/ /bzlas pa dang gtor ma'o/ /oM ba su d+ha re
389b7(rgyud 'grel): sar b+ha b+ha ya ha re bi ga sha na tri ka re pra kri ti pra b+ha sa re i ma g+h+ri h+Na g+h+ri h+na oM ma a ka ro mu khangs sarba d+harma NaM a dya nud pan nad twad oM A:- hUM/ a tsa ma naM pra tits+tsha swA hA/ me tog la sogs pas mchod par bya'o/ /rdzogs so// //'phags ma
390a1(rgyud 'grel): nor rgyun ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs bzang gzugs mdzes mchog bster ma/ nor? 'dzin byed ma nor rgyun ma/ nor dpal dpal mdzad mchog gyur ma/ 'dzin ma 'dzin 'jug 'dzin byed ma/ /skyabs gyur gus la gnyen
390a2(rgyud 'grel): gshen pa/ lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin/ shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma/ rigs 'dzin zhi ba phra mo ste/ zhi ba kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma/ sgrol ma sgrol 'jug lha mo ste/ rigs sbyin dbang phyug dbang phyug ma/ brgyan ma 'byung bu'i yum gyur ma/
390a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan byed ma/ gdul dka' skrag mdzad 'jigs byed ma/ /drag mo drag po mchog tu mnon/ /lha mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ char 'bebs bzang po'i gzugs can ma/ /gter dang bkra shis thams cad dang/ grags dang dpal dang snyan mdzad dge
390a4(rgyud 'grel): sreg ma gsod ma gtum mo ste/ /'tshe phyed ma mo thams cad ma/ gshin rje skrag mdzad drag nyid ma/ gzhon nu ma dang/ sna tshogs gzugs/ /lha mo brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/ /'gro ba dga' mdzad can ma ste/ /dka' thub ma dang drag
390a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ma/ /rdzu 'phrul grub pa mchog ster ma/ /skal bzang bsod nams skal ba ste/ /mi thub thub pa pha rol gnon/ /'gro la gcig tu phan brtson ma/ /yul las dge byed dge ba mo/ /lha mo bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/ /tshul
390a6(rgyud 'grel): khrims bsam gtan sgom mdzad ma/ /pad+ma can dang pad+ma 'dzin/ /pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa mo/ /dag pa'i gzugs can gzi brjid che/ /gser gyi mdog can 'od mdzad ma/ yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin lha mo/ /shes rab glegs bam
390a7(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa mo/ /gter gyi phung por bzhugs mdzad ma/ /nor dang ldan tshad nor dga' ma/ /khams gsum dbang phyug chen mo ste/ lha yis brgyan gyis brgyan pa mo'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis yu gyur ma/ /rin chen khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ /dngos
390b1(rgyud 'grel): po stong nyid bsgom lha mo/ /dngos dang dngos med rnams spangs ma/ gdul bar bya ba 'dul mdzad ma/ /sgrol ma nyon mongs gcod pa mo/ /bdud rnams thams cad 'joms pa mo/ /sa 'og bdun po bskyod mdzad ma/ bram ze ma dang rigs byed yum//
390b2(rgyud 'grel): spas ma phug tu gnas pa mo/ dbyangs can ma dang spyan yangs ma/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa ldan pa mo/ /de bzhin gshegs ma 'gyes chen ma/ /rdo rje can ma rdo rje 'chang/ /las 'dzin 'jug cing las 'dzin ma/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs 'bar
390b3(rgyud 'grel): sprin gyi dkyil 'khor ldan pa mo/ /sems can kun gyi rtogs mdzad ma/ byang chub yang dag thob mdzad ma/ bsam gtan mos pa phun tshogs ma/ /gnyis med gnyis med sgom mdzad ma/ /don kun sgrub mdzad bzang mo ste/ /bud med gzugs can dkar
390b4(rgyud 'grel): mo mnon/ /sangs rgyas lam rnams ston mdzad ma/ /dag gi dbang mo ston ma che/ /srung mdzad 'dzin chad nor ster ma/ /bud med gzugs 'dzin grub pa mo/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnal 'byor ma/ /yid 'phrog ma dang/ gzugs mdzes ma/ skal bzangs
390b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba ston pa mo/ /ded dpon ma dang brtse ldan ma/ de bzhin gshegs kun bdag nyid ma/ /lha mo chen mo khyod la 'dud/ nor rgyun ma khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /mtshan ni brgyad lhag brgya pa 'di/ /gang zhig dus gsum klog byed ma/ /yid kyi
390b6(rgyud 'grel): shing rtas 'dod byas pa/ /thams cad nges par thob par 'gyur/ /mtshams med pa dang cha 'thun gang/ /shin tu mi bzad las rnams ni/ /de rnams thams cad mtshams mang po/ /rjes su dran las zad par 'gyur/ yang na tshul khrims
390b7(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs/ /skye ba bdun ni dran pa dang/ dga' dang tshig btsun gcags bzang ldan/ mthong dga' bram ze rgyal rigs kyis rigs ni phyug por skyes par 'gyur/ /mthar ni sa yi dbang thob nas/ bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur//
391a1(rgyud 'grel): ming brgya rtsa brgyad klags pa yis/ /lha mo myur du 'gugs par 'gyur/ /'phags ma nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //sangs rgyas
391a2(rgyud 'grel): la gus rang bzhin g.yo sgyu ched/ /sems can kun la byams shing stong bar goms/ /rnam grol 'bras bur ldan la kun las tshogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' i shes rab rno ba can/ /shin tu che ba'i
391a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs skyes gzugs mdzes pa/ bdag ni skye ba skye bar bde gshegs kyi/ snyan dngags mkhan po mnyam med rgya che dang/ tshe ring rigs skye skyes bu blo gros gsal/ /mkhas shing blo gros mi mnan bcom
391a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyi/ /gsung rab la mkhas bde ldan snying rje can/ rab tu dangs 'gyur snyan dngags mkhan po dang/ mar shes pa la gus pa nyid dang ni/ bdag kyang skye ba dran zhing tshul khrims ldan/
391a5(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi bdag nyid nor ldan rab sten dang/ /bla med mkhas pa'i grogs dang ldan pa dang/ spros ldan stobs ldan dga' zhing mang pos bkur/ /nad rnams thams cad spangs shing sems
391a6(rgyud 'grel): can la/ rjes su brtse zhing thos pa 'dzin pa dang/ bsam pa dag cing bzod pa ldan pa ste/ /ji srid 'jig rten phan pa 'byung ched du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan go 'phangs bgrod gyur pa/ de srid rtag
391a7(rgyud 'grel): du yon tan 'di rnams ni/ /kun gyis brgyan pa dag gis thob gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma nor rgyun ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtog par gsungs pa'i cho gas yongs su bklags byas shing/ /'dzin ma
391b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs rin po che gser gyis/ /khang ba stong phrag thams cad gang ba nyid du mdzad pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum gyi yum gyur de la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo khyod ni yon tan rin chen kun gyi gter chen de/ /sems can
391b2(rgyud 'grel): don mdzad nor dang 'bru rnams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu/ dol shal cod pan ldan zhing nor dang 'bru rnams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu/ /do shal cod pan ldan zhing nor bu dpag bsam shing rnam kyis/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon
391b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad nor 'dzin nor rgyun ma la 'dud/ nad dang 'jigs pa'i 'chi ba'i skyen mang sgrol/ /dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rma yi 'tsho byed sman/ /bskal bzang gzugs kyi yon tan rigs dang rus/ /thams cad sbyin mdzad khyod kyi zhabs
391b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud/ /gang gi yang dag bla ma'i tshogs yongs su klog byed na/ phun tshogs yangs pa'i bde 'gro'i nye bar spyod pa ster byed pa/ /nor rgyun zhes pa'i ming can gzugs de la ni dus rtag tu/ /mdza' dag sems can phan par sems
391b5(rgyud 'grel): pas gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig yang dag dran la mi rnams longs spyod yun ring du/ /rab tu 'phel zhing dbul dang nad dang sdig pa sel mdzad cing dpag bsam shing dang mtshungs pa nor rgyun ming can de la ni/ /'gro la phan pa'i
391b6(rgyud 'grel): ched du gus pas spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i sgrubs thabs dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa dang smon lam dang bstod pa rnams rdzogs so// //tshul 'di ni dpang lo ts+tsha ba dpal
391b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan blo gros brtan pos zhol phug tu/ /rgya dpe las bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa dang bskul ba po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin chen mdza' can yin no/ /sems can thams cad bde skyid ldan par gyur cig/ /
392a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+ha ga ru Da ShA sta/ bod skad du/ mkha' lding grub pa'i bstan bcos/ dpal rdo rje mkha' lding la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kha sbyar mchu bar sbrul ni bsdams pa yi/ /gdengs ka'i nor bu mkha' 
392a2(rgyud 'grel): lding me long ste/ /gnyug ma'i gzugs mthong ngo mtshar skyes gyur pa'i/ /khro ba spangs pa de ni rgyal gyur cig /mkha' lding bstan bcos skyes mod tshal nas ni/ /me tog rtsi yi sbrang rtsi de nyid ni/ /sems can don du sbrang rtsi byed
392a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi dbang ldan Shad ku bdag gis 'dir de bsdu/ /gang zhig bstan pa'i sems kyis bla ma yis/ /rjes 'jug dag pa'i lam la yang dag gnas/ /mi de phrin las ma lus pa yi ni/ /dngos grub thams cad kyi ni snod du 'gyur/ /bzad dka' i
392a4(rgyud 'grel): dug las byung ba'i tshor ba yis/ /'khrugs pa'i 'gro ba'i srog ni 'dzin byed cing/ /chos dang nor dang 'dod dang thar pa ni/ /bsod nams byas pa'i 'gro ba de yis thob/ /'gro ba'i don phyir mkha' lding bstan bcos ni/ /dam pa'i skye bo de
392a5(rgyud 'grel): yis bsngags par byed/ /'dod pa can ni nor gyis dga' ba ltar/ /sngags bas sbrul gdug mi bzad pas yis so/ /de nas gdengs ka can dang rtsi ti rnams/ /rA yi dkyil 'khor can dang 'dran gzugs sogs/ /rlung gi yon tan dus dang dus
392a6(rgyud 'grel): min dang/ /a ma rad ta sbyor rlung bus pa'o/ /mkha' lding gis bshad sman gyi nus pa dang/ /ji ltar dug 'joms pa yi rim pa dag /gus pas des ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon/ /gzhan dag kyang ni thos pa las byung ba'i/ /mtshon bos
392a7(rgyud 'grel): trin in+d+ra nI la lta bu'i lus/ /'dab brgya rgyas 'bras mtshan pa lhag ma can/ /nor rgyas lus ni kha dog dkar po la/ /mtshan pa pad+ma rgyas 'dra sngon po yin/ /shar thog nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu la/ /mgo la g.yung drung dung chen
392b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jog pa bo/ /rkarke ta ni mun pa lta bu yi/ /ri mo gsum ni mgrin par yod pa yin/ /pad+ma'i lus ni kha dog ljang gu la/ /skar tshogs lta bu'i thig les gdengs ka mdzes/ /pad chen zla 'od bskus pa lta bu la/ /mdung rtse gsum pa lta bu gdengs
392b2(rgyud 'grel): ka yin/ /dung skyong ka ni ya ra'i me tog 'dra/ /mgrin par zla ba'i cha yis mtshan pa yin/ /rigs ldan gyi ni spyi bo'i gdengs ka dag /du bu lta bu'i zla ba phyed pa yin/ /dbyig pa yis ni brdeg pa mchog yin te/ /klu rnams gzung nas skod pa de ltar
392b3(rgyud 'grel): min/ /sdang bas glags ni tshol bar byed pa na/ /sngags pa dag ni gang gis thar bar byed/ /sa 'og gnas na yongs su gnas pa yi/ /dbang chen 'og gi klu rnams shin tu dkon/ /gdengs ka'i nor bus mdzes par byas pa yi/ /khol po yang ni glog gi zer ma 'dre/ /lce gnyis
392b4(rgyud 'grel): gdengs can phugs ces 'jigs pa'i sgra/ /rin po che ni med par gyur pa ste/ /khol po yi yang khol po'i gnas su ni/ /gus pa med pa'i lto 'phye dag yin no/ /a ku pa saM gnyis gnyis bram ze rgyal/ /me tog dang ni sa la'i dri yin no/ /de bzhin ta ma
392b5(rgyud 'grel): ka ba rje'u dang dmangs/ /mar dang nya'i dri ni bro ba yin/ /dug 'chang mche ba'i rtsa na legs gnas pa/ /sbrang rtsi'i me tog phreng ba lta bu yin/ /de ni 'gro ba rnams kyi rmongs byed kyi/ /dug de yongs su 'dzag par gyur pas so/ /gdengs ka can ni rang gi ngo bo'i
392b6(rgyud 'grel): gan ta ya na'i yin par gyur na ni/ /mgo 'jug lus la ri mo kyog po yod/ /gdengs kas dman no 'jig rten gan da ya/ /tsi ti zhes ni yongs su grags pa yin/ /de yis bzung na g.yo med skad cig gis/ /de ni 'gyur ba med pa'i rang bzhin
392b7(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /de nyid grub pa thob pas gal te na/ /sad par byed na dran pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ci ti'i rang bzhin no/ /thig btab lta bu'i ri mo ring po can/ /ban da ya ru rnam par shes par bya/ /shing dang lcug 'khyil rtsas gtugs yod par
393a1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ nges par shin tu legs gnas rA yil la/ /kha skom mig dmar zas dang stan mi 'dod/ /tsha dang 'khrul pa yi ni rjes la rgyal/ /dkar dang dmar dang nag dang ljang gu yi/ /ri mo med pa yin no rA yil la/ /gtso ma'i gser 'dra'i lus ldan de yis
393a2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /'gro ba rnams kyi srog ni 'phrag byed yin/ /rA yil gyis ni bzung na nges par ni/ /rim gyis khyab par skrangs pa kho nar 'gyur/ /gser mdog lus de rgyu ba'i tshe na ni/ /'bar ba'i me lce chad pas 'od ma bsrag /'od ma'i rang bzhin ya ni nges sreg na/ /de yis gzung na ji ltar
393a3(rgyud 'grel): 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /rA yil la'i rang bzhin no/ /chu dang rlung me sa yi rang bzhin gyi/ /ko Ta rnams kyi gang zhig mtshan ba ni/ /go med sa rnams su ni shes par bya/ /dug chen skangs 'bur yang dag bskyed pa po/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor can ni dug 'dzin gyis/ /zin pa'i mtshan nyid
393a4(rgyud 'grel): lus ni 'brul ba yin/ /tsha dang 'dar dang skam dang skrad pa ni/ /rlung gi lus can gyis ni skyed par byed/ /lus kun gyi ni spu yi ni rtsa ba nas/ /se ba gnag 'dra'i khrag gi thigs pa 'byung/ /me yis reg bas kun nas bskyed pa ni/ /thos dang gzugs dang mthong ba nyams
393a5(rgyud 'grel): ba yin/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor can gyis smras pa na/ /skrangs dang tsa ba'i reg? bas gdungs pa yin/ /gnyid dang stan ngag la ni sdang bar 'gyur/ /skyes bu sems la zug zer dag gis nyen/ /phung po la ni myur du snang 'gyur ba/ /dkyil 'khor can gyi stobs kyi stobs kyang snang/ /ring
393a6(rgyud 'grel): po yi ni ring por skrangs pa ste/ /nges pa nyid du mang pos mang po'o/ /thal ba dang ni rus ba bshad pa 'am/ /gzhan yang lus las gang zhig byung ba yis/ /go med sa rnams kyis ni myur nyid du/ /'gro ba rnams kyis lus ni nyams par byed/ /gang zhig stobs can
393a7(rgyud 'grel): yang ni la la dag /mgo mjug du yang mes mtshan mes sa dang/ /yud tsam du ni 'chi ba de yis 'dzin/ /des ni 'gro bar 'chi ba the tshom med/ /'dir ni mang du smras pa ci zhig dgos pa/ /des na snying po dang du blang bar bgyi/ /sngags dang sman dang sbyor ba gang
393b1(rgyud 'grel): yin pa/ /ji srid dbugs rgyu'i bar du bya ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor can gyi rang bzhin no/ /gang zhig dran pa'i dug gis phye ba na/ /bram ze yin par gyur na de ni dkar/ /dmar po rgyal rigs ser po rje'u rigs yin/ /dmangs rigs nag po 'di de rnams la'o/ /gang zhig
393b2(rgyud 'grel): bya rog rkang 'dra'i 'dud pa la/ /phye na ri mo 'khyog po snang ba dang/ /mi mnyam thig les rnam par spras pa ni/ /nges bar nag po brtsegs pa dang ni mtshungs/ /gzhan du bcud kyis len ni bsgrub pa la/ /bram ze 'am ni de bzhin rgyal rigs kyis/ /rje'u rigs kyi ni mdze
393b3(rgyud 'grel): nad gzhom ba la/ /gsod pa la ni dmangs rigs rung bar bya/ /'dran pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /smad 'tshong sems kyis dor thabs kyis sems bzhin/ /bdag rgyun mi chad rnal 'byor yang dag 'grub/ /mkhas pas de bzhin rlung gi yon tan gyis/ /dus ni nges par shes pa kho na
393b4(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /srog chags rnams ni gang gis 'tsho ba dang/ /khyed can gang zhig nyams pas srog 'gro'o/ /don dam zhing brtson de la sems dang ni/ /bdag dang mchog dang de nyid du mi 'dod/ /'jug pa'i rang bzhin srog ni kha ba yi/ /'od la rten pas gsal bor skyed bar byed/ /bdag
393b5(rgyud 'grel): dang skyes bu'i rang bzhin de nyid ni/ /nyi ma'i zhing la brten nas sdud par byed/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun par babs pa na/ /dug rgyal dge dang the tshom mi dge yin/ /ston par byed de rlung gi dbye ba dag /'jug dang gnas dang dbyung ba nyid na'o/ /gtso bor chos sems
393b6(rgyud 'grel): pa na snying stobs te/ /yul la chags na de bzhin rdul la srog /rnongs? pa la zhes mun pas 'gog pa yin/ /gsal bor cha ni shes par gyur pa yis/ /'byung ba na ni 'byung ba kho na ste/ /'jug pa na ni 'jug pa ston par byed/ /rang gi gnyug ma'i lus la de
393b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /kun tu grong khyer gzhan la'ang de bzhin no/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i zhing du rlung/ /rgyu ba'i phyogs su pho nya gnas na ni/ /dug gis brgyal ba de ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin stong pa'i khyim la 'chi par 'gyur/ /nyi ma'i zhing la rlung ni gnas pa na/ /gsal por pho
394a1(rgyud 'grel): nyas thad kar bltas pa dang/ /skyes bu rgyab nas 'dug ste yin na ni/ /ngas par zla ba'i khyim la bzang por gzung/ /dug zhir 'gro dang bya ba gang la yang/ /zla ba'i srog gi zas 'khrig 'thab mo la/ /nyi ma'i srog ni mdzes so bi su la/ khang
394a2(rgyud 'grel): na rdul gyi char ni bzung bar bya/ /grub pa gzhan dag gsung pa gnyis ka yang/ /zhing du sag gi rlung ni lags par gnas/ /dbye ba rnam pa bzhir ni yod pa la/ /de la sems can ngo mtshar ci yod pa/ /khyab dang steng 'og dbus su rlung dang ni/ /yon tan zhi dang lha yi
394a3(rgyud 'grel): bdag pa na/ /don med khyam par 'thab dang 'chi ba na/ /dri khur nga yis de rnams byed ba yin/ /skom dang bkres dang skyo ba dag dang ni/ /'dod pa'i dgos pa nyams da rtsa gsum gyi/ /'gro ba rnams la rgyal ba'i dag bskyed pa/ /mi 'chi ming na de byed lin ma yin/
394a4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don byed dka' ba mad par ni/ /bder gnas bde bskyed yid ni tshim par byed/ /dri med dri zhim la ni mngon 'dong bzhin/ /gzugs bzang lha yi bdag po nga yis byed/ /yi dags mi dang ri 'dzin sgo dang ni/ /gnod sbyin sgo gang lag pa gnyis kyis sdom//
394a5(rgyud 'grel): don dam thig le gang yin de dang ni/ /zlas rtsa sprod dbus gnas mtshon bar byed/ /nag dang li khrid dang pa gser sbyangs mdog /don gang yin bar ni thob bar 'gyur/ /gang dga' rjod pas dri khur rab dbye las/ /mnyan po de dag rang du thob par byed/ /mig
394a6(rgyud 'grel): dang kha sbyor ji lta bzhin du smra/ /dbugs 'jug 'byung ba kun nas ma nyams na/ /snying stobs la ni bab pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /rnam 'gyur mad las 'tsho bar 'gyur ba yin/ /mig gi spugs ni cung zad bye ba dang/ /rma can cung zad sgo yi phreng ba rnams/ /rmi lam
394a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du dug gi reg pa yis/ /g.yangs pas 'gags pa da ni rdul la yin/ /rma can gyi ni kha gang ngam mig kyang bgrang/ /dmas pa 'jigs su rung ba spros pa dang/ /san mo mo dang mi rnams mdog 'gyur ba/ /gsal por ti mi yi mdog gis
394b1(rgyud 'grel): nyal/ /gang dag la ni lag bas dangs tsam gyi/ /rtsa nas bung ngo mgo la skyes pa'i dag? /'byung po'i pha? ni gang yin de sang la/ /de la the tshom yang ni dgos sam ci/ /'thungs pa de yi mod la ldog byed de/ /sman dang chu ni ming ba gang yin la/ /srog de'i mdun
394b2(rgyud 'grel): du rgyugs bar byed pa ste/ /g.yog 'khor gyi ni skyem bu ji bzhin no/ /sa rtsa'i bdud rtsi zhim pa ma yin dang/ /rna ba'i sgra med mig gi glog kyang med/ /skyes bu gang gi spyi bo'i du ba ni/ /mi mthong ba ni de nas bskyod pa yin/ /nyin mtshan mtshams kyi rtags
394b3(rgyud 'grel): ni go bya ba/ /tshis por byas nas lor ba de yi ni/ /dkar nag dang ni gser gyi mdog can te/ /rna can gyi ni zla dang nyi mig go /zla dang nyi ma'i mig gi snying por ni/ /go bu'i gzugs brnyan snang bar mi 'gyur zhing/ /so rtsi'i bdud rtsi dag ni ma mdzad na/ /phung po'i
394b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing las rlung de bskyod pa yin/ /sna ni rang gi gnas nas g.yos pa dang/ /mig ni 'chi mas dkrugs dang shes pa g.yengs/ /kha yi rlung ni chu la bab pa dang/ /sna sgang du ni smra ba gang yin pa'o/ /rlung gi yon tan gyi rab tu dbye ba'o/ /lus kyi cha ni gang la rma
394b5(rgyud 'grel): mthong ba/ /de 'dra de ru 'pho bar byed pa ste/ /mi bzad dus kyi dbang du byas pa yis/ /rna ba'i rgyab tu ri mo dma' ba snab/ /smas pa'i sa ru spas rgyal ltar mtho yis dug gis zin pa de ni mi 'cha'o/ /khrag ni sna tshogs mdog tu 'dzag byed cing/ /de ni bya
394b6(rgyud 'grel): rog skad 'dra'i gzugs su snang/ /mgrin pa 'phongs chos gsang ba dang ni gra nang/ /mig dang rna ba la gsor rnams kyi rtse/ /lte ba bshad yam phrag pa rked bar ni/ /zin pa bsod nams kyis ni 'tsho ba yin/ /rma'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang gis khyam gyi tha
394b7(rgyud 'grel): snyad ma he dang/ /bong bu dang ni rnga mo zhon pa yi/ /pho nya ltas ngan yin zhes su zhig smra/ /su la'ang de yis ltas ngan bskyed ma yin/ /ltas ngan bden par brjod pa 'di dag ste/ /yun rings shugs ni 'dzin par byed pa dang/ /de bzhin
395a1(rgyud 'grel): du ni rdul dag 'byung pa dang/ /pho nya rigs gzhan dag ni yin pa dag /phal cher sngags pa ma yin kho na ste/ /yan lag nyams dang thod ba can gyi gzugs/ /gos nag ngur smrig gyon pa nye bar na/ /pho nya'i mgo la mar nag byugs
395a2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'am/ /yin na rdul gyi skabs la bab ngan yin/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang ba na 'tsho ba ste/ /phal cher bud med la ni mtshon pa'o/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bas skyes pa dag /srog ni 'gro ba yin par mtshon pa yin/ /rjes kyi dbyangs med de dang
395a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar ba 'am/ /yi ge phan tshun sbyar dang dang po ka /dris tshe nyon mongs tshig ni brjod pa na/ /rma can de ni the tshom med par 'chi/ /nyi mas rang gi gnas zhig bsregs nas ni/ /'od zer rnon pos sreg bzhin pa yi gnas/ /de bzhin mdun na mo la
395a4(rgyud 'grel): ? bar 'thul/ /lhag ma rnams ni dag pa'i rnam pa yin/ /dgos pa la ni 'gro ba'i ched du nyams pa dang/ /nyams bzhin ba dang nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyogs/ /phyogs gsum ma yin phyogs gzhan rnams su 'grub/ /sprid? pa bya rog kA rA yi dang
395a5(rgyud 'grel): lce? swang gnyis/ /zangs dung la sogs sgra yi dus dang 'dzom pa na/ /nyon mongs srog ni 'gro tshe phyogs nas sgrogs/ /dri khur rjes 'brangs rtog mkhas pho nya yi/ /nyis ni bzang ngan dge dang mi dge dag /dug 'joms the tshom nyon mongs
395a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba yi/ /bden pa 'di ni nges par mkhyen pa yin/ /pho nya'i mtshan nyid do/ /ma mo'i khyim mam pad+ma can gyi mtsho/ /shing 'dzeg phug pa grog mkhar dag nas sam/ /bang? rul dur khrod kyi ni lto 'phye rnams/ /chu 'am bzhi mdo yi ni gdug pa can//
395a7(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i gza' la lto phye'i dug gis ni/ /'dzin na bzhi 'am bcu bzhi yin na 'jigs/ /de bzhin cha ni rab nyams gnam stong dang/ /tshes brgyad ya ni bab bar gyur na'o/ /ka ni ka dang ma g+ha a tra dang/ kha ra Ni dang mA la bi sA kha/ /sle sha 'phul sum
395b1(rgyud 'grel): gal te tshes dang gza'/ /rgyu skar la zin nges par brlag par 'gyur/ /pad mkhris rlung ni gtso bo mi dang ni/ /lto 'phye'i khams ni 'dra bar gyur pa na/ /de ltar shes na chos mi mthun pa dang/ /chos 'thun pa yin dka' ba med la'ang yod/ /gnas dang tshes
395b2(rgyud 'grel): grangs dang gza' dang rgyu skar dang/ /chos mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'o/ /nyin mtshan thun byed dag la glu rnams ni/ /gza' yi dbang gyur dag ni longs spyod de/ /nyin mo gang la de yi dus nyid de/ /mtshan mo sgo ni rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur/ /'byung po phyogs
395b3(rgyud 'grel): dus me dang ri bo dang/ /dus dang thar pa nyin mo'i dus su bsgreng/ /ro dus mig dang thub pa dang ni mda'/ /me dang zla ba mtshan mo dag tu shes/ /spen pa'i dus phyed snga ma bla ma yi/ /dang po 'das par dgos pa'i sa yin te/ /nyin mtshan 'pho ba'i mtshams
395b4(rgyud 'grel): ni gang yin pa/ /bcu drug po de rigs ldan dus yin no/ /gnyug ma'i lus la lta nan nyin zla ste/ /lag pa rna ba la reg sa skyes yin/ /sna la lag pas reg na gza' lag go /mgrin pa la reg lha yi bla ma'o/ /dbugs ni drug tu 'byin na pa ba sangs//
395b5(rgyud 'grel): rgod pa na yang ston pa ru ni shes/ /sa la lta na sgra gcan nyid yin no/ /dus dang dgos pa'i dbye ba dang rags pa dang stong pa ste/ /dug zin gyi mtshon byed do/ /nyi zlas sras gza' lag phur bu dang/ /pa ba sangs dang spen pas bskyed pa na/ /phyogs mig rgya mtsho re
395b6(rgyud 'grel): dang bcu drug dang/ /sum cu gnyis dang lnga bcu tham pa ste/ /'gro bas rang dbang can gyi lto 'phye'o/ /the tshom med pa de yang shes pa ste/ /dgos pa dang ni bcas pa'i dug dag kyang/ /stong dang stong pa ma yin dbus su yang/ /srog rdul snying gi dbus su dol ba yis//
395b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gsal ba yis ni legs gnas na/ /gnas na gnas pas de ma thag tu ni/ /yun ring brgyal ba la yang mtshan par bya/ /gnyis pa'i phyogs rtsa bstan pa'o/ /spyi bo dag ni nag po rlung yin te/ /mgrin pa lte bar me'i 'bar bas dkrigs/ /de nas
396a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang chen ser po mkha' lding gi /pus mo nas brtsams chu ni dkar po yin/ /brgya byin gyis mi 'dud rtsi phrogs nas kyang/ /rdo rje'i mtshon chas dgra med dga' ba yis/ /mkha' lding dgra ni ring par 'gyur ba dang/ /
396a2(rgyud 'grel): yid 'phrog thob pa de ni rgyal gyur cig /gar gyi dpa' brjid gshog pas skyong pa yi/ /rlung gi rigs kyi ri rnams bskyod byed pa'o/ /nam mkha' lding du ni yongs su bsgom bya ste/ /ma lus dug rnams zhi don gnyer bas so/ /rlung du bstan pas
396a3(rgyud 'grel): sems ni phur bus 'debs/ /'bar ba yis ni spel bar byed pa yin/ /brgya byin gyis ni gsal por rengs par phyed/ /chu zil 'bab pas dug ni brlag par byed/ /mkha' lding bye brag re re yis kyang ni/ /sel la ngas par bsgrom pa dang ldan na/ /
396a4(rgyud 'grel): nga med nga yis bu bzhin gnas su na/ /ma lus dug ni tshar gcod byed pa yin/ /a sti bi ShaM brjod na du yod de/ /nA asti pi ShaM sa stengs kun na med/ /bsod nams yang dag bsags la mchog gi ni/ /de nyid 'di de skye ba kho nar 'gyur
396a5(rgyud 'grel): lta byed mig gsum 'bar bas bstan pa yi/ /dug mchog thal ba ru ni brlag nas kyang/ /la la dag la gal te 'di skad du/ /mgrin sngon khyod brjod byin par gyur na ni/ /skyes bu de yi lus la ji srid ni/ /'tsho ba'i bar du dug ni mi 'pho ste/ /ri bong
396a6(rgyud 'grel): mgo la rwa ni skye ba dang/ /nam du yang ni srid par 'gyur raM ci/ /gal te 'phrog byed kha na bkag go myur bar ni/ /dga' ba'i ma? zhugs srog rlang 'gro bzhin pa/ /re shig gsal bar 'gul bar gyur na ni/ /rmas pa de ni 'tsho bar shes par bya//
396a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba'i rlung ni nang du rdubs nas su/ /'phrog byed kyi ni kha rlung? ji bzhin blta/ /skye bo'i dgra yis dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /sbas pa'i yul la yang ni shes par bya/ /the tshom mam ni dag dang mi dge ba/ /'dra ma 'dra lhag dug gis brgyal ba ga?/
396b1(rgyud 'grel): phyis na pho nya'i gos ni phrogs byed ni/ /khru yi gcal ba la ni snang bar 'gyur/ /mkha' lding gshog tshogs gar dang ldan pa yi/ /klu gzugs de la rnam par gnon pa na/ /de ltar gang gson skad cig tsam gyis ni/ /gsal bor smra ba dang ni bskyod par
396b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /kha dang sna rlung rgyu ba bkag nas ni/ /skad cig tsam gyis de ni khyad par du/ gdengs ka can gyis gzung nas brgyal ba ni/ /nges pa nyid du tshor ba dang bcas 'gyur/ /dug 'joms byed pa pad+ma rgyas par yang/ /srog gi rlung gis kyang ni byed pa ste/ /yang
396b3(rgyud 'grel): dag 'gags pa'i 'gro ba'i snying po ni/ /slob dpon gyis ni bsgom par byed pa yin/ /dug gi skyon ni med pa kho nar yang/ /gang dag gis ni rgyu mtshan 'ga' zhig gis/ /brgyal bar byas pa mkhas pas sen mtshams su/ /sen mo yis ni sad par
396b4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa yin/ /dug zin gyis ni bsod nams sbyor ba yi/ /gang la thig le dkar po byung gyur na/ /de la gang dang gang ni brjod byas pa/ /de dang de ni sngags su 'gyur ba yin/ /lus kyi yan lag dang ni dkar ba la/ /gang gis gnas der me ni 'bar ba dag/
396b5(rgyud 'grel): drag pa yi ni rlung gis bskyod pa na/ /rmas pa de ma thag tu 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /lhag ma'i nor bu'i gdengs ka'i 'dab ma'i rtsar/ /bsred med bu bzhin rma can bde ba nyal/ /'o ma'i mtsho yi bdud rtsi dkar po yis/ /bsgom pas dug ni 'khor?
396b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ba yin/ /gang dag gi lus ni dkar por bsgyur byed pa'i/ /thig le dkar po dag ni lta byed na/ /stong pa de yi dug ni stong par ni/ /bsgom pa byas pas kyang ni shes par bya/ /'phrog byed mig gi me ni 'bar ba dag /rang gis bskyod pa gang gi snying la ni/ /rab tu
396b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas rma ni rnying ba'o/ /yud tsam gyis ni de la rgyas pa bskyed/ /rigs ldan nor gyis 'byor dang yon tan can/ /dka' thub snying stobs can dang rgan po dang/ /bud med mngal ni rab tu rgyas pa dang/ bram ze dang ni byis pa bskyed mi bya/ /mkha' ldeng ser
397a1(rgyud 'grel): pos dug zin dag la ni/ thig le yis ni gal te mnan pa dang/ /dum pa can gyi nyin zhag mang por yang/ /ri rab kyi ni mnan bzhin g.yo ba med/ /dug gi zin pa nor rgyas dkar po yis/ /mjug mas mgul bar bcings
397a2(rgyud 'grel): te mi ltung ba/ /de yi mgo las gal te gzung nas ni/ /shang shang nam mkha' na ni 'gro na yang/ /zla ba'i zhing du son pa'i nus pa ni/ /snying gi pad+ma phug nas pad kud 'dra'i/ /'dzag pa gang la zag pa bltas nas ni/ /de yi lus la dug ni gang la ste/ /gang
397a3(rgyud 'grel): gi gnyug ma'i lus las nus pa ni/ /'dzag pa yis ni rgyang ring gnas pa yi/ /ma lus dug kyang phig nas nges par ni/ /zhi bar byed pa kho na yin pa'o/ /sbyor ba'o/ /'dab ma dkar po rab rgyas rab 'dzag pa'i/ /kha ba'i 'od 'dra chu shel nor bu'i gzugs/ /
397a4(rgyud 'grel): mi bzad dug kyang dang po dbyangs kyis ni/ /bsgoms pas yang dang yang du 'joms par byed pa yin/ /lag pa g.yon du dbang phyug spyi ba'i rgyan/ /dbus gnas drug pa la ni thig les brgyan/ /dbyangs ni dug rnams sdud par byed pa ste/ /'phrog byed
397a5(rgyud 'grel): dkar po'i khu tshur bcangs pas so/ /sa 'og spyi bor zla bas dum bu ni/ /thig le dang bcas sgra ris spyi nag stong/ /u yig gi ni dbyangs la zhon pa ste/ /'phrog byed dkar po dug mthar byed pa yin/ /spong ba dang ni gos dag 'phrog pa dang/ /dug bcings cho
397a6(rgyud 'grel): long ston mos yi 'og /ji ltar nges par bsgoms pas byed pa na/ /de ltar dgod pa yang ni shes par gyis/ /'gro ba dug gis brgyal ba dag la yang/ /snying gar yang ni mgo mang dkar po ste/ /gzhan dag kyang ni brgyal bar byed pa na/ /drag po'i rlung gis
397a7(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa me 'bar bas so/ /sa 'og gos gnas rlung gis drangs pa na/ /skad cig gis ni phyed tsam gyis kyang ni/ /myur du khros na 'phrog pa de la ni/ /bting bzhin 'brangs nas 'ded par byed pa yin/ /nyon mongs snying gar chud pa'i mi shig pas/ /bkug pa'i dug
397b1(rgyud 'grel): gi gong bu nag po ni/ /kun pa skar bcas gos ni bcings pa yis/ /nyin zhag mang po yang ni g.yo ba med/ /chos bzhi sprin nag lha yi bla ma dang/ /zla nyi pa ba sangs ni chol shing ste/ /rtsis kyi ri mo glog ni 'gyu ba dang/ /gang bor cho mor skar ma'i tshogs su ste/ /chos skur lag pa
397b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug bzhin pa'i mig /cho lo mkhan po gnyis skyes mchog gi tshogs/ /dug zin dug las yongs su thar nas ni/ /chol res la ni lag nas yongs su 'dzin/ /de yis dug gis bzung ba'i skyes bu ni/ /rnam par dag pas skad cig khyad par 'phags/ /bza' bzos
397b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lhag ma'i dus su ni/ /chu snod bzung nas chu ni ster bar byed/ /gang zhig mthong dang thos dang gang zhig ni/ /nyams su myong ba'ang yul byas spyod pa ni/ /de kun sems kyis byed po gus par gyis/ /srid pa'i dngos po dngos med 'byung ba yis/ /de bzhin du ni na ra yas smras
397b4(rgyud 'grel): ba/ /nus pa gang gis myur du thar skyed dang/ /des ni dug dang 'byung po 'joms byed de/ /zla ba dang ni nyi mar zhugs pa na'o/ /'dus pa'i skye bo kha yi sbubs nas ni/ /nus pa ba mo lta bu bab pa yis/ /rgod pa'i sgra yi dug dag myur du ni/ /'joms par byed de bsgom par
397b5(rgyud 'grel): byas pas so/ /dug zin smra bas gal te yod pa na/ /rgyas ring na yang dug ni myur du bsdud/ /snying gar ngang pa dkar po bsgom pa ni/ /bdud rtsi'i snying po yongs su rgyas pa'o/ /bstan pa'i dug ni khur bu stong phrag kyang/ /rlung gis sdus pas dug med par ni byed/ /dad pa'i bdud rtsi
397b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bab par gyur pa ni/ /zla ba'i zhing nas byung bas der 'gyur ro/ /lto ba spyi bo spyi gtsug go cha ni/ /mig dang lag pa lag ser sgra ldan pas/ /re re bor ba'i ring po tshig? drag kyang/ /drug po yang ni blang bar bya ba yin/ /nyi ma'i grangs kyi dbyangs ni sbyar bya ste/ /sa mchog srid pa med
397b7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa med pas 'god/ /de ni drag po dang mnyam pa tshig btsam zhing/ /dug 'joms mi byed pa na yod ma yin/ /sa mchog ral pa bskyon bkug rings dang/ /zla phyed thig le yis ni mdzes par byas/ /mar gyi nyid khus mdzes pa bsgom na ni/ /go nas yi dug ni sel bar byed/ /gang zhig
398a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag bdun ni bzlas pa yis/ /bi na ya yi bu bzhin sprul du bzod/ /mi ldog snyan dngags mkhan gyi rgyal por ni/ /dbyangs can gyi ni nus pa bsgom pa na'o/ /de nyid chog drag dang bcas 'char ka yi/ /'od kyis dkrigs pa'i skyes bu
398a2(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig gis/ /sgom par byed na dug dang mkha' 'gro ma/ /gdengs ka can yang khro zhing 'khrugs par byed/ /snying la bsgoms pa yis ni 'gugs pa ste/ /dpral ba'i mthil du gnas pa dbang du sdud/ /yan lag mchog la btsud pa chang gi rgyun/ /dzu ba ti la
398a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bab pa kho nar 'gyur/ /kha yi spubs su 'bab pas dkrigs pa yi/ /su ma rab tu 'bar bas dug brgyal ba/ /'chi ba 'am ni 'tsho ba yang ni dung/ /bden par gsal po nyid du nga yis smra/ de nyid d+ha yi nang du chud gyur cing/ /pad+ma'i lte bar gnas pa bsgoms
398a4(rgyud 'grel): na ni/ /bdud rtsi'i bril ba 'bab pa'i tsheg drag bcas/ /dug 'joms pa yi sa bon nyid yin no/ /de nyid me yi nang du gzhag nas ni/ /nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od 'dras mngon gsal dkrigs/ /nges par dug sel rims dang 'byung po dang/ /dug gi khyad par yang
398a5(rgyud 'grel): ni sel bar byed/ /ka Sha sbyar ba dkar po thig? ler bcas/ /ri dags mtshan pa'i dbus su chud pa ni/ /snying la chud par byas pas dug rnams ni/ /myur du 'joms par byed pa kho na yin/ /dbyangs yig a'u ring yang dag ldan pa yi/ /yi ge de nyid mi yi seng ge'i
398a6(rgyud 'grel): steng/ /'jigs dang skra dang sdig dang dug dang ni/ /'byung po nad dang dbul po brlag par byed/ /yi ge hUM phaT me yi rang bzhin can/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pas gsal byas pa/ /gang gis mgrin par bris pa yin na ni/ /de yis gsal por don grub byed
398a7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /la yig mchog ni zlum por thig ler bcas/ /gos gnas bdud rtsi dkar po rgyun 'dzag pa/ /dug gi zin la byab tu bcug na ni/ /nges par dug gis 'joms par byed pa yin/ /gri khur nag po'i dbus chud tha yig ni/ /sngags 'dis dug zin la ni byin
398b1(rgyud 'grel): brlabs na/ /skyod dang smra dang gzer ba'i sgra dang ni/ /langs nas kun tu lta bar the tshom med/ /gsum pa nye bar bstan pa'o// //dzhaM krA ri Ni ku ru kul+le dang/ /be duN+Na dang gser ri sa bon dang/ /gang du dug gis brgyal ba byed pa yi/ /dbye ba der ni legs par mnyan par gyis/ /sad do bA ma b+ho/
398b2(rgyud 'grel): ra de skyes bu/ /lnga pa de ru yA ni dbang ldan du/ /dkar ser gnag dmar nam mkha' sor mor gnas/ /rgan lcug gung mo gsum la dzhaM kA ri/ /yi ge rnam par spras pa dag yin no/ /bzhi pa lha ni Ni yig ces bya ba/ /ming med la ni gnas pa nyid yin no/ /mkhar gnas d+ha dang wa byar thig ler bcas//
398b3(rgyud 'grel): dug zin ming mig dang por bar du ste/ /rgan po'i sngags dang sbyar ba dag gis ni/ /dbang ldan de ni mnyes na ma lus pa'i/ /dug ni de yi mod la zhi bar 'gyur/ /de yi skyes bu dang ni sbyar ba na/ /'byung po'i gnod pa yod na mngon gsal 'gyur/ /'jigs pa'i g+ho ri dang ni sbyar ba na/ /dag
398b4(rgyud 'grel): sprul dman pa yang ni mod la bskyod/ /g.yon pa mnan pas rangs pa phongs pa dang/ /dgra dang ngag dang dug dang dpung dag go /lug g.yon zla ba'i dbus gnas tha yig chud/ /dzhaM mnyes/ /dkar po 'dzag par byas nas ni/ /cha kun rdzogs pa de yis ni/ /dug dang lu ba rims
398b5(rgyud 'grel): 'bras mkha' 'gro ma/ /gdon dang 'byung po'i gnod dang tsha ba dang/ /nges par zhi byed yongs su bzlas pa'i chus/ /sngags pas 'gro ba rnams la de byed do/ /kha la dzhaM yig lkog mar kA yin/ /lte bar ri yig gsang Ni rkang gnyis d+hwaM/ /mda' dang nyung kar rma bya'i sgo sogs kyis/ /'byung
398b6(rgyud 'grel): po la sogs gnod pa 'joms byed de/ /dung sogs sgra la'ang lan bdun bzlas pas so/ /'bum bzlas sbyin bsreg khri yis mchod sdong bsgrub/ /tsan tis oM yig kha la ku yin te/ /du ni lkog mar ku ni nu prag tu/ /l+le ni gsang bar rkang gnyis swA hA'o/ /stong bzlas skud par rnar brtag
398b7(rgyud 'grel): nags su sbrul mi 'jigs/ /sa gar sogs bris khyim gzhag de mi 'ong/ /pi ri mahA se na tsan ra dang/ /tsan tis 'bum bdun re res dbang kun 'grub/ /oM su war+Na re khe kuk+Shu ta bi gri ha ru pi Ni swAhA/ lag mthil pad dkar 'dab brgyad dbus su ni/ /
399a1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge 'dren pa gzhan la gnyis gnyis brtsegs/ ba mo? 'bab pas sman ma la bsangs na/ ras bal 'bab ma rlung gis bskyod bzhin ldang/ /o e ho mA he/ b+he ru Na Te/ A a'i a'u bI dzi/ b+ha re? ya ka ra Na De/ tat+ta man+ta A g+ho She/ hUM ka re pi
399a2(rgyud 'grel): Sha na se thA ba ra dze ga ma aM ga dza kit+ta mahA ra ha ra hUM phaT swAhA/ /lo paM k+Shi swAhA/ Shi sid+d+ha nA thA de bA ka ri A dz+nyA sh+rI sh+rI skaN+tha sh+rI nI la ka NA/ ShI bi ShaM kha la/ ri mi dzI mi haM sa/ kI pi k+Shi pi haM sa/ hUM haM sa/ dzaM(rgyud 'grel): haM sa nA(rgyud 'grel): t+ti pi Shi/ tri b+ha ba ne/ sa ya le/ bruM bu gnyis dang
399a3(rgyud 'grel): dug zin la sogs pa/ gso dang sngar bsrung bla ma'i man ngag bzhin/ /sngags chab ji 'gro ba'i lam der na/ /dug sel byed par yid la gnod mi za/ /pad steng bum bca' sngags bdun bzlas klu mchod/ /oM pak+Shi swAhA/ zhes bya ba dang rig pa'i
399a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo drug go /sgra ris zla dkyil lag mthil bsam pas kyang/ /dug sel bya rgod bshad pa mthong ba dang/ /skye bo'i skyid sdug bde ba'i sgra yis kyang/ /tsha gsum po la'i sa bon sbrang rtsir sbyar/ /snar blugs lus skyes sogs kyis nad 'joms
399a5(rgyud 'grel): byed/ tsher can shir shi'i rnga la ni/ /kha gnyis pags pas rnga g.yogs byas/ /sbrul dgra'i rkang gis brdungs nas ni/ /ji srid sgras khyab de dug 'joms/ /pha ni ja dang spu darSha na lus btags kyang/ /She te pu nar na ba'i khu blud pas/ /ma ning
399a6(rgyud 'grel): ka ko ti yi rtsa/ /ba mar dang 'thungs dug gsum sel/ /kan ta shir sha'i rtsa shu na 'bras bkrus chur/ /sbyar ba a shar yi nya dag la/ /'thungs na lo gcig dug ni thub pa yin/ /shu dag shing kun nim pa'i khu ba dag /snar blugs
399a7(rgyud 'grel): dug gis sgra rtse skye bas kyang sel/ /ka ran dza yi tsher can nim pa'i 'dab/ /mar sbrang yungs kar gong nas yang sel/ /kha gnyis lus ne'u le yi mig /sbrul dgra'i mkhris pa'i cha mnyam pa/ /khyim pa'i gzhag pas kyang
399b1(rgyud 'grel): sbrul mgo 'gegs/ /sh+ri bA sa/ /bi rang ga /u shir/ sardza ra sa/ lAk+Sha b+ha lA lA ta ka /kud tha/ tri pha la/ ardzu na/ ku su ma/ 'de dag cha mnyam du ba yis/ /lus skyes tsa re sbrang ma sogs/ /sbrul yang 'bros shing klu
399b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub gsung/ /me tog grong khyer zhes bya ba/ /brgya byin pho brang dang mnyam par/ /zla cha zhes pa'i byab pa'i bram ze mo'i lo rgyus kyang ni lnga pa yin/ /dpal mkha' lding grub pa'i bram ze shang kus mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
399b3(rgyud 'grel): gu na se ga ra/ 'dir ni bla ma dam pa'i rjes 'brangs te/ /dpal ldan shang ku bdag gis mdor bsdus bris/ /dge ba de yis srid gsum ma lus pa/ /dug med bdud rtsi'i go 'phang bsten par
399b4(rgyud 'grel): shog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal bram ze a ba d+hu tI ba chen po dpe med kyi zhal sngar/ lots+tsha ba bande pradz+nyA kIrtis bsgyur ba'o// //dbang phyug chen pos nam mkha' 
399b5(rgyud 'grel): lding du sbrul nas mkha' lding rgya mtsho ba 'bum phrag bzhi bshad/ /de bram ze sad kus dbang bskur gyi tshe klu bdun gyi dug yod pa la/ 'jog po'i dug kham phor du mar dang sbrang rtsi byin pa ma yog /
399b6(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa kun gyi bu mo bkug nas chung mar byas/ 'jog po'i bkug pas mos phu byas pas dug gis zin nas shi la thug pas/ yul mi kun gyis khyed grong na ded kyi dug sus gso byas pas/ mchod sdong
399b7(rgyud 'grel): tshungs shig zer nas nam mkha' lding gi mchod sdong rdo rings steng du btsugs steng nas rdo rje'i gdugs phub pa gcig byas/ khos 'khyud nas sngags bzlas te/ kun dug zhi bar byed do/ /de lta bu'i shang kus mdzad do// //
400a1(rgyud 'grel): dus dang dus ma yin pa la lnga ste/ rma'i mtshan nyid dang/ pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang/ gnas dang/ tshes grangs dang/ gza' dang/ rgya skar dang/ chos mthun pa dang
400a2(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur ba dang/ dus rab dgos pa'i dbye ba dang/ rigs pa dang/ stong pa ste dug gzin gyi mtshan nyid dang/ dus ma yin pa mi 'chi ba bstan pa'o/ /nyid dgos lo gsum/ phrin las thams cad
400a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi snod du 'gyur ba'i dgos pa dang/ sems kyi srog 'dzin pa'i dang/ phyogs thams cad du grags pas khyab pa'o/ /mchod brjod sdang/ dgos 'brel dang/ gzhung bshad pa gsum mo/ /gzhung
400a4(rgyud 'grel): la gnyis/ lus rnam gzhag dang/ yan lag rgyas bshad do/ /oM tsakra ra hi tsakra b+hi da ni g+haN ti kA ra hiM/ sa gzhi lci bas maN+Dal gu bzhi byug /dung dang bu tsha bkrus la thug pa dang kha byang
400a5(rgyud 'grel): du bstan/ rang yang kha byang du bltas la dung la gu gul bdug /g.yas g.yon gang du 'khor 'dod pa des ngos su du ba bskor lag pa gnyis kyi bar du dung gzung/ dug la kha
400a6(rgyud 'grel): gtad la sngags bzla bu tsha'i mgo la me tog gtor/ rtsang ba lots+tsha ba'i phyag dpe las bris so// //ye d+harmA he tu pra b+hA wa he tun+te ShAn ta thA ga to hya
400a7(rgyud 'grel): dad te/ te ShAhtsa yo ni ro d+ha e wi pA dI ma hA sh+ra ma Na:// //mang+ga laM b+ha wan+tu// //dge'o// //
